95a8: bsam gtan ldan pa'i sems kyis te// sgrub pa po la phan pa'i phyir// gsang ba 'di nyid gsungs pa yin// dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las dbang gi sbyin bsreg dang gnas la sogs pa'i sa bstan pa'i

95b1: cho ga'i le'u ste lnga bcu pa'o/ / // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// man ngag shin tu rnyed dka' ste// dpa' bo'i brda ba skad du ni// nga yis chung du smras pa yin// gos dang phyag rgya lnga la sogs// shes rab yan pa
95b2: pur bu 'dra/ / a li ka li zhes brjod pa// rgyu la sogs stong sngon 'gro ba// 'jug pa sgra la sogs pa nas// ji srid bsdus pa'i sbyor ldan pa// bdud rtsi tshim byed mya ngan 'das// lag pa'i mchod pa'i dbang bskur ba// go
95b3: chen pos yang dag bsrung / / sngags rnams kun gyis mchod par bya// de ltar de nyid bcu bzhi ni// mdor bsdus nas ni bshad pa yin// mi mchog gang zhig kun spyod pa// sdig pa thams cad rnam dag bdag/ de bzhin gshes
95b4: pa'i sa 'thob cing / / skye dang skye bar bde gshegs kyi// rigs skyes rgyal po chos ldan 'gyur// ji ltar sngon sogs sdig pa yi// mtshan nyid thams cad dman pa ste// gang zhig 'di ni rtag bsgom pa// sa la 'dod pa'i
95b5: kun dbang phyug/ dper na mar gyi gang ba'i snod// me 'i dbus su bzhag na ni// mar sar steng du'u 'gyur zhing // snod kyi dri ma 'jig par 'gyur// de bzhin shrI he ru ka pi// mtshan gyi sdig pa 'jig par 'gyur// bsam gtA
95b6: sems pa tsam gyis sam/ / klog cing kha ton bris pa yis// mtho ris longs spyod thob 'gyur ba'am// yang na 'khor los bsgyur ba thob// rnal 'byor pa rnams 'pho ba'i tshe// khrag 'thung dpal sogs rnal 'byor ma// lag
95b7: na me tog sna tshogs thogs/ / rgyal mtshan ba dan sna tshogs dang // rol mo'i sgra ni sna tshogs dang // sna tshogs klu'i mchod pa yis// 'chi ba zhes bya rnam rtog 'di// mkha' spyod gnas su khrid par byed// de 'dra'i dpal
95b8: chen rnal 'byor ma/ / sa stengs na ni rnyed par dka'// dpal ldan he ru ka'i rgyud chen// gang zhig shes nas ma dad pa// dbul po sdug bsngal gyis gdungs par// de la rtag tu 'byung bar 'gyur// mgul rgyan gdu

96a1: bu dpung rgyan dang / / rna rgyan tshangs pa'i skud pa dang // do shal mgo'i phreng ba dang // ske rags sil si la sgra sgrogs pa// ri stengs sna tshogs pad ma yi// lte bar a li ka li skyes// dkar mo bdag po rnam gdon
96a2: cing / / rdo rje dril bus su la 'khyud// nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i phyed ldan pa'i// dpa' bo rnal 'byor mtshogs dang // he ru ka dpal rgyal po che'i// go 'phang mchog ni bsgom par bya// dpa' bo kun dang rnal 'byor ma'i// 'khor bcas
96a3: dbus bu sbyor ldan pa/ / thams cad dgyes shing gnyis med gyur// 'byin dang sdud par mdzad pa yin// mos pa du ma'i sems can la// spyod pa sna tshogs ston mdzad de// sna tshogs tshul gyis gdul bya ba// thabs ni
96a4: sna tshogs ston pa yin/ / zab mo'i chos ni ston pa la// gal te mos par ma gyur kyang // smod pa dag tu mi bya ste// chos nyid bsam mi khyab dran bya// gang gis 'dir bdag yul min pa/ bdag gis chos nyid mi shes yin//
96a5: rdzogs sangs rgyas dang de'i sras ni// bdag nyid chen po rnams kyis mkhyen// sangs rgyas rnams ni byung gyur tam// ma byung na yang rnam kun du// bsam mi khyab pa'i chos nyid ni// 'phel 'grib spangs pas gnas pa yin// /
96a6: de ltar rnam par bzhag nas kyang // 'jig rten pa kun yod mi smad// de yi bgrod pa bsam yas shing // sangs rgyas rol pa bsam mi khyab// mdo sde bya ba spyod pa rnams// rnal 'byor gsang mtha'i dbye ba nyid// sems can
96a7: mos pas 'jug pa rnams/ / de dang de la dga' bar bzhin// dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa 'bum pa'i nang nas phyung ba grub pa'i rtog pa smad du byung ba ngo mtshar dang bcas par byed pa bstan chos thams cad kyi rgyal
96a8: po dpal he ru ka dpa' bo chen po blags pas grub pa gzhan thams cad kyis mi thub pa gdod nas grub pa bla ma yin/ / dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa zhes bya ba rnal 'byor ma chen mo'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las le'u lnga

96b1: bcu gcig pa rdzogs s+ho/ / // grags pa yid 'ong rgyal mtshan mthong ldan bI// rin chen dang mtshungs rin chen bzang po yis// mkhas pa pad ma ka ra'i zhal sngar ni// rig pa'i 'byung gnas kha che'i dpe las sgyur// lhag
96b2: pa'i tshul khrims dri yis bsgos gyur cing / / dri med bka' don 'thad pa dang bcas par// rtog pa dang ldan grags pa'i zhal sngar ni// sgra bsgyur dge slong pradz+nyA kIr ti dang // mar pa sgra sbyar chos kyi dbang phyug gis// mkha
96b3: pa'i 'byung gnas yul dbus dpe dang btugs/ / / rgya gar skad du/ a b+hi dAn ud tAr tan tra nA ma/ bod skad du/ mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje mkha'
96b4: 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo/ / ji srid 'gro ba drug gi mthar// sangs rgyas thams cad rnam par 'byung // rdo rje sems dpa' yis ni byed// chos kyi dbyings la phyag 'tshal bstod// dpal ldan rdo rje mkha' 'gro ni// sku gsum ye/
96b5: shes lnga yi dngos// mkha' 'gro ma yi 'khor lor bzhugs// 'gro ba sgrol la phyag 'tshal bstod// ji srid rdo rje mkha' 'gro mo// kun tu rtog pas bcings pa gcad// 'jig rten bya ba rab tu 'jug/ de srid
96b6: rtag tu phyag 'tshal bstod/ / 'di skad bdag gis thos pa rus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje khro bo dang / mkha' 'gro dang / mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi gsang ba'i snying po la
96b7: rnam par bzhugs te/ der bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad pa bcom ldan 'das thog ma med pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' la zhus te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
96b8: cad kyi rdo rje khro bo dang mkha' 'gro dang / mkha' 'gro ma'i dra ba mngon par brjod pa'i bla ma'i tha ma'i snying po ngas bshad kyis/ lag na rdo rje khro bo chen po'i bdeg po 'khor sna tshogs pas rnam par 'phrul pa rnam

97a1: par 'phrul pa rgyas par bshad kyis legs par rab tu nyon la yid lazung shig/ de la bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol te/ thal mo sbyar ba btud pa la bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs//
97a2: pa// de nas gsang ba bshad bya ba// mdor bsdus pa ste rgyas par min// dpal he ru ka yang dag sbyor// 'dod pa'i don kun sgrub byed yin// bla ma las kyang bla ma ni// mngon par brjod pa'i phyi ma ste// mkha' 'gro ma lidra
97a3: ba'i sdom/ / gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na// thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma sems dpa' ni// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ 'di ni rang byung bcom ldan dpa'// mkha' 'gro dra bI
97a4: sdom pa yin/ / thog ma med pa'i tshul chen 'di// b+ha gar srid sgra gzugs skyes gnas// dam tshig spyod pa'i spyod yul yin// thog mar dbus mtha' dri ma med// 'jig rten gsum du rnyed dka' ba// bsrub dang bsrub
97a5: bar yang dag sbyor/ / gang la de la ji ltar bzhin// rang bzhin dag pa 'od gsal ba// gsang ba'i gnas las byung ba yin// rtag tu nyes bral zhi ba ste// nam mkha' dang ni mnyam gyur pa// spro dang bsdu ba byed pa yin//
97a6: rang bzhin dag pa rang 'byung ste// rnal 'byor ma yi bde ba ster// bzlas dang bsam gtan ldan pa dang // sbyor nyid cho ga'i ye shes kyi// de dag rgyud las gsungs pa dag/ gsang ba'i bdag po rab tu nyen// dbugs 'byin
97a7: bar ma mchog dag dang / / dril chu dang bcas pa dag/ mkhas pas ri lur byas nas ni// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dag la mchod// 'thung ba'i dus kyi khyad par la// pho nyas lhan cig skyes pa 'grub/ mchog dang /
97a8: 'bring dang tha ma ste// mthar thug dngos grub thams cad 'byung // dga' ba yid la 'dod pa yi// dngos grub kyang ni 'grub par 'gyur// rang rdzas thig les sangs rgyas dang // byang chub sems dpa' mchod pa bya//

97b1: rang gi lha'i sbyor ba yis// rang dang gzhan yang mchod par bya// mthong ba dang ni reg pa dang // thos pa dang ni dran pa yis// sdig pa kun las grol 'gyur te// de ltar 'di la the tsom med// rnal 'byor pa nyid bsod nam/
97b2: mchog/ dag byed sdig pa 'jig par byed// bzlas dang bsam gtan dag pas kyang // skye ba 'di la dngos grub 'gyur// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las dam tshig la 'jug pa'i gsang ba sbas pa bstan
97b3: ba ste le'u stedad pa'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings la rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba khro bo chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ dngos grub thams cad kyi gsang ba
97b4: gsungs pa/ chags pa med cing chags pa dang bral ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la 'di lta ste/ dpa' bo chen po gzugs rdo rje zhes bya ba dang //
97b5: dpa' bo chen po tshor ba rdo rje zhes bya ba dang / dpa' bo chen po 'du shes rdo rje zhes bya ba dang // dpa' bo chen po 'du byed rdo rje zhes bya ba dang / dpa' bo chen po rnam par shes pa rdo rje zhes bya ba dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi de
97b6: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtso bo rdo rje dbang phyug chen po dang / dpa' bo chen po gti mug rdo rje dang / dpa' bo chen po rna ba rdo rje dang / dpa' bo chen po sna rdo rje dang / dpa' bo chen po chags pa rdo rje dang /
97b7: dpa' bo chen po phrag dog rdo rje dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug ces bya ba'i dpa' bo chen po dang / dpa' bo chen pos rdo rje dang / dpa' chen po chu rdo rje dang / dpa' bo chen po me rdo rje dang / dpa' bo chen/
97b8: po rlung rdo rje dang / dpa' bo chen po mkha' dbyings rdo rje dang / 'di lta bu la sogs pa ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi mthas btugs pa mtha' yas pa rnam par 'phro ba'i gsang ba'i snying po 'byung bra

98a1: dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo sna tshogs 'dus pa gsang ba gsum gyi dam tshig gi 'khor lo dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ dpa' bo chen po rdo rje thod pa'i dum bu dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje keng rus chen
98a2: bo dang / dpa' chen po rdo rje keng rus dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje lha dgra dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje dpag med dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje 'od dang /
98a3: dpa' bo chen po rdo rje lus dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje myu gu dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje ral pa can dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje dpa' bo chen po dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje rje mdzad dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje sa
98a4: bzang dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje bzang po dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje mig mi bzung dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje stobs po che dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje rin
98a5: chen dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje rta mchog dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje nam mkha'i snying po dang / dpa' bo chen po dpal he ruka chen po dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje pad ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang / dpa' bo chen po
98a6: rdorjed ma par snang bad dang / dpa' ba chen po du rjesems dpa' dang / 'dis bul sogs pa'i dba'abo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa bams cad kris rnamam pa'i 'ams bsdus pa yos su gang bar
98a7: de nas bcom ldan 'das rigs thams cad kyi bdag po rdo rje gsum gyid ma tshig gnyis su med pa zhes bya ba'o/ nge 'dzin la snyoms par thugs te/ rang gi gsang ba'i das tshig gsang ba'i thag las 'thung/
98a8: brnal 'byor ma dang / dpa' bo'i gsang ba'i dam tshig gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba'i dam tshig chen po gsungs pa 'di lta ste/ rnal 'byor mchen mo ltung byed ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo gsod

98b1: byed ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo 'gugs byed ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo gar gyi dbang phyug ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo pad ma'i dra ba mo zhes bya ba dang / mkha' 'gro
98b2: mchen mo rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma zhes bya ba dang / mkha' 'gro ma chen mo rdo rje lA ma zhes bya ba dang / mkha' 'gro ma chen mo rdo rje dum skyes ma zhes bya ba dang / mkha' 'gro ma chen mo rdo rje gzugs can ma zhes bya
98b3: ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo rab gtum ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo gtum mig ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo 'od ldan ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo sna chen ma zhes bya ba dang /
98b4: rnal 'byor mtshan mo dpa' ba'i blo gros ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo mi'i thung ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo lang ka'i dbang phyug ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo shing grib ma tre
98b5: bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo sa srungs ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo 'jigs byed ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo rlung gi shugs can ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo chang 'thung
98b6: ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo sngo bsangs ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo rab bzangs zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma tshan mo tan ma zhes bya ba dang / rgol 'byor ma chen mo bya gdong ma zhes bya
98b7: ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo 'khor la'i thugs can ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo dum skyes pa zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo char 'tshor ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo 'khor mchon
98b8: cham zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo rab dpa' mo zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo stobs chen ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo 'khor los bsgyur ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo

99a1: brtson 'grus chen mo zhes bya ba dang / de lta bu la sogs pa sna tshogs pas nam mkha'i khams kyi mthar thug par hU~M dang phaT kyi sgra sgrogs pa/ gar sna tshogs byed cing rang gi dam tshig dang 'khyud pa
99a2: dang / tsum b+ha nas snying rje chen po'i ro yongs su rdzogs pa'i dpa' bo dang / rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis gang bar mthong ngo // mthong nas zhugs te dpa' bo'i mchog rnams kyis dam tshig rjes su dran no// dpal
99a3: rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang / mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje phag mo'i dam tshig gnyis su med pa'i ye shes yang dag par 'byung zhing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'byung ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ma mo'i tshogs tham
99a4: cad kyi rigs dang gsang ba gsungs pa 'di lta ste/ rdo rje ma mo khwa gdong ma zhes bya ba dang / rdo rje ma mo 'ug gdong ma zhes bya ba dang / rdo rje ma mo khyi gdong ma zhes bya ba dang / rdo rje ma mo phag gdod ma zhes bya ba
99a5: dang / rdo rje ma mo gshin rje bsreg ma zhes bya ba dang / rdo rje ma mo gshin rje pho nya mo zhes bya ba dang / rdo rje ma mo gshin rje mche ba ma zhes bya ba dang / rdo rje ma mo gshin rje 'joms ma zhes bya ba dang / 'di lta bu'i
99a6: ma mo'i tshogs kyis mchog thams cad kyis nam mkha'i khams thams cad gang ste/ rigs kyi bdag po rnam par dag pa chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin gnyis su med pa'i ye shes 'byung ba dpal he ru ka
99a7: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bdag nyid dam tshig chen po rdo rje rigs kyi dam tshig yin te/ / chos rnams thams cad dngos po med// mtshan nyid thams cad rnam spangs pa// bdag med chos las yang dag
99a8: 'byung / 'di ni dam tshig mchog yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnyis su med pa'i rdo rje go cha zhes bya ba'i rdo rje dam tshig gsungs pa 'di lta ste/ rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po rdo rje sems dpa' dang /

99b1: rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po rnam par snang mdzad rdo rje dang / rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po pad ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang / rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po rdo rje he ru ka dang / rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen
99b2: po rdo rje nyi ma dang / rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po rta mchog dang / rigs drug pa de ni yan lag dag tu dgod pa ste/ bsrung ba gnyis su med pa'i dam tshig gi mchog de ni thabs dang shes rab gnyi su ma
99b3: pa las byung ngo / / rnal 'byor chen po'i mchog tu gsang ba sbas pa bshad par bya ste/ rdo rje dbang phyug chen mo rdo rje phag mo dang / rdo rje dbang phyug chen mo ya mi ni dang // rdo rje dbang phyug chen mo rmongs byed ma dang /
99b4: dbang phyug chen mo g.yo byed ma dang / rdo rje dbang phyug chen mo skrag byed ma dang / rdo rje dbang phyug chen mo rkaN Di ka ste/ 'di lta bus yang nam mkha'i khams dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi gnyisu med pa'i/
99b5: dam tshig yang dag par bsrung ba'i sbyor ba'i thugs gsang ba chen po ste/ de lta bu sna tshogs du ma'i rnal 'byor ma rang gi lag pas khrag dron mo mchog gi mchod pa byas nas thal mo sbyar te/ mos pa mchog
99b6: gis spyi bos gtugs so/ / de nas dam tshig chen po rnam par 'phrul pa rdo rje sna tshogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rang gi ba spu'i bu gnas sems dpa' sna tshogs spros te phyung nas
99b7: gdul ba ru ma la thabs sna tshogs pa ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i chos kyi dbyings yongs su gang bar byas te/ sna tshogs pas mdun gyi nam mkha' yongs su gang bar mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis rig
99b8: sna tshogs pa'i snying rje chen po'i khro bo'i cha lugs 'dzin cing sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir gnyis su med pa'i ro dga' ba sna tshogs kyi cho 'phrul rdul snyed dang mnyam pa bstan te/ khams gsum gyi bdag

100a1: pos gsungs pa/ chung ba me dang / rlung dang / dbang chen gyi steng du sna tshogs pa'i ri'i rgyal po ri rab sna tshogs pa rin po che sna tshogs pa'i gzi brjid kyis mdzes pa/ de'i steng du dpal rdo rje sems dpas chos
100a2: kyi dbyings las rdo rje khro bo chen po gyur nas spros te/ rdo rje chen po'i gzhal mas khang dkyil 'khor chen po'i rgyal po sprul pa la kun du bzang po chen po byung ste/ rdo rje 'khor dang lhan cig byung nas brtan par
100a3: bzhugs so/ / phun sum tshogs pa sna tshogs pas brgyan pa rdo rje rin po che'i rgyan gyis spud pa/ zla ba dang nyi ma'i mdog ltar sdug pa/ dril bu dang / rnga yab dang / rgyal mtshan dang / g.yer ka'i dra bas mig mangs dri
100a4: su bris pa/ / rdo rje dam tshig gi srad bu chos kyi 'khor lo la 'jug pa'i sgra sgrogs pa/ sna tshogs pa'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / yi dgas dang / sha za dang / smyo byed dang / brjed byed dang /
100a5: grib gnon dang / ma rungs pa dang / shin tu gdug pa dang / ro langs dang / ro dang / ro bsreg pa dang / khyi dang / lce spyang dang / lce spyang mo'i sgra sgrogs pa/ dpa' bo dang / mkha' 'gro dang / mkho' 'gro ma'i sgra phe ma dang /
100a6: a la la'i sgra sgrogs pa/ dril bu dang cang te'u'i sgra sgrogs pa/ mgo gcad pa gar byed pas nye bar brgyan pa/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i spyod pa can/ dge ba'i las kyis sgrol ba sems can thams cad la
100a7: snying rje'i ros phan 'dogs pa/ / rnam par 'khor bas bskor ba pad ma'i gar gyis gar byed cing thal mo sbyor ba/ g.yas brkyang bas gnas pa log pa'i thal mo sbyar ba/ sangs rgyas thod pa'i dum bu'i chos kyi
100a8: mchog zab mo'i tshul dang / / khro bo'i rgyal po chen po'i 'dod pa ston pa/ sku lus chen po 'dzin pa/ zab mo'i sgra sgrogs pa/ rang gi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor can/ mngon par brjod pa'i bla ma chen mo nye bar

100b1: 'byung ba/ / mkha' 'gro dang mkha' 'gro ma'i sdom pa'i rgyal po'i dra ba'i dra ba can/ chos sna tshogs pa'i rjes su bstan pa ston pa/ sems can gyi bsam pa sna tshogs kyi bde ba ster zhing ston par byed pa sems
100b2: dpa' chen po legs so legs so/ / lag na rdo rje legs par nyon cig/ mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las zhu ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor/
100b3: thams cad la rdo rje gsang ba'i snying po gsungs pa/ snying kar zla ba bsgoms nas ni// rdo rje phra mo'i rnam 'phrul pa// bde gshegs thams cad gsang ba ni// mkha' 'gro ma'i dra ba'i sdom// der ni gsang ba
100b4: byin brlabs pa/ / snying po mchog ni legs par nyon// bla ma yi yang bla ma ste// mkha' 'gro ma'i dra ba'i sdom// oM swa b+hA ba shud d+hAHsarba d+harma swa b+hA ba shud d+ho ha~M/ oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba Ad ma ko ha/
100b5: oM badz+ra shud d+haHsarba d+ham badz+ra shud d+ho ha~M/ oM yog shud d+ha sarba d+harma yo ga shud d+ho hi/ oM dz+nyA na shud d+haHsarba d+ha madz+nyA na shud d+ho ha~M/ oM sa mA ya shud d+haHsarba d+ham sa mA ya shud d+ho ne/ oM sarba te thA ga ta shA n+ya trAm
100b6: nA ra ga ta badz+ra swa b+hA ba Ad ma ko haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pra krid ta su bi shud d+ha d+harma d+hA tu dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba Ad ma ko ha~M/ oM man tra shud d+ha sarba d+harma san dra shud d+ho ha~M/ oM kro d+ha shud d+haHsarba d+harma kro d+ha shud d+ho ha~M/
100b7: oM tsid ta shud d+haHsarba d+ha ma tsi ta ta shud d+ho ha~M/ oM bA ga shud d+haHsarba d+harma bA ga shud d+ho ha~M/ oM kA ya shud d+ha sarba d+harma kA ya shud d+ho ha~M/ oM dz+nyA na a mri ta shud d+haHsarba d+harma dz+nyA na a mri ta shud d+ho ha~M/ oM nA nA sa mA
100b8: ya shud d+haHsarba d+ha ma nA nA sa mA ya shud d+ho ha/ oM tsar+ya nA ya shud d+ho/ u0f7fsarba d+harma tsar+ya nA ya shud d+he ha~M/ o trai yog pa ri shud d+haHsarba d+harma tri yo ga pa ri shud d+ho ha/ oM a b+hi Shika shud d+haHsarba d+harma a b+hi ShaH

101a1: rbad d+hAH/ oM pUng zad m+b+ha sa nad+harma p+'u dza shrad d+hAH/ oM sarba twA thA kad+hA sa ta ya b+hu dzA bad+has+sa b+hA bA A ma kaH/ oM maN+DaDa la shud d+haHsarba d+ha ma maN N+Dal bud d+d+hoH/ oM a d+hi ba ti nga/
101a2: d+haHsarba d+harma a d+hi pa ti shud d+ho hi/ oM bi ra shud d+hiHrnams mi shud d+ho ha~M/ oM yo gi ni shud d+haHsarba d+harma yo gi ni shud d+ho haM/ oM tad tA shud d+haHsarba d+harma tad twa shud d+ho hai/ he i ti he ta pa ga k+Sha sarba rnam
101a3: he tA ba ga to haM/ ra i ti ru kA rA pa ga taHsarba d+harma ru kA rA pa ga two haM/ ka i ti na ska tsing s+thi taHsarba d+harma naska tsing s+thi to haM/ oM dz+nyA Ti ta ka ra shud d+haHsarba d+harma dz+nyAT ta ka ra shud d+ho haM/ oM b+ha ba shud d+haHsarba
101a4: d+harma b+ha ba shud d+ho haM/ oM dza pa shud d+haHsarba d+harma dza pa shud d+ho haM/ oM a hA ra shud d+haHsarba d+harma a ha ra shud d+ho taM/ oM b+hak+Sha shud d+haHsarba d+harma b+hak+Sha shud d+ho haM/ oM a sa ma hi ta shud d+haHsarba d+harma a sa ma hi
101a5: tA shud d+ho ha~M/ o swa sa ma be d+ha na shud d+haHsarba d+harma swa sam be d+ha na shud d+ho ha~M/ oM d+he sha shud d+haHsarba d+harma d+he sha shud d+ho haM/ oM mo ha shud d+haHsarba d+harma mo ha shud d+ho hai/ oM rA ga shud d+haHsarba d+harma rA ga shud d+ho ha~M/
101a6: oM mA na shud d+haHsarba d+harma mA na shud d+ho haM/ oM ir sha shud d+haHsarba d+harma ir sha shud d+ho ha~M/ oM kha badz+ra shud d+haHsarba d+harma kha badz+ra shud d+ho ha~M/ oM tri tsakra ba ri shud d+haHsarba d+harma tri tsakra pa ri shud d+ho ha~M/ oM DA ki/
101a7: nI shung d+haHsarba d+hamaT+Ta kin+ti shud d+ho u0f7f/ oM sha kul shud d+haHsarba d+harma sha dkul shud d+hoH/ oM ma d+hi shud d+haHsarba d+hurma ma tri shud d+ho ti/ oM bi Sha shud s+yas rbad+ha rma bi Sha shung d+hoH// 'di ltar ji srid
101a8: ba'i dur khrod kyi bar thams cad/ rnam par dag par shes par bya'o// bu dza u a go rA da mA ka o tri ko ka la ka hi pre gr-i so su na si ma ku/ sa bcu rnam par dag pa'i bdag/ pha rol phyin bcu'ang de bzhin te/

101b1: shes pa bcu yang rnam dag bdag/ bcu po de dag rnam par bsgom// 'khor lo gsum yang yongs dag phyir// nyi shu rtsa ba ni bdag nyid dge/ dus dang tshed rnams rnam grol bas// rnal 'byor ma yi yid dag pa
101b2: sam bcucu bdun nam dag/ don// mngon mtho he ru ka las byung // mngon brjod rgyud ni b+h+ra ma'i bya// gsang chen mchog gi dam pa'o// g.yon dang g.yas su bskor ba yis// dgod cing mchod dang bskor tra/
101b3: bya// gang gis de nyid shes pa yis// brda ni lnga po bstan par bya// gang yang dbang bskur med pa la// gzhan du de nyid ma bstan cig/ mngon brjod rgyud la bla ma yis// dbang bskur slob ma dag la sbyin// gzhan
101b4: du slob ma skyo ba dang / / brgyal dang rmongs pa rtag tu 'gro// mnar med 'jigs pa chen po dang // ngan pa der ni ltung bar 'gyur// glegs bam bshes min la ster ba// ngan pa de mi thag tu 'chi// pho la mig rim
101b5: dang dug dang nad/ / mkha' 'gro gdon gyis gtses par 'gyur// mi srun bgegs dang tshogs bdag gis// gsod cing dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur// ji srid 'bad pa thams cad kyis// bla ma slob mas rim
101b6: bzhin du/ de nyid rtag tu sbas na ni// myur du sngags kyi dngos grub 'gyur// bla mas thams cad rim bzhin du// mngon brjod rgyud kyi rim pa bzhin// lha'i rnal 'byor la sbyor ba// gnyis su med pa'i ye shes
101b7: 'gyur/ / de ma thag tu byang chub ste// mchog ni nges par rnyed par 'gyur// mi'i bu mo 'di 'dra spang // bdag gi dam tshig mi shes shing // drag cing log lta rang bzhin ngan// mi srun snying rje med pa dang // bskam
101b8: chags ser snar ldan pa dang / / spyang zhing ngan la phrag dog can// skyes pa gzhan la chags pa dang // rnam par rtog pa med pa dang // 'di 'dra'i phyag rgya spang bar bya// sbyor ba'i dngos grub ring ba yin// bu

102a1: ka si ni mdzes sdug blang / / gzugs sdug gzhon pas rnam par brgyan// sbyor ba la ni gcig tu sems// brtul zhugs brtan zhing dam tshig shes// dpa' zhing chags bral ngo tsha med// nga rgyal med
102a2: cing ser sna med/ sngags pa rang gi spyod pa ste// rig ma brtul zhugs khyod kyi long// phyag rgya lngani rtag tu 'chang // mgo la thod pa'i rgyan yang byas// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// thal ba'i rdul gyis rnam par byugs/
102a3: rtag tu ma hA maMs bza'// thams cad btung bas myos pa dang // ro yi gdan la 'dug pa dang // lpags pa chen po gos su gyon// rjes su 'thun pa'i bza' ba za// zhag dang khrag gis tshim pa dang // grong ngam
102a4: dgon pa rtag tu yang / / gang zhig yul du 'gro ba na// rtag tu chags pas mi gnas shing // rtag tu drarang khrod spyod byed la// yang na tshod 'dus gnas pa dang // nyan thos 'jig rten skal med pa'i// mi shes ga
102a5: mug gis khyab pa/ / nyan thos yongs su longs spyod pa'i// gtsug lag khang du gnas mi bya// ji ltar skyes bu dbul po bzhin// byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gnas// rdo rje gar gyis rnam par rol// rtag tu
102a6: dur khrod la gnas shing / / dri chen sha chen zas su bza'// myos byed btud par ldan pa yi// dpa' bo'i gtso bos rtse gcig pa'i// sems kyis rab tu bsgom par bya// phyag rgya chen po ma rnyed na// g.yeng ba thams
102a7: cad rnam spangs pa'i/ / de ni ye shes 'byung gnas te// shes rab pha rol phyin las byung // gzung dang 'dzin pa mi dmigs pa'i// gnyis su med pa nyid la gnas// rtse gcig sems ni byas nas kyang // sgom
102a8: pa'i spyod pa la gnas na/ / bde la dga' ba'i dngos grub 'gyur// shes rab thabs kyi cho ga'i rim// phyag rgya che dang nges par rol// bsgom pa mngon du gyur pa yis// rnam grol sangs rgyas thams cad kyang //

102b1: skye ba 'di la dngos grub 'gyur// g.yon pa'i spyod pa shes rab ste// g.yas pa de bzhin thabs yin no// bsgom par ldan pa'i mthu stobs ni// sum bcu'i dbang phyug la dbang byed// rnal 'byor ma ni dngos grub
102b2: dang / gnod sbyin klu yi bu mo dang // gzhan yang sna tshogs dri za mo// 'dod pa'i longs spyod dag la spyod// de nyid gsang ba'i mchog gyur pa// A li kA li rtag tu bsgom// rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis// thams cad de
102b3: bzhin rnam par brtag/ dpa' bos brda rnams bstan pa ni// rnal 'byor pa yi lag g.yon gyis// brda' rnams la ni 'jug par bya// dpa' bo'i gnas su gyur pa 'di// rgyu dang mi rgyu'i 'jig rten gsum// 'gro
102b4: kun g.yon las byung ba yin/ / rdo rje sems dpa' mthe bo nyid// 'dzub mor rnam par snang mdzad bzhugs// gung mor pad ma gar dbang gnas// srin lag dpa' bo dngos grub can// tha ma la ni mi zad sku//
102b5: sen mo'i ngos la nya ma gring gnas// g.yon pa'i rgyu las byung ba yin// dpa' bo thams cad yin par bshad// lag mthil po nya 'dus pa'i mchog/ rgyab tu shin tu nges byas te// brda' ni snga po bstan par bya//
102b6: sgrub pa po yis shes par bya// sa ni spyan zhes bya bar bshad// chu khams mA ma kI ru bshad// me ni gos dkar mo ru bshad// rlung ni sgrol ma rtag tu grags// 'o byed ma ni stong pa ste// de bzhin pha rol byin
102b7: ba yin/ / dbus kyi dpa' bo thams cad no// mkhas pas rgyab tu gshegs su gsol// gsang ba 'di ni mi bstan cing // rab tu 'bad do sla bar bya// de ltar brda yis dpa' bo rnams// de dang lhan cig bza' ba bza'/
102b8: dpa' bro thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro dra ba'i bde mchog yin// phan tshun rjes 'gro thams cad kyi// sna tshogs pararda ni bshad par bya// mkha' 'gro ma'i mtshan nyid dang // pho nyarnams kyi mtshan nyid dag/

103a1: sgrub pa po la phan pa'i phyir// de dag thams cad bshad par bya// ras ris dang ni sku gzugs dag/ 'drin de bzhin dam tshig dang // sku mdog gi ni khyad par gyis// gang gis bsgrub pa po 'grub pa//
103a2: sna tshogs sngags kyis mdzes pa'i// phun sum tshogs pa'i dkyil 'khor dang // g+ha yi dam tshig yid 'ong ba// rnal 'byor ma ni sna tshogs mchog/ dpa' bo sna tshogs yid 'ong ba'i// rnal 'byor ma ni yang
103a3: dag 'dus/ / mkha' 'gro ma yang yang dag 'dus// rang rigs sna tshogs mchog dam pa// bla ma rgyud pa'i bka' bzhin du// slob ma la ni phan pa'i phyir// bdag po'i las la shin tu mkhas// sngags dang rgyud la
103a4: legs par bslabs/ / gzhan yang cho ga'i rim pa dang // mngon brjod tha ma'i las la mkhas// phyugs kyi mtshan nyid sngags pas rtogs// sna tshogs rigs kyi khyad par dang // rnal 'byor ma yi spyod pa dang // mkha 'gro/
103a5: ma yang de bzhin te// phyi rol ma mo'i phyag rgya dag/ phag mo yi ni rigs las byung // dpa' ba kun gyi spyod pa dang // 'khor lo'i spyod pa shin tu bslabs// phyi'i rnal 'byor dbang phyug go/ mtshan nyid spyod pa dag la
103a6: mkhas/ / he ru ka dpal rigs las byung // dge ba'i spyod pa dag la bslabs// yul gyi spyod pa'i khyad par dang // slob dpon spyod pa dag la mkhas// rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud spyod dang // rnal 'byor rgyud ni rgya che ba// bya ba'i/
103a7: rgyud kyi dbye ba'i rim// thams cad rgyud rnams rnam par shes// 'grub pa'i lung dang bstan bcos dang // mdo sde skyes rabs de bzhin te// bla na med pa'i spyod pa dag/ shes rab pha rol phyin las byung // phyi rol
103a8: bstan bcos yongs la mkhas/ / phun sum tshogs pa slob dpon mchog/ sbyor ba'i bsgom par ldan pa dang // yid gnyis med pa nyid kyis ni// bza' ba thams cad bza' bar bya// yi ge brgya pas thams cad du//

103b1: gsang sngags brtan par bsgoms nas su// rang gi ming dang ldan par ni// gcig tu spel nas bzlas par bya// rtag tu phreng ba'i sngags kyang bzla// don rnams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// bla ma las kyang bla ma ste/
103b2: mkha' 'gro ma'i dra ba'i sdom// gsang sngags btus pas go cha dang // snying po dang ni nye snying dang // gsang sngags btus pas rjes su bsrung // dkyil 'khor shin tu mdzes pa la// yi ge'i dkyil 'khor legs
103b3: bkod nas/ / dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnams bskyed// 'di ni gsang sngags thams cad do// ma mo rnams kyi dam pa mchog/ gsang ba dga' ba sbas pa ste// gsang sngags thams cad bsdus pa yin// gsang
103b4: sngags kun gyi gnas yin no/ / 'gro ba 'byung ba'ang ma mos khyab// de nyid 'di ni mi bstan te// dngos grub 'joms par 'gyur ba yin// bsgom pa 'di ni mchog yin te// 'dod pa'i dngos grub bla na med//
103b5: skye 'gros 'di ni bsgoms tsam gyis// rdo rje sems dpa'i go 'phong rnyed// byams pa'i go cha bgos pa ste// snying rje chos kyi go cha yin// shes rab mtshon char ldan pa yin// nyon mongs bdud ni rnam par spangs//
103b6: phyir ldog chen mos bsrung ba dang // rdo rje zhal bzhis rnam par mtshan// sku gsung thugs kyi dbye ba yis// kha sbyar gsum gyis rdo rjes mtshan// thams cad mchog gi bsrung ba che// dngos grub thams cad rab tu stsol
103b7: bka' yi 'khor lo bsrung ba che/ / phur bus bgegs med dngos grub 'gyur// bsrung ba mchog ni 'di dag gis// sgrub pa po la byang chub stsol// rdo rje phur bus ra ba dang // rdo rje'i sa dang dra ba dang // steng gi gur dang bla
103b8: re yis/ gdug pa'i bdud ni bskrad byas nas// mi gsod gsod pa med pa yin// gang gis rang sems thul pa yis// bdag gi sems ni bcings pa yin// gang la gang gis gsod pa yod// mnyam pa'i sems//

104a1: ni dri yin te// gru bzhi pa ni phyug pa yin// tsan dan dkar po lus yin te// mnyam par gnas pa nyid yin no// me tog bzod pa rnal 'byor pa// 'bad pas gtor ba yin par bshad// rang
104a2: bzhin dag pa 'dug pa ste/ / mnyam pa'i bsgom pa bdug pa yin// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma chen po las de kho na nyid kyi snying po'i don dam pa bstan pa ste le'u gsum pa'o//
104a3: de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje mkha' 'gros de kho na nyid kyi gsang ba gsungs pa/ de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// mngon brjod rgyud ni bla ma'i b+ha// zlu ma brgyud pas bshad pa bzhin// phyi rol rnamartos/
104a4: spangs nas ni// mnyam pa'i dam tshig mchog dam pa// rtog pa med cing dpyod pa med// 'jigs pa thams cad rnam par spangs// tshes grangs med cing skar ma med// bslab pa'i tshe ga'ang yod ma yod//
104a5: gtsang sbra med cing mi gtsang med// dag pa'i bya ba'ang yod ma yin// dus dang tshod las rnam par grol// dag pa'i spyod pa rnam par spangs// rang gi sngags rgyud sbyor ba shes// sems can kun gyi don yang/
104a6: byed// r-i sul dang ni ri rtse dang // chu bo chen po'i ngogs dag dang // rgya mtsho chen po'i 'gram dag dang // shing gcig dang ni dge ba'i gnas// ma mo'i khyim mam dur khrod dam// sna tshogs dam pa'i ldum
104a7: ra dang / / lha khang dang ni mchod rten nam// khyim mam bzhi mdo dag tu ni// sgrub pa po yis sbyor bsgrubs na// 'dod pa kun gyi 'bras bu ster// gnas ni rtag pa byas nas kyang // yid ni gang du dga' ba pa//
104a8: sna tshogs bde mchog dam pa ni// de ru bsgrubs na dngos grub 'gyur// sems sbyor med pa nyid las ni// du mar g.ye ba'i bsgoms pa yis// ye shes lnga yi bdud rtsis ni// sa ni thug pa byas nas kyang //

104b1: thong ba'i ngom byin pa 'i/ me ga nga bus dum pa ste// tshogs phyag d+ha mi rjo ga // nam par bzhag bstan u0f7f// gcig sa mas so// mas gta pa sa kyi byug/
104b2: tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi la gnas te// bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi pa bya// dge babacu yang dmigs nas ni// sems can kun gyi don yang bya// phyi dang nang du bltas na ni// chos rnams thams ca stong
104b3: yin/ / byang chub tshogs kyi mchog dam pa// sems tsam la ni rab tu gnas// rang gi sgying kha mkha' dkyil du// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gnas par bsgom// de steng de nyid mchog gyur pa// ye shes lnga
104b4: po zhi ba yin/ / sna tshogs 'od zer gsal ba yi// rnam par 'phro bas kun tu khyab// sngon grub pa rnams bskul nas ni// byin gyis brlab pa'ang byed pa yin// nam mkha' khams ni bsgom dga' bas
104b5: dkyil 'khor mchog ni mthong ba yin/ / til gyi gang bu lta bu yi// lha dang khro bos khyab par mthong // sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // byang chub sems dang bla ma'i gtso// lha mo sna tshogs
104b6: mthong nas ni/ / bdag gis mchod cing rjed par bya// sangs rgyas spros te sprul pa'i tshogs// khro bo rgyal po rnal 'byor mas// 'gro ba ris drug sems can rnams// sangs rgyas gnas su dgod par byed
104b7: nam mkha'i dkyil ni kun khyab pa'i/ / mchog de mthong nas bsdus nas su// khams cad gsum la skabs su mchi// byang chub mthar thug par du ni// sems can ma lus gyur pa rnams// sangs rgyas
104b8: go 'phang de la bzhag/ de la sgrub pa pos gsol gdab// dge ba'i las las byung ba la// rtag tu bdag ni skyabs su mchi// rmongs pa'i gzugs can nga rgyal dang // gzugs dang tshor ba 'du shes dang // /

105a1: 'du byed nam shes de bzhin no// oM bruM a~M hri ho hU~M// de ni rnam par snang mdzad dang // rdo rje nyim ga dbang phyug/ rdo rje rgyal pos khyab pa yin// rdo rje sems dpa' mchog de bzhin// de bzhin
105a2: gshegs pa thams cad ni/ / he ru ka dpal rdo rje'o// mig dang rna ba sna dang ni// lce dang reg pa yid de bzhin// oM hUM traM oM kha haM// gti mug dang ni zhe sdang dang // de bzhin phrag dog 'dod chags dang // ser swa/
105a3: dang ni rmongs pa nyid// skye mched dag ni thams cad la// dbang phyug rdo rje nyid yin no// sa dang chu dang de bzhin me// rlung dang nam mkha' nyid dag go/ la maM paM taM khaM/ ltung byed ma dang gsod ma dang // 'gug/
105a4: byed dang ni gar dbang dang // pad ma'i dra ba mo lha'o// mkha' mnyam nam mkha' lta bu'o// de ltar phung po khams dang ni// skye mched rnams ni rnal 'byor pas// tha mal dngos po'i rang bzhin ni// yo
105a5: su dag par shes par bya/ / tha mal chos kun yongs dag ste// bdag kyang yongs su dag pa yin// de nas gsum la skyabs su 'gro/ sngags kyi sku ru 'gyur ba yis// he ru ka dpal bdag gyur nas/
105a6: sems can kun gyi don yang byed// he ru ka'i go 'phang mchog/ thob nas sems can ma lus pa// 'di la 'jog cing 'god par shog/ oM swa b+hA ba shud d+haHsarba d+harma swa b+hA ba shud d+ho haM// lan gsum bar du/
105a7: bzla bar bya// dngos med mdun sogs phyogs bcu ru// snying po'i phreng ba spro bar bya// des na snying po de mthong nas// dra ba rab de bzhin te// rdo rjes sogs byin gyis brlab// bla re mda' yi dra ba dang // rdo rje
105a8: me ni 'bor bar bskor/ / phyi rol ring nas dgod par bya// oM me di ni badz+ra b+hA ba badz+ra ban da hUM/ oM badz+ra pra ka ra hA baM hUM/ oM badz+ra pany+tsa hUM ba hUM/ oM badz+ra bai tra na hUM khaM hUM/ oM badz+ra sha ra dz+wa la hUM Sha hUM/ oM badz+ra

105b1: dro lA nA larka twA d+hU hUM/ / he ru ka yi bka' 'khor lo// gtso bo brgyad po 'bar ba dag/ de mthong nas ni legs pa ru// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus bzhugs pa// rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par bsgom// zhal
105b2: gsum phyag drug zhi ba ste/ / dag pa'i shel dang zla mdog 'dra// phyag rgya che dang mnyam par ldan// shes rab dkyil dkrung legs par bzhugs// thod pa'i phreng 'dra ldan pa'i dbu// mi bskyod pa ni dgra
105b3: rgyan bzhugs/ / rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs// thams cad mtshan mas mtshan pa yin// dpe byad kun gyis brgyan pa ste// thod pa kha T+wAM ga 'dzin cing // rdo rje dril bus legs par 'khyud// 'gra
105b4: pa lcags kyu 'dzin mdzad cing / / dpa' chen bde ba'i go 'phang bzhugs// dkar zhing ser la ljang khu ste// zhal gdong gnyis po rnam par 'gyur// lugs su 'byung dang ldog tshul gyis// de yis khro bo
105b5: brgyad dang spro/ / rdo rje drag po na la ka// rdo rje gtsug tor de bzhin te// thabs sbyor rdo rje gnod sbyin dang // rdo rje nag po stobs po che// rdo rje 'jigs byed ces bya ba// khro bo 'di dag rnam par dgod// sngo zhing
105b6: ser la de bzhin dmar/ / ljang khu du ba'i mdog can te// dkar zhing nag lo gur gum mdog/ rab 'jigs thod pa'i dbu rgyan can// zhal gsum pa la phyag drug pa// thams cad nA ra'i rus pa yi//
105b7: rgyan gyis spyad pa rab tu 'bar// g.yas brkyang ba'i zhabs kyis ni// sna tshogs pad ma'i nang bzhugs shing // nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus na bzhugs// 'jig rten skyong ba brgyad po dag/ zhabs kyis
105b8: mnan par rnam par bsam/ / thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// zhags pa lcags kyu mchog kyang 'chang // thams cad dril bu cang te'u// shes rab bdebs legs par 'khyud// dmar ser dbu skra dag gis

106a1: brgyan/ / mche ba rnam gtsigs 'jigs pa can// stag gi lpags pa gos su mnabs// 'jigs pa'i phreng ba'i rgyan can te// des ni bdag nyid brgyan du byas// rdo rje hU~M mdzad rnam par sgom
106a2: khro zhing b.ral g.yo ba dang / / drag cing 'jigs la rnam par 'gyur// rgyan rnams kun gyis legs par brgyan// g.yas brkyang ba yi gnas pas bzhugs// lcags kyu zhags pa kha T+wAM 'chang // dril
106a3: bu rdo rje thod pa 'dzin/ / mgo yi do shal sku la 'chang // thod pa'i phreng ba'i ske rags can// gdug pa thams cad zhabs 'og mnan// thabs dang shes rab mnyam par ldan// rdo rje sems dpa'i dbu
106a4: rgyan can/ / rdo rje 'jigs byed bsgom par bya// khro bo gnyis po rnam par bsgom// steng du gtsug tor 'khor bsgyur te// rdo rje 'jigs byed rnam par bsgom// 'og tu rdo rje sa 'og go/ dkar la sngo ba
106a5: mdog can yin/ / thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// 'khor lo dang ni mdung 'dzin cing // zhags pa lcags kyu dril rdo rje// g.yas brkyang ba'i gnas pas bzhugs// pur bu khro bor byas nas su// de ni phyogs
106a6: bcur rnam par spro/ / de la bka' lung bsgo ba ni// bgegs ni myur du med par gyis// gsang sngags rjes su dran nas su// phyogs bzhi dag tu rnam par gzugs// mthe bong sdigs 'dzub sbyor
106a7: yis/ / phyogs bcu dag tu se gol brdab// oM suM b+ha ni su~M b+ha hU~M hU~M phaT shar du'o// oM gr-ih+Na grih+Na hUM hUM phaT byang du'o// oM gri h+NA ba ya gr-i h+NA pa ya hUM hUM phaT nub tu'o// oM A na ya ho/ b+ha ga ban badz+ra hU~M hUM
106a8: lho phyogs su'o/ / gsang sngags rgyal po 'di yis ni// bgegs kun gyi ni glad pa la// rdo rje phur bus dgod cing gnan// lugs su 'byung dang zlog pa yin// oM g+ha g+ha/ g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya/ sarba duSh+Ta

106b1: bi g+hA nan hUM phaT/ kI la ya kI la ya sarba pA paM hUM phaT/ hU~M hU~M badz+ra kI la ya badz+ra d+ha ro dz+nyo ba ya ti kA ya bAka tsita ta badz+ra kI la ya hU~M phaT/ phur ba rdo rje khro bo ru// bltas nas yongs su brtag par bya// lugs
106b2: su 'thung dang bzlog pa yis/ / dngos grub rdo rjes brdung bar bya// oM badz+ra hU~M mud kar badz+ra kI lA a ko Ta ya hUM hUM phaT phaT/ mkhas pas rdo rje khro bo'i tshig/ gsang sngags tshig ni drag tu bzla// oM
106b3: badz+ra d+h+r-ig badz+ra hUM ka ra badz+ra hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra tsaN Da badz+ra hUM phaT/ oM badz+rA na larka badz+ra hUM phaT/ oM badz+roSh+NI Sha badz+ra hU~M phaT/ oM ku Na Da li badz+ra hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra yak+Sha badz+ra hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra ka ra la badz+ra hUM
106b4: hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra ma hA bA la badz+ra hUM phaT/ oM bi sha na badz+ra hU~M phaT/ oM uSh+NI Sha tsakra brti badz+ra hU~M Ta oM badz+ra pAM tA la badz+ra hUM phaT// bka' 'di dag ni bsgrub pa yis// de ma thag tu bgegs med 'gyur// ma sa/
106b5: rkang dang zhag kha chu// shu kra rag te lhan cig sbyar// rnal 'byor pa yis raM lur byas// zos na dngos grub nges par 'gyur// sngo zhing ser la ljang khu ni// rdo rje hUM mdzad rang byas te// ser zhing gnag la
106b6: ljang khu dang / / dud kha ser la ser skya dang // dkar zhing ser la ljang khu dang // dmar zhing ser la ldang ba dag/ de ltar bzhi ni bdag po bzhin// mi bskyod dbu rgyan dam tshig can// bsgoms tha
106b7: rdo rje 'dzin pa dgyes/ / 'di ltar khro bo thams cad kyang // dam tshig las ni 'gal ma byed// 'di ltar sna tshogs du ma yi// gtso bo'i bka' ni blang bar gyis// rnal 'byor pa ni gar gnas pa
106b8: bgegs rnams thams cad med par mthong / / gcer bu 'am yang na mi gcer bu 'am// skra grol thal bas yan lag byugs// 'di ltar ji srid ma ngal bar// 'khor lo dag gi bzlas pa

107a1: D+hA/ shA stegs rjo / da pas na shing ma pa shAr bshAg+sa/ oM k+Shan+na d+ha du byAng+ku rmA b+hA Ang saka d+hA/ ma dun bangasa?thA Ang ba/ a ya praH
107a2: na badz+ra swa b+hA ba Ad ma ko haM/ / smig rgyu tsam gyi ye shes ni// sems tsam du ni rnam par brtog/ 'di ni mkha' dang mnyam pa yin// chos med chos min pa yang med// nam mkha' gos pa med pa yin//
107a3: dngos po med cing dmigs su med// gang gi snying gi kha sbyar dbus gnas gsal// phra bar lta ba rang byung myong ba'i sems 'jug pa// khams gsum ma lus gnyis med par ni nyer 'gro ba// gsal
107a4: ba chos kyi dbyings mchog de la bdag phyag 'tshal/ / dngos po'i g.yo brta kun nang du nges sbyor ba'i// ye shes rgyal ba ma lus 'dus pa'i snod gyur pa// khams gsum ma lus gnyis med par ni nyer
107a5: 'gro ba'i/ / mthong ba mkha' dang 'dra bar/ dri med dpal du gyur// sangs rgyas rjes dran rnal 'byor gyis// chos ni rjes su dran pa sgom// chos rjes dran pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// chos kyi sku ni rang 'byung
107a6: 'gyur/ dbus na gsal byed rnam par shes// ye shes mchog ni shes rnams kyis// shin tu bsgoms pa'i goms pa las// 'bad pa 'di ni the tsom med// rtag tu snying la gnas pa yi// thig le
107a7: gcig pu yi ge med/ / skyes bus de ni bsgoms gyur na// ye shes skye bar gyur pa mchog/ sems dpa' rjes dran rnal 'byor gyis// sems dpa' rjes su dran par bsgom// sems dpa' rjes dran sa
107a8: kyis ni/ chos kyi sems dpa' khyad par 'byung // bdag ni snying rjes phan 'dogs pa// smon lam dbang gis mthong ba dang // mthong nas ji srid 'og tu ni// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// rdo rje sem

107b1: dpa' kun mkhyen dag/ dkar dang ser dang de bzhin dmar// sngon po yi ni zhal dang bzhi// rlung gi dkyil 'khor rnam par bsam// yi ge yaM las yang dag 'byung // sngo ba'i mdog can gzhulta bu'o//
107b2: rgyal mtshan gyis ni mtshan par bsgom// dud pa'i phreng ba khyad par dmigs// de yi steng du yi ge raM// me yi dkyil 'khor mchog dam pa// grwa gsum ba la dmar ba'i mdog/ 'bar ba'i phreng
107b3: 'bar bas khyab/ nyi ma bye ba 'od mtha' yas// rdo rjes mtshan pas bsgom par bya// de yi steng du chu nyid de// yi ge baM mchog las byung ba// du shar yi mdog 'dra ba// zla ma la 'od zer phreng ba can// de yi steng
107b4: dras dkyil 'khor/ / laM las byung ba ser po ste// zur bzhi pa la rdo rjes mtshan// 'od zer ser po khyab par 'khrigs// rnal 'byor de steng bsgom pa ni// ri rab lhun po mchog gyur pa// zung bzhi pa la rin
107b5: chen bzhi/ / rtse mo brgyad kyis rnam par mdzes// yi ge suM las legs par byung // 'od zer gzi brjid mchog dam pa'o// de yi steng du bsam pa ni// bruM ni dkar po las byung ba// de steng 'khor lor bcas
107b6: pa dag/ khang pa brtsegs pa rnam par bsam// zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni rnam par brgyan// dra ba dra phyed kyis mdzes shing // ba dan phreng bas rnam par brgyan// zur gyi cha ni thams
107b7: cad dang / / sgo dang sgo khyud mtshams rnams su// rdo rje rin chen gyis brgyan cing // phyi yi dkyil 'khor thig gdab bo// de yi nang du 'khor lo ni// brgyad po dkar po'i mdog can la// de yi dbus su
107b8: pad ma che/ / sna tshogs 'dab ma brgyad pa la// lte ba ge sar gyis khyab pa// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// rdo rje sems dpa' rigs mar bcas// dkar po ser po de bzhin te// dmar dang ljang khu

108a1: zhal bzhipa/ zhi zhing dgod dang khro ba dang // rnam par 'gyur ba shin tu 'jigs// rdo rje dril bus mnyam par ldan// mdung dang dgra sta cang te 'drang // gri gugazod pa kha rtag/ tshangs pa'i lpags pa
108a2: gos su mnabam/ / zhags pa tshangs pa'i mgu bo dag/ phyag ni bcu gnyis de bzhin te// sems pa'i dkyil mo krung du bzhugs// ba rgyan thong po'i cod pan can// rgyun rnapas thams cad yongs su rdzogs
108a3: dpe 'byang mtshan dang yang dag ldan/ / thugs kyi ye shes dam tshig can// cod pan rdo rje 'dzin pa yin// ji ltar thabs bzhin shes rab de// phyag rgya lnga po byin gyis brlabs// rigs kyi dbye bas phye nas ni//
108a4: rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug mchog/ bde ba chen po'i thabs sbyor bas// sku ni gnyis su med par thim// mnyam pa nyid las byung ba'i sku// mkha' 'gro'i 'khor ni dpa' bo dang // rnal 'byor ma dang
108a5: bcas par byung / / g.yas pasas g.yon brgyang tshul gyis bzhugs// dkar sngos dmar zhal mdog ste// 'khor lo dril bus 'khyud pa'i phyag/ sngar gyi rdo rje sems sogs pa'i// phyag mtshan rim pa
108a6: 'dzin pa yin/ / thod pa'i phreng ba'i rgyan dang ni// mgo bo'i phreng ba rlon pas spud// zla ba phyed pa rab 'dzin pa// zhal bzhi mche ba rnam par gtsigs// spyan gsum pa phyag bcu gnyis pa/ tshangs pa
108a7: la sogs pa'i lha zhabs kyis gnon pa/ nA ra'i rus pa'i rgyan can/ rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbu rgyan can/ phyag rgya drug gis brgyan pa/ stag gi lpags pa bgos pa/ sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro mas
108a8: pang du 'khyud pa/ sku la thod pa dang gdug pa la sdigs 'dzub kyis 'khor lo 'dzin pas 'khyud pa/ byin pa gnyis kyis 'khrel pa/ bde ba dang dgyes pas myos pa/ khams dang / phung po dang / skye mched

108b1: rnams byid gyis brlabs te sa'i khams ni la ste lhung byed ma'o/ / chu'i khams ni ma ste gsod byed ma'o// mo'i khams ni nga ste 'gugs byed pa'o// rlung gi khams ni ye skyeg dbyi dbang phyug ma'o//
108b2: rnam mkha'i khams ni kha ba sde pad pa'i drab ma'o// se ba dang / sngo dang / dmang ba dang / dung kha dang / sngo ba'o// gzugs kyi byung po rnam par snang mdzad/ oM mdog dkar po// tshor pa'i drung bapo rdo rje n+da
108b3: chen te oM gser gtso ma'i mdog lta bu/ 'du shes hri ste pad mgar gyi dbang phyug dmar po// 'du byed rdo rje rgyal po ste ho ljang khu/ rnam par shes pa rdo rje sems dpa' ste hUM dkar po// de bzhin
108b4: gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid ni dpal he ru ka'i ste hi mdog nag po/ / mig bru ste gti mug rdo rje dkar po// rna ba hUM zhe sdang rdo rje ste nag po'o// sA ni khaM phrag dog rdo rje ste ser po'o// ngag chags pa
108b5: rdo rje ste a dmar po'o/ / reg pa ni ser sna rdo rje haM ljang khu'o// skye mched thams cad dbang phyug rdo rje ste ha dkar po'o// lus ni b+h+rUM ste dkar po'o// ngag ni a ste dmar po'o// yid ni oM ste sngon po'o// de ltar
108b6: lus ngag yid gsum gyi bar byin gyis brlab cing dmigs so/ / de la shar gyi mdab ma'i mkha' 'gro ma ni sku mdog sngon po'o// lho phyogs kyi mdab ma la lA ma ni ljang gu ste// sngobasangs so// nub phyogs kyi
108b7: 'dab ma la dum skyes ma dmar mo/ / byang gi 'dab mal gzugs can ma gser gyi mdog ser skya zhal gcig pa/ phyag bzhi pa/ spyan gsum pa/ skra grol ba/ phyogs kyi gos 'chang ba/ g.yas brkyang bas
108b8: gnas pa/ 'jigs pa'i rnam par 'gyur ba/ phyag rgya lngas rnam par brgyan pa/ thod pa dang khaM T+wAM ga dang / cang te'u dang / gri gug 'dzin pa/ zhal gdong rjes su chags pas gnas pa/ dgyes pa'i chags

109a1: pas lta zhing reg pa'o/ / mtshams bzhir bdud rtsi lnga'i bum pa'i steng du byang chub kyi sems kyis gang ba'i snod bzhi gzhag go/ shar du pre ta pu ring stobs po che dang / 'khor lo'i shugs can
109a2: mnag po/ / byang du gri ha de ba ta rarang rdo rje rin chen dang / dum skyes ma ser po/ nub tu so raSh+Tar rtas grin dang / chang 'tshong ma dmar po'o// lhor su ba ran dri bar nam mkha'i snying po dang / 'khor lo'i goH
109a3: ma ljang khu'o/ / mer nA ga rang dpal khrag 'thung dang / rab dpa' mo dmar po'o// bden bral du sin du rang pad ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang / stobs chen ma ste zla ba dang ser skya'o// rlung phyogs na ma ru
109a4: tar rnam par snang mdzad dang / 'khor los bsgyur ma dud kha'i mdog can/ dbang ldan du ku lu ltar rdo rje sems dpa' dang / brtson 'grus chen mo dkar po'o// stobs po che lo sogs pa'i dpa' bo na/
109a5: zhal gcig pa/ phyag bzhi pa/ ral pa'i dbu rgyan 'chang ba/ phyag gnyis la 'khor lo dang / dril bus 'khyud pa/ phyag gzhan la kha T+wAM ga dang cang te'u 'dzin pa/ phyag rgya lngas brgyan pa/ g.yas
109a6: brkyang bas bzhugs pa'o/ / 'khor lo'i shugs can ma la sogs pa'i lha mo ni gdong gcig pa/ phyag gnyis pa/ thod pa dang / sdigs 'dzub 'khor lo 'dzin pas 'khyud pa/ spyan gsum pa/
109a7: drag po'i gzugs can/ skra grol ba/ gcer bu gnyis su med par sbyor bar mnyam par gnas pa// phyogs kyi gos can ma mgrin pa'i nor bu dang / gdu pu dang / dpung rgyan dang / rna cha dang / tshangs pA
109a8: skur pa dang / mgul rgyan dang / mgo'i phreng ba dang / g.yer khas 'og pag byas pa/ shar dang / byang dang / nub dang / lho'i sgor khra gdong ma dang / 'ug gdong ma dang / khyi gdong ma dang / phag gdong ma

109b1: rnams so/ / me dang / bden bral dang / rlung dang / dbang ldan du ni gshin rje bsreg ma dang / gshin rje'i pho nya mo dang / gshin rje mche ba ma dang / gshin rje 'joms ma rnams so// ji ltar mkha' 'gro ba
109b2: bzhin khrag dong ma la sogs pa'i dbye ba yang de bzhin no/ / mtshams kyi lha mo gzugs gnyis pa/ yid 'phrog pa'i tshul can/ yi dgas kyi gdan la bzhugs pa/ drag po chen po thugs rjes
109b3: sems can gyi don mdzad pa'o/ / dpa' bo 'di dag thams cad kyang dpral bar 'khor lo'i phreng ba can no// 'di dag ni sku'i 'khor los 'og na gnas pa'o// bcom ldan 'das dkyil 'khor la
109b4: bzhugs te/ dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma rnam pa sna tshogs pa chags pa'i mig gis lta zhing / sna tshogs ro bcud bde baM ste// chags pa'i bde ba chen po ni// de ring du ni bdag gis rnyed// a
109b5: la la ho dgyes pa che/ / bde ba chen po de nyid yin// bde gshegs lha ni shin tu mdzes// glu 'di blangs pa tsam gyis ni// dga' bas srid pa dag las grol// bde bar gshegs pa dag pa che/
109b6: dkyil 'khor du ni rnam par brtag/ mngal skyes klu'i dbang gyur par// rnal 'byor kha cig 'dod pa yin// mngal skyes sku yi 'khor lo ste// ye shes dkyil 'khor bltas nas ni// mchod dang bstod
109b7: pa byas nas gzhug/ spro dang bsdu ba'i sbyor ba yin// dngos dang dngos med rnam par bsgom// rnal 'byor pa yis ma nor bar// bzlas pa khri 'am 'bum du bzla// skye ba can gyi lus grub ste// mkha'
109b8: la spyod par the tsom med/ / oM shI ka~M ya/ da~M ka ru ru lu bruM hUM phaT/ DA ki nI dzA la sam ba ra swA hA/ snying po'o// oM b+hUM haM ho b+hU hUM phaT/ nye ba'i snying po'o// oM bud d+ha DA ki na bai ro tsa nI ye b+hU hUM phaT swA hA/

110a1: snying po'o// oM b+h+rUM satwa bud d+haDA ki nI ye/ hUM bruM hU~M phaT swA hA// nye ba'i snying po'o// oM g+h+ra~M ma hA ba la k+ShAM hUM hU~M phaT/ oM tsakra be ge hUM hUM phaT/ oM ha ra da na badz+ra haM hUM hUM phaT/ oM kha Na Da ra
110a2: hUMhU~M phaT/ oM ha ya gribadz+ra hU~M hA phaT/ a shaN nA ya hUM hU~M phaT/ oM hUM a kA shU gar+b+hats+tshats+tsha phaT/ oM tsakr-i wa mr-in+d+ra ye hU~M hUM b+h+yaH/ oM ka le shrI hi draka ki li hUM hUM phaT/ oM sAr bI ra hU~M d+hu phaT/
110a3: si la pa da ma na ra dre shwa ra si li hUM hUM phaT/ oM ma hA ba le hUM hUM phaT/ oM hi li bai ro tsa na hi li hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM tsakra warti nI ye hUM hU~M phaT/ oM d+hi li badz+ra satwa d+hi li hUM hUM phaT/ oM ma hA bIr+ye hUM hUM phaT/ oM kA kA s+yai
110a4: hUM hUM phaT/ oM u lu ka s+ye hUM hUM phaT/ oM shwa na s+yai hUM hUM phaT/ oM sU ka ra s+yai hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM ya ma da Di hU~M hUM phaT/ oM ya ma du ti hUM hUM phaT/ oM ya ma daMSh+Ti hUM hU~M phaT/ oM ya ma ma thA ni hUM hU~M phaT/ oM DA
110a5: ni hUM hU~M phaT/ oM lA me hUM hUM phaT/ oM khaN+Da ro ha hUM hUM phaT/ oM rU ba nA hUM hUM phaT// mkha' 'gro mkha' 'gro ma sogs la// thog ma pad ma la gnas nas// mchod pa bya zhing sngags kyang bzla/
110a6: rtag tu bdag nyid lnga po dag/ 'grub par 'gyur gyi gzhan du min// zhi ba dngon dbang nyid dang // rmongs par bya dang gnon pa dag/ sku yi mkha' 'gros byed pa ste// dngos grub dam pa 'grub par 'gyur// /
110a7: dam tshig can dag langs dus su// yan lag drug tu bsgom bya ba// rnam dag ye shes mig gis ni// dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnams blta// oM haHsAng ka la/ na ma hi mgo bo la/ swA hA hUM spyi gtsug la/
110a8: oM bo Sha Ta he go cha'o// d+hU hUM ho mig la'o// phaT ha~M yan lag kun gyi mtshon cha'o// dkar dang ser dang dmar ba dang // sngo dang ljang khu dung kha dang // yid kyis mdog drug rnam par bsgom// oM ba

110b1: sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro ma ste lte ba la'o/ / haM ya~M ya mi ni ste snying ga'i la'o// jo mo rmongs byed ma ste kha la'o// tra~M sdig yo byed ma la ste mgo bo la'o// hUM hU~M rmag byed ma ste spyi gtsug la'o// phaT na ma tsa
110b2: Nig ste/ yan lag thams cad kyi mtshon cha'o// dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma thams cad// mkha' 'gro rnams ni bzhugs nas kyang // rang gi lha'i sbyor ba yis/ mas marnam par btag/ 'chim sa
110b3: shes lnga bza' zhing / / ji ltar bde bar gnas par bya// rdo rje dam tshig can mchod nas// dus bzhi dag tu bsnyen pa bya// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las sku'i sdom pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste/
110b4: bzhi pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// gsung gi dkyil 'khor rnam bsgoms te// sngar gyi dkyil 'khor dbus dag tu// gsung gi dkyil 'khor rnam par bsgom// rtsibs brgyad dmar po
110b5: mdog can la/ / nang gi mdab ma snga ma bzhin// rdo rje sems dpa' yongs gyur pa'i// gsung gi mkha' 'gro rnam par bsgom// zhal bzhi phyag ni bcu gnyis pa// g.yas brkyang ba'i gnas pas bzhag/
110b6: pad ma' mkha' 'gro mas 'khyud cing // rtag tu bde ba chel bzhugs// pad ma'i dril bus yang dag 'khyud// dbang phyug chen po'i mgo bsnams shing // dbang phyug chen po'i lpags pa ni// bshus pa
110b7: phyag gnyis kyis brkyang 'dzin/ / lhag ma ni snga ma'i rim pa bzhin du 'gyur ro// dbang phyug chen po'i 'khor rnams ni// zhabs kyis gnon par lta bar bya// dmar dang sngo dang de bzhin ser// g.yon pa
110b8: dkar ba spyan gsum pa/ / ral pa'i dbu rgyan dag gis brgyan// thod pa'i phreng bas dbu la mdzes// zla ba phyed pa 'chang ba dang // cod pan sna tshogs pad mar ldan// mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa dang //

111a1: 'jigs pa'i zhal ni rnam 'gyur zhing // sgeg pa la sogs nyams dang ldan// stag gi lpags pa gos su bstabs// si mgo rlon pa'i phreng ba can// mgul rgyan gdu bur cha dang //
111a2: mgo'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan// mchod phyir thogs dang thal ba ste// phyag rgya drug tu rab tu grags// de dag pha rol phyin drug ste// phyag rgya drug gi rgyas btab pa'o// de'i bang gnas ba
111a3: ldan yum/ / pad ma'i mkha' 'gro ma rang mdog/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis spyan gsum pa// gcer bu dbu skra grol ba ste// dum bus brgyan pa'i ske rags can// bdug pa'i bdud kyi khrag ldan
111a4: pa'i/ / thod pa'i phyag g.yon bsdams pas 'khyud// pad mar ldan pas phyogs kun du// bdug pa kun la sdig 'dzub mdzad// bskal pa'i me ltar gzi brjid 'bar// khrag 'dzag pa la rtag
111a5: tu dgyes/ / byin pa gnyis kyis rnam par 'khyud// bde ba chen po'i thugs rje'i bdag/ dngos grub thams cad rab stsol ba'i// mkha' 'gro ma sogs sngar bshad nams// pad ma'i phyogs kyi gan
111a6: su dgod/ / sngar bshad dbyibs dang kha dog ste// 'on kyang mkha' 'gro ma dkar mo// dus skyes ma ni de bzhin nag/ lha mo gnyis po mdog de bzhin// phyag g.yon kha T+wAM thod pa dang // g.yas na
111a7: cang te'u gri gug 'dzin/ / mtshams ni bzhi po dag tu yang // bum pa'i nang du 'chi med lnga// byang chub sems kyi snod kyang gzhag/ gsung gi 'khor lo'i shar du ka ma ru bar myu gu can dang sa srung ma dkar
111a8: po byang du oM der rdo rje ral pa can dang / / 'jigs byed chen mo dmar po/ nub du kri sha ku nar dpa' bo chen po dang / rlung gi shugs can ma nag po/ lho ru ko sa lar rdo rje hUM mdzad dang / chang 'thung ma nam

111b1: mkha' ltar sngo bsangs/ me'i phyogs su ka leng kar rab tu bzang po dang sngo bsangs ma sar m+b+ha/ bden bral du lam bkar rdo rje bzang po dang rab bzang ma dkar mo/ rlung gi phyogs su kan
111b2: cir 'jigs byed chen po dang / rta rnam ljang ku dbang ldan ste/ hi ma la ra mig mi bzang dang bya gdong ma nam mkha' ltar sngo bsangs so// gsung gi 'khor lo sa la spyod pa'o// myu gu can la sogs
111b3: pa'i dpa' bo ni zhal gcig pa/ phyag bzhi pa spyan gsum pa ral pa dang cod pan dang / dar sbyangs dang ldan pa/ phyag gnyis na pad ma dang / dril bus 'khyud pa/ g.yon pa'i phyag na kha T+wAM ga gas
111b4: na cang te'u phyag rgya lnga la sogs pas brgyan pa g.yas brkyang ba'i gnas pas bzhugs pa'o/ / e ra ba ti la sogs pa/ lha mo rnams ni phyag gnyis pa/ zhal gcig pa thod pa dang ldan pas
111b5: 'khyud cing pad ma dang ldan pas bsdigs 'dzub byed pa/ mgul rgyan dang gdu bu dang dpung rgyan dang rna rgyan dang tshangs pa'i skud pa dang ldan pa'o// thod pa'i phreng bas mgul rgyan cing / g.yer ka
111b6: sgra sgrogs ske rags ldan/ / khwa gdong la sogs dbye ba yis// sngar bshad sgo bsrungs la sogs bzhin// gshin rje la sogs lha mo rnams// mtshams bzhi 'di ltar shes par bya// dpa' ba
111b7: 'di dag thams cad kyang / / dpral bar pad ma'i 'phrong ba can// phung po skye mched khams rnams su// sku gsung thugs su rnam par brtag/ sngar bshad pa'i cho ga bzhin// yi ge rnams ni
111b8: dgod cing bsgom/ / thugs ni AHste dmar po yin// gsung ni oM staM dkar por bshad// rdo rje sku ni hUM yin te// nam mkha' zla ba lta bu'o// dkyil 'khor dag ni thams cad kyang // thams

112a1: cang sbyor zhing bsgoms nas su/ / ye shes 'khor lo de mthong nas// dbang bskur bas ni gzhug par bya// thams cad byung ste thim nas su// thams cad sgom zhing bsam par bya/
112a2: sku gsung thugs kyi rim pa yis// spro bsdu dag gis sbyor bar bya// oM shrI bA ka a a ro li ka hUM phaT/ haM DA ki nI dzA la saM ba ra swA hA/ snying po'o// oM a ro li ka hri hUM phaT/ nye ba'i snying po'o// oM
112a3: pad ma DA ki nI hri hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ snying po'o// oM sarba pad ma DA ki nI ye a hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ nye ba'i snying po'o// oM DA ki nI hUM hUM phaT/ oM lA me hUM hUM phaT/ oM khaN Da ro hi hUM hUM phaT/ oM r+'u bi ni
112a4: hUM hUM phaT/ oM phaT aM ku re ka phaT hUM hUM phaT/ oM ai ra ba ti hUM hUM phaT/ oM da ha badz+ra dza Ta li da ha hUM hUM phaT/ oM ma hA b+hai ra ba hUM hUM phaT/ oM ba tsa ma hA bI ra pa tsa hUM hUM phaT/ oM bA yu be ge hUM/
112a5: hU~M phaT/ oM b+hak+Sha badz+ra hUM kar b+hak+Sha ba sa~M ru d+hi ra an tra mA lA ba la ma bine hUM hU~M phaT/ oM pur b+hak+ta ya~M hUM hUM phaT/ oM gr-id+haswa b+ha dr-i gr-ih+Na sa bat+ta pra ta la g+hA ta b+hU dza gau sar+b+bA ma bA/ tardza ya taH
112a6: ya hUM hUM phaT/ oM sh+yA ma de be hUM hUM phaT/ oM a ka DaD+D+h+ya badz+ra badz+ra b+ha dra a ka DA hUM hUM phaT/ oM su b+ha dre hUM hUM phaT/ oM hrI ma hA b+hai ra ba hI hUM hUM phaT/ oM ha ya kaNe hUM hUM phaT/ oM dz+nyo ya bi ru bA k+Sha dz+nyi hA/
112a7: hUM phaT/ oM kha kha na ne hUM hUM phaT/ oM kA kA s+yai hUM hUM phaT/ oM u lu ka s+yai hUM hUM phaT/ oM shA na s+ye hUM hUM phaT/ oM sA kA rA s+yai hUM hUM phaT/ oM ya ma daM Di hUM hUM phaT/ oM ya ma du ti hUM hUM phaT/ oM ya ma de
112a8: Sh+T+r-i hUM hUM phaT/ oM ya ma maM thA ni hUM hUM phaT// rdo rje dam tshig gi mchod nas// bzlas pa'i cho ga rab tu bya// dgug pa dang ni rgyas pa nyid// sna tshogs las ni 'grub par 'gyur// chos can yid 'ong gyur

112b1: ba ste/ / ngag gi dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur// mchog dang par ma thams cad dang // tha ma thams cad mthar gnas la// de la thams cad gnas pa ste// sna tshogs gdul ba'i mchog dam pa// 'dod
112b2: pa'i chags pas rjes su chags/ / 'dod pa'i dga' bas myos pa dag/ bdag nyid chen po sgrub pa po// de yi dbang du gnas pa yin// sna tshogs pad ma mdzes gnas nas// rnal 'byor chen po rnam
112b3: par spyod/ / b+hur b+hUH'dod chags chos kyi bdag/ bde ba che la rnam par bzhugs// langs pa'i dus su dam tshig ni// dri chen rdo rje chu bza' zhing // chos kyi phung por rdzogs gyur nas// rig pa'i rgyal
112b4: po la sogs 'grub/ / oM haHsnying ka la/ na maHhi mgo la/ swA hA hA a ro la ki spyi gtsug la// po Sha Ta he go cha/ hUM hUM ho mig la'o// phaT haM mtshon cha'o// chos kyi rdo rje dang / rnam par snang mdzad
112b5: dang / / pad ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang // rdo rje 'jigs byed dang rdo rje nyi ma dang rta mchog ste/ dmar ba dang ser ba dang dkar ba dang sngo ba dang dmar ba dang gur gum gyi mdog dang / ljang khu ste bye brag go/
112b6: oM hri pad ma'i mkha' 'gro ma ste/ lte ba la'o// haM yo pad ma ya mi ni dang / hri mau pad ma'i rmongs byed ma dang // hre hr-i pad ma g.yo byad ma dang hAM hAM pad ma skrag byed ma/ phaT haM pad ma tsaN Di ga ste/
112b7: snying kha dang mgo dang spyi gtsug dang mig dang chos kyi mtshon cha rnams so// dmar ba dang sngo ba dang dkar ba dang ser ba dang ljang khu dang / dud pa'i mdog can no// bzlas pa'i dus su dgod pa ste/ ji ltar
112b8: bde bar spyad par bya/ / dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi// go 'phang gnas ni bzhugs pa yin// mnyam par gzhag pas drod 'byung ba// rtse gcig dmigs pas blang bya ste// gsung gi rdo rje ma nyi

113a1: pa nyid/ rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis// chos rnams thams cad rab tu brtag/ rdo rje chu dang rnam snang dang // sbrad rtsi mar dkar ldan cig sbyar// lce'i dam tshig sbyor ba yis// snying po ye shes/
113a2: de nyid do// bdag po dbu rgyan la bsgoms la// ci bde bar ni bza' ba bza'// lha yi gzugs su gyur nas su// 'dod pa'i lha'i bdag por skye// bza' ba 'o ma'i btung ba yis// nang dang rga ba nam pa/
113a3: spangs// sems can rjes su chags pa yi// lha mo glu 'dis bskul ba yis// byang chub ches rnams thams cad kyi// sems can don ni bla med mdzad// brtson 'grus pha rol phyin pa yis// thugs rje/
113a4: bskyed cing bstan par mdzad// gsang ba'i chos ni bstan nas kyang // dag gi dngos grub mchog kyang 'grub// sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir// ji lta bar ni bstan pas grol// de nyid rnal 'byor
113a5: mas bskal nas/ / sna tshogs du ma mang po yi// dam tshig mchod pa ngo mtshar rmad// mig phye nas ni stod pa ni// A ba ra ta ru su ra ta su khA bA hA su kha me tA so khyam ya// sa ma ya ra ma ra ma ho//
113a6: su ra ta sau khya ya tre sa ma tsa ri taM/ su ga ta sAn ta ma ya pra bi kur ba bi kur ba/ su ra ta di ya pad ma dza le/ pra bi dzi ma ba dzi ma ba/ su ra hod su kha pad ma dza le/ bra bi nan ta na ra ta su kha sa
113a7: dan pad ma dza le/ pra bi marda marba su ra ta ma bi sa bi shwa dza le ho ha hUM ha ha ho/ dza ya ma hA su kha su kha te dze ma ya ra ma ra ma ho/ su ra ki tu mu kha ba hUM bi ti d+he dza mu kra dza ya te dza ra/ han ta
113a8: ho ba ra ha/ sa su kha ho/ hUM ho ho su ra to tra rA ga su kha ra ti rI dzin par ma shre ra ti ho/ pa ra ma he tu ma hA su kha he/ su kha ma nu yo na ra pa ra me shwa ra tse/ ho b+ha ga ban ma hA su khaM hUM ho/ ba hUM ba

113b1: ta bi ta bi shwa dz+wa la ra ti bi shra ma ho/ su ra ti su khaM gtsid tra ba ra ma ma ho su kha ha/ su kha ma nu grih+Na ho/ su ra to ud tam san da su khaM a a ro lig/ a ma hA su kha grih+NA ho// klu 'di dag
113b2: ni blangs tsam gyis/ / dga' zhing bde ba yang dag 'dus// bde ba chen po yid 'dod pa// dngos grub kyang ni 'thob par 'gyur// 'khor tshogs chen po byin brlabs nas// dkyil 'khor chen
113b3: po dgyes pa che/ / pad ma dra ba'i sdom pa yin// nges par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma las gsung gi sdom pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// thugs
113b4: kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ste/ / gzhal yas rtseg ma'i dbus dag tu// 'khor lo mchog ni dgod par bya// sngon po'i mdog can gzi brjid che// gsang ba las byung rtsibs brgyad pa/
113b5: de'i dbus su pad ma ni// sna tshogs pad ma ge sar can// 'dab ma brgyad du bshad pa ste// rnam dag gdan du byas pa yin// de yi dbus su zla ba bsgom// der ni zla ba khyab par ni//
113b6: rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che// lha mchog grol zhing bzhengs par gyur// / oM hUM a ma hA su kha a la la ho/ ma hA su ra ta ste// su ra ta mu kha bi yoka su raH
113b7: ud ta ma bo d+hi su khaM/ su kha ma nu sid d+ha ho// su ra ta ba ya so khya ma ya o AHhAM ho/ b+ha ga baM ma hA su kha ud tar ud ta ra/ sarba ud ma so khya ma ya/ hUM a la la ho/ ma hA su kha
113b8: ste/ ba ra ma su khA ma lai du bi bi ud ta mdzal su khaM/ a la la ho/ su ra tos khya ma ya// / bcom ldan bde ba chen po ni// 'khor dang bcas pa mnyam par gzhengs//

114a1: thugs kyi 'khor lo zhal bzhi pa// phyag bcu gnyis pa g.yas brkyang g.yon bskum pa'i zhabs kyis bzhugs pa/ spyan gsum pa// mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa/ sngo ba dang dkar ba dang mer ba dang dmar ba'i zhal/
114a2: rdo rje dang dril bus 'khyud pa/ khyab 'jug gi mgo bo brag na bsnams pa/ khyab 'jug gi lpags brlon pa brkyang nas phyag gzhan gnyis na bsnams pa'o// lhag ma sku'i mkha' 'gro dang mtshungs so// thod pa'i phreng
114a3: can/ mgo'i phreng ba 'chang ba/ mgo'i phreng bas ske rags bcings pa/ rdo rje sems dpa'i dbu rgyan can// zla ba byed pa'i rgyan yang 'chang // sna tshogs rdo rje gcod pan gnon// stag gi lpags pa'i gos su mnabs//
114a4: phyag rgya drug gis rnam par brgyan/ mdun gyi mkha' 'gro ma ni zhal gcig pa/ phyag gnyis pa/ spyan gsum pa/ skra grol ba/ gcer bu dum bus brgyan pa/ ske rags can/ phyag g.yon pa thod pa thogs pas 'khyud pa/
114a5: g.yas pa rdo rje sdig 'dzub can/ ske rags g.yer ka'i sgra sgrogs pa// chos kyi sgra ni yid 'ong ba// 'byung bar 'gyur ba bye ba snyed// chos kyi dbyings te stong pa yin// mnyam pa nyid dang so sor rtog/ bya byed pa yang de bzhin
114a6: bsgom/ / sbyor ba mchog gi dam pa ste// rnam dag legs par brtags nas su// mnyam nyid chos kyi ro gcig byas// 'khor lo la ni rnam par blta// shar gyi mdab mar mkha' 'gro dang // lho phyogs lA ma de bzhin te//
114a7: rab phyogs dum skyes ma dang ri/ byang phyogs gzugs can ma de bzhin// dkar dang ser dang de bzhin dmar// ljang khu'i mdog can mchog dam pa// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// cang te'u gri gug de bzhin te// spyar gsum pa la bzhin
114a8: rnam bskur/ / gcer bu skra grol 'jigs pa can// g.yas brkyang pa'i gnas pas bzhugs// 'dod pa'i chags pas legs par myos// cung zad ngo tsha'i mig zur dang // nu ma rab rgyas dga' ba 'dzin// zhal gyi mche ba cung zad

114b1: gtsigs/ / phyag rgya lnga'i sa rgya yang gdab// mtshams bzhi ru ni bum pa dag/ ye shes bdud rtsi gang bas dgod// de steng byang chub sems kyi ni// yongs su ga bar gzhag par bya// thugs kyi 'khor lo'i shar phyogs su// pu lir
114b2: bal ya na thod pa'i dum bu dang / rab gtum ma ste dkar po'o// byang du dz+wa la d+ha ran keng rus chen po dang / gtum mig ma ste ser po'o// nub tu u Tin na keng rus can dang / 'od ldan ma ste dmar po'o// lho phyogs su ar bu
114b3: den mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa dang / sna chen ma ste ljang khu'o// me'i phyogs na god pa rin lha dgra dang / dpa' bo'i blo gros ma na mkha'i mdog can ma'o// bden bral dur mo shwa dren 'od dpag med dang / me'u thung ma ste dkar
114b4: skra'o/ / rlung gi phyogs na de bi ko Ta na rdo rje'i 'od dang / lang ka'i dbang phyug ma ste ljang khu dang mu tig lta bu'o// dbang ldan nam la be na rdo rje lus dang shing grib ma ste pad ma dang ser skya'o// thugs kyi 'khor lo nam mkha' la spyod
114b5: pa'o/ / thod pa'i dum bu la sogs pa'i dpa' bo ni gdong gcig pa/ phyag bzhi pa/ ral pa'i cod pan can thugs rjes khro zhing 'jigs pa rdo rje dang dril bu'i phyag gnyis kyis 'khyud pa// g.yon pa dang g.yas pa'i phyag
114b6: gnyis la kha T+wAM ga dang / cang te'u 'chang ba/ phyag rgya lnga yis brgyan pa/ g.yas brkyang bas bzhugs pa'o// rab gtum ma la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams ni zhal gcig pa/ phyag gnyis pa sdigs 'dzub kyi thod pa
114b7: 'dzin pa/ spyan gsum pa/ ser skya'i gzugs can no// skra grol ba/ gzugs gnyis pa gnyis su med par mnyam par ldan pa/ phyogs kyi gos can rnam par rol pa/ mgrin pa'i nor bu dang / gdu bu dang / dpung
114b8: rgyan dang / rna cha dang tshangs pa'i skud pa dang / mgul rgyan dang mgo bo'i phreng ba dang g.yer ka'i ske rags can/ sgo dang zur gyi lha mo rnams// khwa gdong gshin rje sreg la sogs// ji lta mkha' 'gro'i mdog bzhin du

115a1: khra gdong la sogs de bzhin no/ / mchoms rnams lha mo de bzhin te// gzugs gnyis 'dzin cing yid 'phrog pa'o// phyag sogs de ltar bsgoms nas ni// dngos grub thams cad rab tu stsol// ye shes 'khor
115a2: lo de mthong nas/ mchod dang bstod dang dbang yang bskur// bsgom pa rtse gcig byas na ni// bdag med ma'i go 'phang gnas// snying po ye shes dam tshig ni// sgrub pos 'dod pa kun gyi phyir// sku gsung thugs la rnam bkod
115a3: nam/ sangs rgyas mchog ni rnam par spro// rtag tu dam tshig brkyang bya zhing // ye shes lnga yi bdud rtsi chu/ dam tshig mchod pa'i sbyor ba yis// cho ga bzhin du bzlas pa bya// oM shrI tsing Ta DA ka d+h+wi ka a khaM hUM hUM phaT/ DA ki rI dzA la saM ba ra NA
115a4: hA phaT/ snying po'o// oM biHha ha hU hUM phaT/ nye ba'i snying po'o// oM badz+ra DA ki nI hUM hUM phaT/ nye ba'i snying po'o// oM sarba badz+ra DA ki nI ye badz+ra bar+d+ha nI ye hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ snying po dang nye ba'i snying po'o// oM DA ki nI ye hUM hUM phaT/ oM lA me hUM
115a5: hUM phaT/ e khaN Da ro he rU hU~M phaT/ e rA bi ni hU hU phaT/ oM kar kha na Da ka pA lI na kar hUM hUM phaT/ oM pra tsaN De hUM hUM phaT/ oM ku ru ma hA kang ka la ku ru hUM hUM phaT/ oM tsaN DA kI ye hUM hU~M phaT/ oM pan ta kang kA la Sha nad+hats+tsha
115a6: hUM phaT/ oM pra b+ha ba ti hUM hUM phaT/ oM trA sa ya pa ka ti daMSh+Ti Na trA sa ya hUM hUM phaT/ oM ma hA nA se hUM hUM phaT/ oM k+Shi pa ya su ra bai ri ne k+Sho b+ha ya hUM hUM phaT/ oM bI ri ma ti hUM hUM phaT/ oM dze a mi ta b+ha hreM hUM hUM phaT/ oM khar
115a7: ba ri hUM hU~M paT/ oM dzaHbadz+ra pra bahraHhU~M hU~M phaT/ oM lang ke shwa ri hUM hUM phaT/ oM pheM badz+ra de ha he pheM hUM hU~M phaT/ oM dru ma tsha ye hUM hUM phaT/ oM kA kA s+ye hU~M hUM phaT/ oM u lu ka s+ye hUM hUM phaT/ oM shwa na sne hUM hUM phaT/ oM su kAr s+ye
115a8: hUM hUM phaT/ a ya ma daM Di hUM hUM phaT/ oM ya ma du ti hUM hUM phaT/ oM ya ma daMSh+Ti hUM hUM phaT/ oM ya ma ma thA ni hUM hUM phaT// / bzlas pa bsdom par ldan byas nas// spro dang bsdu ba'i rim pa yis// sngags pa myur du 'grub/

115b1: pa ste/ rdo rje sems dpa'i go 'phang rnyed// mnyam pa'i dam tshig dam tshig mchog/ thugs kyi rnyed pas khyab pa la// rnal 'byor chen po rnam par spyad// mkha' la spyod pa nyid thob 'gyur// 'di na khams gsum thams
115b2: cad du/ / go 'phang mchog la legs par zhugs// langs pa'i dus su dam tshig can// yan lag drug tu sbyor ba bshad// oM haHsnying ka ste/ rdo rje sems dpa' dkar po/ na ma hi mgo la ste rnam par snang mdzad ser po
115b3: swA hA hUM spyi gtsug la pad ma gar gyi dbang phyug ste zla ba dang ser skya'o/ / bo Sha Ta he go cha ste he ru ka na mkha'i mdog can no// hUM hUM ho mig la ste rdo rje nyi ma gser bcom lta bu'o// phaT ha ni yan lag thams cad kyi mtshon cha
115b4: ste rta mchog ljang khu ser skya'o/ / aM paM lte ba la ste/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro na mkha' dang ser skya'o// ha yau snying kha la ya mi ni dkar mo'o// hri mo kha la ste rmongs byed ma dmar po'o// hreM tri mgo la ste g.yo byed ma ser po'o// oM
115b5: hUM hUM spyi gtsug la ste sreg byed ma sngon po'o/ / phaT phaT yan lag thams cad kyi mtshon cha ste tsaN Di ka dmar ser ro// ji ltar bde bar cho ga bzhin du spyod cing gangs so// 'gro ba du ma'i bsam pa la// thugs kyi rdo rje tshul
115b6: can 'di/ gnyis med sbyong ba mtha' yas pa// srid pa kun gyi dngos por gnas// dri ma med cing nga rgyal med// yi ge med cing brjod du med// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma las thugs kyi sdom pa dang bla ma'i bsnyen
115b7: bkur gyi le'u ste drug pa'o/ / // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ dkyil 'khor dam tshig mchog gyur pa// 'dod pa'i gsang ba kun ster ba// shin du gsang ba'i dngos grub stsol// sgrub pa po la phan pa'i phyir// bsgrub pa'i don
115b8: ni bshad par bya/ / dkyil 'khor snga ma'i dbus su ni// pad ma 'dab ma brgyad pa bri// sna tshogs mdog can ge sar bcas// 'dod pa kun gyi 'bras bu ster// de yi dbus su yi ge hUM// rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par bsgom//

116a1: mtshan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs// dpe byad kun gyis rnam par brgyan// dgyes pa chen po'i sbyor ba yis// gnyis med gnyis su med pa'i mchog/ byang chub sems kyi rgyu las ni// byang chub zla ba dri med pa/
116a2: mthong lnga mo langs nas ni// grwa 'di yis ni bsul bar byed// la cig rol cig dgyes pa 'o// bde ba chen po'i rdo rje ni// bde ba chen po rol nyid las// 'di nyid du ni bzhengs su gsol// a la la hong gyes pa che// khyod na
116a3: bde ba'i mchog yin te/ / khyod kyi zhal ni khums tsam gyis// bdag gis 'dir ni ro gcig rnyed// kye ma'o bcom ldan bde chen dgyes// oM rdo rje sems dpa' legs dgyes khyod// ro dang ro mchog thams cad de// dgyes pa chen
116a4: po bde ba rnams/ / rtag par dngos grub kun la yang // rol cig rol cig lha mo la// rnal 'byor ma ni thams cad dang // bcom ldan rdo rje chen po ni// lha mo'i pad ma dgyes la rol// hUM a la la ho dgyes pa che// bcom
116a5: ldan 'dod la dgyes pa khyod/ / 'dod pa'i dngos grub legs par stsol// pad ma mchog la dgyes par rol// oM a la la ho dgyes pa che// tshogs kyi bde bas du ba rtag tu// rdo rje mchog ni 'dzin pa yis// pad ma'i
116a6: zhal mchog bye ba yi/ / pad ma la ni rol par mdzod// ji ltar bung bas sbrang rtsi bzhin// lha rnams pad ma nyid la rol// kye ma'o grogs po dgyes chen 'dir// rdo rje mchog ni bde bar sbyar// dus kun bde ba 'di mdzad cig/
116a7: dering dus ni 'di nyid du// yang dag byang chub 'dus pa yin// a la la ho dgyes pa che// bde chen kun du dgyes mchog rol// a la la ho dgyes pa che// glu 'di dag gis bskul nas su// mnyam nyid las ni bcom ldan
116a8: dpal/ / sdom pa'i rdo rje bzhengs par gyur// 'khor dang bcas par gzigs nas ni// bcom ldan 'das ni zhal bzhi pa// sngo ba dang ser ba dang dmar ba dang / ljang khu'i zhal te spyan gsum pa/ phyag bcu gnyis pa/

116b1: g.yas brkyang pas 'jigs byed chen po dang du mtshan zhabs 'og tu mnan pa/ phyag gnyis rdo rje dril bu bsnams pas dam tshig rdo rje phag mo la 'khyud pa/ phyag gzhan gnyis po sna tshogs stag gi lpags pa 'dzin
116b2: pa/ g.yas pa'i gsum pan cangad te'/ bzhi pa la dgra sta/ lnga pa la gri grag/ drug pa la rdo rje mdung bsdams pa/ phyag g.yon pa'i gsum pan rdo rje kha T+wAMg/ bzhi pa la khrag gis bkang ba'i thod pa/ lAb la rdo rje
116b3: zhags pa/ drug pa la bdud bzhi'i mgo bo bsdams pa'o// ral pa'i cod pan rgyan cha can// dbu la thod pa'i phreng ba 'chang // zla ba phyed pa dbu la 'dzin// dbu la sna tshogs rdo rjes mnan// 'jigs pa'i mche ba rnam
116b4: myur zhal/ / sgeg pa la sogs nyams dang ldan// stag gi lpags pas gos su mnabs// mi yi mgo bo'i phreng ba 'dzin// mgrin nor gdu bu rna cha dang // mgo yi nor bus rnam par brgyan// tshangs pa'i skud pa thal ba
116b5: ste/ phyag rgya drug tu rab tu grags// de'i bang na bcom ldan ma// dam tshig rdo rje phag mo ni// sku mdog de dang 'dra bar bya// zhal cig pa la phyag gnyis pa// spyan gnyis pa la skra grol ba// gcer bu ska rags 'og bag gis/
116b6: rnam par brgyad pa/ phyag g.yon pas 'khrud pa ste// bdud kyi khrag gis yongs su gang ba'i thod pa bsdams pa// g.yas pa na sdigs 'dzub rdo rje dang bcas pas phyogs bcur sdigs par byed pa/ bskal pa'i ma
116b7: yi gzi brjid can/ / khrag la dgyes shing zhal nas 'dzag/ byin pa gnyis kyis mnyam par 'khyud// thugs rje chen po'i bdag nyid can// chos kun gnas ni dge ba yi// a li ka li las byung ba// rnam par rtog
116b8: pa med pa ste/ / chos dang chos min rnam par spangs// pad 'dab lha mo dgod pa yis// dngos grub thams cad rab tu stsol// mkhA'agro ma dang lA ma dang // dum skyes ma dang gzugs can ma// g.yon phyogs bskor

117a1: ba'i dgod pa yis/ / rnal 'byor pa la dngos grub stsol// gnag cing ser la de bzhin dmar// ljang khu drag po'i gzugs can te// thams cad zhal gsum phyag drug pa/ spyan gsum g.yas brkyang gnas
117a2: pas bzhugs/ / gcer bu dbu skra grol ba ste// bdud bzhi zhabs kyis gnon pa dang // chags shing zhen pas myos pa dang // thod pa dag gi dbu rgyan can// phyag rgya lngas ni rnam par brgyan// garag cing sngo la ldang ba
117a3: dang / shin tu 'jigs shing sdang mig can// ser zhing gnag la ljang khu ste// snying rje'i ro ni yongs su rdzogs// dmar zhing gnag la ldang ba dang / sgeg pa la sogs nyams kyis 'khor// ldang zhing gnag la ser
117a4: ba dang / / 'jam zhing khro bas 'jigs pa dang // thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// g.yon pa cang te'u gri gug ste// mgo bo rdo rje mdung g.yas na// mtshams ni bzhi po dag tu yang // bum pa bdud rtsi lnga yi chus// yongs su gang
117a5: ba'i steng du yang / / byang chub sems kyi gang sdod gzhug/ khwa gdong la sogs lha mo rnams// g.yas brkyang pa'i gnas pas bzhugs// gnag dang sngo bsangs dmar ser skya// zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa// spyan
117a6: gsum drag po'i gzugs can la/ / skra grol ba yis rnam par brgyan// thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan// gcer bu yi dgas gdan du mnan nod pa'i snying rjes rnam par myos// g.yon
117a7: par mgo bo kha TA ga/ g.yas na thod pa gri gug go// mtshams ni bzhi po dag tu yang // gshin rje sreg sogs mkha' 'gro ma// zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa// g.yas brkyang pa yi gnas pas bzhugs// spyan gsum
117a8: bal yi dgas gdan/ / skra grol ba yang rab tu 'jigs// thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan// gcer bu sna tshogs gzugs can la// dga' zhing bde bas rnam par myos// g.yon la thod pa kha T+wAM ga/

117b1: g.yas la cang te'u gri gug ste// g.yon nas skor zhing dgod byas na// mtshams kyi dngos grub stsol bar 'gyur// khra gdong la sogs sgor dgod pa// g.yas nas bskor zhing dgod par bya// khams dang skye mched phung po rnams//
117b2: sku gsung thugs su rnam par bsgom// sngar bshad rim pa'i sbyor ba yis// cho ga bzhin du dgod par bya// dbang che dang ni chu dang ni// me dang rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi// de'i dbus su dgod pa ni// sa sogs bzhi po dag yin no// lha
117b3: byi ma dang gsod ma nyid/ / 'gugs byed ma dang gar ma dag/ de nyid nam mkha'i khams yin te// pad ma'i dra ba stong pa yin// gzugs ni rnam par snang mdzad yin// tshor ba rdo rje nyi ma yin// 'du shes gar dbang rgyal po ste// dru
117b4: byed rdo rje rgyal po yin/ / rnam shes rdo rje sems dpa' ste// bde gshegs kun nyid he ru ka/ mig ni gti mug rdo rje ste// rna ba zhe sdang rdo rje yin// swA ni phrag dog rdo rje ste// lce ni chags pa rdo rje yin// lus ni ser sna rdo rje'o// skye mched/
117b5: kur dbang rdo rje'o// hUM ni thugs kyi rdo rje ste// AHzhes bya ba gsung du 'gyur// oM ni sku yi rdo rje ste/ he ni rdo rje ye shes yin// lus sogs rim pa'i sbyor ba yis// dngos po thams cad rnam par bsgom// bde ba'i chags pa
117b6: bcom ldan 'das/ / chags pa med pa'ang de bzhin te// ye shes 'khor lo de mthong nas// mchod dang bstod dang dbang yang bskur// rjes su chags pa'i sbyor ba dag/ 'jug pas mnyam pa'i bcud du 'gyur// dngos dang
117b7: dngos med rnam bsgoms na/ / spros dang bsdu ba'i sbyar byas nas// sbyor ba'i dam tshig mchod pa yis// cho ga bzhin du bzlas par bya// oM shriH badz+ra he he ru ga hU hUM phaT/ DA ki rI dzA la sa ma ba ra swA hA/ snying po'o// oM hrIHha ha
117b8: hUM hUM phaT/ nye ba'i snying po'o// oM badz+ra bai re tsa nI ye hU hU phaT/ swA hA/ oM sarba bud d+ha DA ke rI ye hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ phag mo'i snying po dang nye ba'i snying po'o// oM DA ki nI hU hUM phaT swA hA/ e lA me hU hUM phaT swAhA/ mo Sha/ Na Da ro he hU hUM phaT/

118a1: swA hA/ oM rA pi ni ye hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM kA kA s+ye hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM u lu ka s+ye hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM shA na s+ye hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM su ka ra s+ye hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM ya ma da Di hUM hUM phaT/ oM ya ma du ti hUM hUM/
118a2: phaT/ a ya ma da shrI hUM hUM phaT/ oM ya ma ma thA nI hUM hUM phaT/ spros dang bsdu ba'i sbyor ba yis// bsgom pa mchog ni bsgom par bya// 'di ni rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis// mchog tu gsang ba smras pa yin// bcu drug
118a3: cha ni yongs rdzogs pa/ / sngags dang gsang sngags kun gyi gtso// bsgom pa'i dus las langs nas ni// go cha gnyis ni rnam par dgod// oM ha rdo rje sems dpa' snying kha la// na ma hi rnam par snang mdzad mgol//
118a4: swA hA hUM pad ma gar gyi dbang phyug spyi gtsug la/ bau Sha Ta he khrag 'thung ste dpung pa la'o// hUM hUM ho rdo rje nyi ma ste mig la'o// phaT haM rta mchog ste yan lag thams cad kyi mtshon cha'o// oM baM rdo rje 'phag mo ste lte ba la'o//
118a5: ha yai ya mi ni ste snying pa la'o// hriM mo rmongs byed ma ste lce la'o// hr-i hri g.yo byed ma ste mgo bo la'o// hUM hUM mrag byed ma ste spyi gtsug la'o// phaT haM gtum mo ste yan lag thams cad kyi mtshon ra'o// 'di ltar dngos dang
118a6: dngos med mnyam/ / thams cad chos su ro gcig ste/ mnyam pa nyid la rnam par bzhugs// mnyam pa'i ye shes lnga po 'di/ rnal 'byor dam tshig can gyis skyongs// dus bzhi'am yang na dus gsum du// ci tsam nus
118a7: pa bsrung bar bya/ / 'di ni gsang ba'i mchog yin te// gang la yang ni bstan mi bya// mngon par brjod pa'i rlung bram chen po las sdom pa'i dam tshig bstan pa ste le'u bdun pa'o// // de nas cho ga'i gzhung bzhin
118a8: bshad/ / pad ma 'dab brgyad legs par mdzes// sna tshogs 'dab ma yid 'ong ba// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ pad ma'i rgyal po rnam par bsam// lte bar sna tshogs rdo rje ste// rdo rje rtse mo lnga pa'o// de pa lte ba'i
