162a2: ma'i me tog dang mtshungs pa/ / phyag brgyad pa la zhal bzhi pa// 'jigs shing rab tu 'jigs par mdzad// g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis bzhugs// spyan gsum rnal 'byor ma'i gtso// zhal gdong g.yon dkar
162a3: g.yas dmar te/ / steng gi zhal ni ser la mdzes// dpa' bo thod pa'i phreng ba can// sangs rgyas lnga yi byin brlabs can// stag gi lpags pa gos su mnabs// mgo bo'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan// 'jigs
162a4: khyed dang ni dus mtshan dag/ / zhabs kyis pad mar gnon par bzhugs// rdo rje dril bu mnyam pas 'khyud// pag mo yi ni byon pas 'khrol// gnyis med stor ba mnyam ldan pas// dbu skra grong phyogs gos can// sku
162a5: mdog mnyam zhing mtshungs par ldan/ dum bu'i rkyen gyi ska rags can// de yi zhal dang phyag mtshan can// rnal 'byor dngos grub rab tu stsol// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// rgyal ba'i lpags pa steng du ste// tho ba mdung ste gzhan du/
162a6: ni// tshangs pa'i mgo bo brgyan pa la// zla ba byed bzhi pa 'dzin// sna tshogs rdo rje dbul brgyan// phyag rgya drug gis sul brgyan// rdo rje mtshan ma dag gis bergyan// rdo rje phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// 'og pa gdag gis mu reg
162a7: byas/ / dpung brgyan rdo rjes mtshan pa ste// sngags pa'i gtso bos gsang sngags ni// 'di ltar cho ga'i snying pogs// phag mo bde bar gnas pa ni// rgyal ba'i lpags pa rnam par sangs// bag mo rgyal ba'i mdza
162a8: sogs las/ / cang te'u gri gug rnams kyis brgyan// bcom ldan 'das ni lte ba'i dbus// pad ma 'dabargyad yid 'ong ba// sna tshogs pad ma mdog mdzes la thams cad nam dag mchog dam pa// shar gyi 'dab sogs

162b1: phyogs la/ / mkha' 'gro ba sogs pazhi po dag // gang du mkha' 'gro ma grwa // byung dul mu de bzhin te// nab tu dru smras pa yin no// drug zugs can ma yin te/ sngo dang mer dang de bzhin dam ldang
162b2: khwa dang ni bzhi pa'o/ / zhal bzhi pa la phyag brgyad pa// spyan gsum drag po gzi brjid can// dkyil mo dkrung na byed par bzhugs// skra grol ba ni yid 'ong ba// phyogs kyi gos can mgo yi phreng // phyag rgya la yis
162b3: rnam par ban+d+han/ thod pa kha rtag 'dzin cing // dril bun pa'imathagu dang / de bzhin ga'u dang mngar 'dzin cing rjem du mchog phyag na 'dzin// snyems pa'i phyag gis gang mdzad cing // zugs rje chags pas rnam par byos/
162b4: spro ba dang ni sa ba dang // ljang khu steng gzhal dkar po// ser zhing sngo ba lhung ba dang / steng gi zhal gdong drag la dmar// dmar dang sngo dang ldang ba dang / steng gizhal ni dkar la zhi// ljang dang dmar dang sngo ba dang / steng gizhal ni ser
162b5: po mchog/ bdud bzhi po ni zhengs kyis gnan// bcom ldan 'das la gdong gis lta// zur gyi char ni bum pa dag/ ye shes bdud rtsis yongs gang ba// de yi steng du thod pa ni// byang chub 'o mas rab bkang ba/ phyi rol dam
162b6: tshig gsum 'khor lo/ / khang pa brtsegs pa legs par mdzes// shar phyogs sa ni gau ri s+t+waM// byang du de bzhin tse'u rim// nub tu rab rmongs ma yin no// lho ru yang ni ro langs ma// me la spos byed ma yin te// bden
162b7: bral du ni gtum mo yin/ / rlung phyogs sme ma nyid yin te// dbang ldan he ru ka ma ste// de bzhin rnal 'byor ma brgyad ni// dkar mo ser la sngo ljang khu'o// skul byed dmar la sngo ljang khu// rab rmongs ma ni sngo sar ldang //
162b8: ro langs ma ni dkar sngo ldang // spos byed ma ni sna tshogs mdog/ dmar dang sngo dang ljang khu'o// gtum mo yang ni ljang sngo ser// sme mo yang ni dud sngo ldang // he ru ka ma sngo ldang dmar// 'di ltar de dag thams cad kyang //

163a1: spyan gsum pa la skra grol ba// phyogs kyi gos 'chang gar dang bcas// yi dgas gdan la lags par bzhugs// phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan// kha T+wAM thod pa dril bu dang // cang te'u zhags
163a2: pa lcags kyu thogs/ / thams cad thod pa'i phreng bas brgyan// mi spyod pa yi gcod pan byas/ 'di ltar gnas dang nye gnas kyi// dngos grub thams cad rab tu stsol// 'di ltar thugs kyi 'khor lo ni// lha mo dkar mo
163a3: la sogs pa/ / rnal 'byor ma ni ba tu bshad// bsnyen pas bka' drin stsol mdzad de/ thogs pa med pa'i 'bras bu 'grub// lha mo mkhas spyod grub nas ni/
163a4: mkha' la spyod pa'i go 'phang rnyed// de yi phyi rol gsung 'khor lo// shAr du pi wang stangs stabs ma// byang du gling bu'i stangs stabs ma// nub tu rdza rnga che stangs stabs// lho ru rdza rnga'i snang gastas te// snong
163a5: ser dang dmar ljang khu/ / me sogs rdo rje gzhad ma ste// rdo rje sgeg ma rdo rje klu// rdo rje gar te dmar ba dang // sngo dang ser dang ljang khu'o// de nas zhal cig phyag bzhi pa// gcer bu dbu skra grol ba dang // thod pa yi ni
163a6: phreng ba can/ / spyan gsum pa la yid 'ong gzod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// tsham dam lag pa'i stangs stabs kyis// rdo rje dril bu stangs stabs can// khrig ma mnyam par byas nas ni// pad ma bskor ba'i stangs
163a7: bas can/ / zhing dang nye ba'i zhing dang ni// tshan do dang ni tsha na do ha// de dag 'od dpag med dbu rgyun// sku yi 'khor lo'i shar du ni/ me tog ma byang badrag pa ma// nub tu mar me lho ru dri// ser dang dud kha dmar
163a8: dkar po/ / me long ro dang reg bya chos// me phyogs la sogs mtshams su ste// zla ba'i mdog can dmar ljang dkar// de dag spyan ni gsum pa ste// gcer bu dbu skra grol ba dang // zhabs kyis kun du

163b1: gAr byed cing / / phyag du mchod pa thogs nas ni// thod pa kha T+wAM ga 'dzin cing // cang te'u ni phyag na bsnams/ thod pa yi ni phreng ba can// lha mo de dag 'dus dang // nye ba'i 'dus du khrod dang // nye ba'i dur khrod dag
163b2: yin te/ / rnam par snang mdzad dbu rgyan byas// sgo rnams rdo rje lcags kyu dang // rdo rje zhags pa rdo rje sgog/ rdo rje dril bu de bzhin te// sngo dang ljang dang dmar drang ser// shAr dang byang dang nub dang ni// lho yi phyogs kyang
163b3: de bzhin no/ / me la sogs pa'i mtshams su ni// gshin rje sreg la sogs pa dag/ dmar dang sngo dang dud kha ser// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM ga/ rang gi mtshan ma cang te'u dang // gri gug dang ni mgo bo 'chang // spyan gsum dbu skra
163b4: grol ba ste/ / gcer bu gar gyis gnas pas bzhugs// thams cad phyag rgya lnga yis brgyan// thod pa yi ni phreng ba can// rang gi rigs kyi cod pan can// ji lta'i rim pas rjes su gnas// de yi snying khar ye shes sem
163b5: su gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo gsum/ / gtso bo'i bdag po bsgom par bya// dkar dang dmar dang sngo ba yi// dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma lhan cig/ ji lta bu yi bsgoms pa na// rjes su bstan pa'i bsgom pa las// ye shes/
163b6: lcags kyu dag gis ni// ye shes 'khor lo bkug nas ni// ji ltar rim pas mchod dbang skur// gcig tu bsdus te bsgrims nas su// ji lta'i rim pa bsgoms nas su// ye shes bzlas pa dag kyang bya// sgobasdu srog
163b7: dang rtsol ba yis/ / 'thor 'thung rim pas byas pa yi// slob dpon gyis ni bzlas pa bya// oM AHhUM hUM/ 'di lta bu yi rim pa yis// grangs med par byas nas su// ji srid skyo bar ma gyur par// gong gi dam tshig
163b8: 'khor le ni/ / mnyam par gzhag ste bzlas pa bya// dung chen phreng ba blangs nas ni/ sdom pa mchog gi bzlas pa bya// oM shrI badz+ra he he ru ru kaM tsuM hU~M phaT DA ki nI dz+wa la sa ma par swA hA/ oM badz+ra bA rA hri hUM d+hU phaT/ oMT kaMR+Sha

164a1: hUM trAM phaT/ oM la mye hUM hUM phaT/ oM khaN Da ra he hUM hUM phaT/ oM ru bi ni hUM d+hU phaT/ a go ri hU~M hUM phaT/ a tsa rI hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM pra ma ta hUM hUM phaT/ oM be t+tA lI hUM hUM phaT/ oM buk+ka sI hUM hUM phaT/ oM u0f7fNaNI ts+tsha
164a2: hUM paT/ oM g+ha sa ma rI nA~M hU~M phaT/ oM ha~M dr-ikas nA ni ba hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra bA ni hUM hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra bi she hUM hU~M pheMT/ oM badz+rA mr-i da ke nI hU~M phaT/ oM badz+rA mu~M dr-i dzI hUM hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra nI s+ye hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra li ts+yai tsuM hU~M paT/
164a3: badz+ra gIN+Di hU~M rU baT/ oM badz+rA ni d+hi nAM hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra priSh+paM hUM hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra d+hU paM hUM hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra dI pi hUM hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra ga ni d+hi hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra rU bi badz+ri hUM hUM phaT/ oM ra sa badz+ri hU~M hUM phaT/ oM s+phar sha badz+ra hU~M hUMH
164a4: oMn+d+ra mang+ga baidzi Tu m+b+har/ mau margyu pa / / ky-is kyi ba~M hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra e bai ci d+hu phaT/ oM ya mad d+hiSh+Tha hU~M phaT/ oM ya ma d+hi tiHhUM phaT/ oM ya mdaSh+Te n+tu rU paT/ oM ya ma ma
164a5: rIn+da rU phaT/ / dmachog can gyis tshig dag pas// mos pa'i yid kyis rtag tu bzla// nam gi bdag nyid sbyor ldani pas// shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid can// rang gi thabs dang rigs pa'i lus// gnyis su med
164a6: par mnyam pa'i bdag/ khro bo sprul pa'i tshogs spros pas// 'gro ba gsum po bcas par ni// he ru kar ni byas nas kyang // sa rnams gsum po ma lus par// thams cad der ni bsdus nas kyang // sku gsung
164a7: thugs la rnam par gnas/ / 'di na rnal 'byor cho ga ste// 'khor lo bsgom pa'i bzlas pa'o// rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis// rgyu dang mi rgyud mthong ba na// dam tshig can nyid langs dus su// de bzhin gshegs pa
164a8: thams cad dang / / dpa' bo dang ni rnal 'byor ma// mkha' 'gro dang ni mkha' 'gro ma// kun gyis gsol ba gdab par bya// khro bo bde ba'i dgyes pa yi// longs spyod las ni byung ba yi// rab rmongs ma yis bsnyen byas//

164b1: nas// bde ba'i sbyor ba la zhugs te// ra ma he na Ta na su ra A ma hA su hUM ba ra dza i ni kA ma la su hA/ a la la ho/ su ra a ud ta ma ma hUM/ ma hA sidz+dza u mdze i ni dza la ma ho/ A A~M/ a A ra ho/ a ru tse byi
164b2: nu su pa ya nA hA/ su ra a su hu de hi ba ra TA i ni/ dz+wa la su hU~M bi sa phan ta ro Na Na pa da hi ma hA su hU~M madz+dza mu hUM mo k+Shu pa lag kha u/ kud tu saM hUM Na oM suM hU~M/ badz+dza su mo khu su hUM/ i na i du/ khe la tha i mo khu sur+tha
164b3: bas i baM ka u madz+dza ta nun pa rA/ a pad traM/ b+hu dza ta ru mur tsam hA su d+haM/ i la da ra ba ya/ u ma hU~M/ a ra~M bA~M moM ga a baM mu ra su// 'di yis mgon po bskul nas ni// dkyil 'khor dngos grub nges pa ste/ stan cing
164b4: 'jam pa'i mgrin pa'i dbyangs/ / dpyid kyi rgyal po'i glu dbyangs pas// mkha' 'gro'i dri ba dri med rnams// gzigs shing las kun mdzad pa yin/ rdo rje pad ma yid 'ong ba// sbyor bas dngos grub thams cad 'grub// dgyes
164b5: pa 'di yis bskul na ni/ / bde ba chen po stsol pa yin// sbyor ba yi ni dus dag tu// rdo rje can gyis rab tu sbyar// thog ma dbus dang mthar thug par// yi ge brgya pa'i gsang sngags bzla// 'khor lo dag ni brtan byas te//
164b6: dpa' bo dang ni mkha' 'gro ma// 'di ni kun gyi gsang sngags te// khro bo sangs rgyas de bzhin gshegs// thams cad snying khar brtan byas te// bsgoms pas thams cad brtan par 'gyur// gal te bdag nyid dngos
164b7: grub 'dod/ / dngos grub thams cad gnas pa yin// oM badz+ra he ru ka sa mA ya ma nu pA la ya/ badz+ra he ru ka/ te no pa tiSh+Tha d+hi Di mo b+ha ba// su to Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ a nu rak+to me b+ha ba/ su bo Sh+yo ma b+ha ba/ sarba sid d+hi ma pra yats+tsha
164b8: sarba ka ma suts+tsha me/ tsita ta shri ya~M kuru nu/ ha u0f7fmahas haHho// b+ha ga bAn badz+ra he ru ka/ ma me 'u rtse na/ dze b+hag ma hA sa ma ya satwa AH// 'dis ni bcom ldan kun khyab cing // yi ge brgya pa mchog gyur pa// he ruH

165a1: mchog rang nyid yin/ / phyir bzlog pa ni gang yin pa/ bcu drug 'dab ma la bkod cing // rjes su brtan pa'i dkyil 'khor kun// bdag gis bsgoms shing brtan par bya// rang gi lha yi sbyor ba ste//
165a2: ji ltar bde bar gnas par bya// rnal 'byor 'di 'dra bsgoms na ni// khams gsum pa yang mthong 'gyur te// bdag nyid dpa' ba'i mtshan nyid de// de ltar srid pa'ang stong pa yin// bsgom pas bdag nyid yang dag
165a3: gnas/ / 'di ni dka' thub bshad pa med// phreng ba med cing sngags kyang med// gzungs dang sbyin sreg las rnams dang // cho ga'i rim pa'i gzhi yang med// rnal 'byor phyag rgya byed pa'ang med// g.yas brkyang zhabs
165a4: kyis rim pa'ang med/ / rdo rje chen po dngos 'dzin pa// rang byung ngadadro grub kun mdzad pa// 'gog pa nyid kyang mdzad pa med// bdag nyid bdag gis mchod par bya// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gas ni lte ba'i dbus su rnam par bsgom// yi ge gnas kyi
165a5: mchog gyur pa/ / lha yi gzugs su bsgom pa ni// de yi dbus su rnam par bsam// sku gsung thugs ni 'dus pa can// de yi lus las 'das gyur te// sems kyi dngos kyang btsal du med// chags pa med cing chags
165a6: bral mod/ / chags bral dang ni ldan gyur pa// snying gi pad ma da byas su ni// brtags pas legs par rnyed pa mi// yid kris dal bsos byas bsnyen la 'byor sa kun byud med yin// khrug rgya mchog tu bshad pa'o//
165a7: ba'i steng du brgya phyed brgyan// ye shes sems ni bsam pa ni// mchog ste sbyang bar bya ba med// bla ma'i man ga lam dang ni// sems ni mchog tu 'bad pa yis// 'di ltar zhi ba'i gnas de ni// 'jig rten du mas ma rtogs /
165a8: sbyo dang sbyor ba bral byas nas// go 'phang gcig pus khyab pa yin// 'di ltar byang chub 'bras bu rnyed par dka' ba ste// dang por dbyangs kyi yi ge las byang gzhan du yang // stegs ngan gzhung lugs log pa'i bri gros

165b1: de nyid ni/ / ma ning shes rab long ba gzugs bzhin 'bras bu med// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las sku gsung thugs kyi gnas kyi rim pa'i le'u ste nyi shu lnga pa'o// // de nas sbyor ba bshad bya ba// thod pa
165b2: sangs rgyas mchog dam pa/ / de nyid sbyor ba kun gyi mchog/ dngos grub thams cad rab stsol ba// gsang ba legs par snga bya zhing // gang gis su la'ang mi bstan to// de nyid mchog gi bsgom pa bzung / rnal 'byor
165b3: ma pa snyed la gnas/ / gsang ba brtan par sba bya zhing // bla ma'i ngag ni bsgom par bya// dur khrod gnas ni yid 'ong ba// sgrub pa po yis nges brtan pa// skyed pa'i rim pa'i sbyor ba yis// sa dang gnas kyi rim pa
165b4: dag/ rdo rje lte ba'i dbus su ni// yi ge hUM ni bsgom par bya// de yis khyad par bdag nyid ni// sangs rgyas thod pa can gyi mchog/ gnas med zhi zhing dag pa ste// rtog pa thams cad rnam spangs yin// a li ka li las rang
165b5: byung / / gnyis med mchog tu zhi ba ste// phyag gnyis pa la zhal cig pa// phyag rgya drug gis rnam par brgyan// 'dzam bu'i mdog can mnyam pas khyab// 'od zer phreng bas kun tu 'khrigs// thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu
165b6: rgyan can/ / spyan gsum pa la bzhad pa'i zhal// sems dpa' kun gyi bsgom pa ste// gnyis med chos ni bla na med// stag gi lhags pa gos su mnabs// na ra'i lpags pa steng du brkyang // thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'adz+ra/
165b7: g.yas pa mi 'jigs phyag rgya can// sangs rgyas lnga yid bu rgyan can// mgo bo'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan// de yi phyag g.yon thod pa ni// rkang gis rab tu gang ba dang // sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir// ye shes
165b8: 'chi med lngas bsreg pa/ / kha T+wAM ga ni lha'i rnal 'byor// thod pa dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma/ g.yas pa mi 'jigs dag pa ste// 'jigs pa ma lus mi 'jigs grol// gdug cing 'jigs pa ma lus kun// 'dir

166a1: ni zhabs kyis gnon pa mdzad/ / gdug pas 'jigs pa gams pang sring // zlab myed pa zhi pa 'dzin// sna tshogs rdo rjes dbul mtshu// rdo rje phreng bas dpral ba mdzes// rka rgyun yid 'ong rgyan
166a2: canaHsna tshogs pad ma 'dab brgyad kyi/ / lte ba'i dbus nas bzhengs pa ni// 'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan dgra/ chags pa zhe sdang zhabus kyis gnon// ye shes sems dpa' de gzugs can// yi ge bruM las byung bar
166a3: bsgom/ / thugs kyi 'khor lo snying ka ru// he ru ka ni rnam par bsgom// gsung gi 'khor lo kha la bsgom// sku yi 'khor lo sngam bzhin// sngo dang dmar dang dkar ba dang // phyag drug pa la zhal gsum pa// rdo rje dril bu mnyam
166a4: par ldan/ / spyan gsum pa la bzhin rnam sbyar// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// rtse gsum pa dang thod pa 'chang // rang rig lus dang yang dag 'dus// bde ba chen po'i go 'phang gnas// dkyil 'khor bzhi yi dbus dag tu// yi
166a5: ge gsum sogs las byung ba/ / thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// rang gi mtshan ma'i mchog dang ldan// gnas la sogs pa'i rim sbyor ba// sdom pa gsum gyi mchog dam pa// mkha' 'gro ma dang lA ma dang / dum skyes ma
166a6: dang gzugs can ma/ / pad ma'i phyogs kyi gnas la dgod// thod pa bzhi po mchog yin te// mkha' 'gro ma ni kha dog ser// lA ma pa la shi'i mdog/ dum skyes ma ni sngon po ste// gzugs can ma ni dmar la 'bar// thod pa/
166a7: dang ni badz+ra 'dzin// g.yas pa mi 'jigs mchog yin te// sgo rnam su ni lha mo bzhi// khrag dong la sogs mkha' 'gro ma// sngo dang ser dang de bzhin dmad// ljang khu drug po'i gzugs can no// mtshams su gshin tu
166a8: sreg la sogs/ / rab 'jigs shin du 'jigs pa ste// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// mi 'jigs mchog kyang de bzhin te// cang te'u dang ni gri gug nyid// bdud ni bzhi po'i steng na bzhugs// spyan gsum pa la skra grol ba/

166b1: phyogs kyi gos mchog 'dzin pa ste// thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyun can// phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan// me ldong ro dang dri dang ni// reg gi mchod pa bzhi po ste/ sa bcu dag ni rim pa dang // sku gsung thugs kyi
166b2: skyed pa yis/ / phyi dang nang gi chos rnams kun// byang chub phyogs kyis rnam par dag/ ka la sogs pa nyi shu bAzhi// mgo la byin dus mnan pa ste// gsal byed hUM gnyis dang yang sbyar// mthar ni phaT dang rab tu
166b3: sbyar/ / dpa' bo kun gyi gsang sngags ni// 'dod pa'i 'bras bu thams cad ster// gsal byed mkha' 'gro ma yi ming // mthar ni dzu hU~M phaT yin te// 'di ltar rab gtum mkha' 'gro ma// sngags kyi de nyid bde bster
166b4: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ni/ / hUM AHoM// 'di ni rab tu gsang ba ste// pad ma'i 'dapal mkha' 'gro ma// gsal byed ma ning dang bcas pa// hUM ni gnyis pa nyid yin te// mkhas pas mthar ni phaT dang sbyar// khrag dang /
166b5: lasogs gsang sngags ni// ya ra la wa// gsal byed dang ni bcas pa ste// mthar ni tsU dang pan+d+ha dang sbyar// gshin rje sreg ma la sogs pa// sha Sha sa ha// gsal byed dang ni hUM gnyis dang // phaT kyang de bzhin sbyar bar bya//
166b6: dbus su sangs rgyas thod pa yi// gas dasngags de bzhin rjes su dran// oM ma I/ e I/ Ats+tsha.oM mai oM oM/ a aHSha s+'uny+tsa/ khams dang phung po skye mched la// ga charnams ni sbyang bar bya// ye shes 'khor gyi/
166b7: dam tshig dag/ mnyam pa'i ri yis mchod par bya// mchod pa bzhi po'i gas sngags rnams// rang mang gsal byed rgyu byas te/ di ltar dkyil 'khor dag dang sbyar// sangs rgyas thod pa las byung ba/ rdo rje rgyan ni kra
166b8: paste/ / thams cad si ba bzhin du sbyar// 'thor 'thung du ni rab sbyar bas// gsang ba bzhi po bzla par bya// sgo dang bsdu ba'i sbyong ba yis// 'khor lo gsum gyi rim pa dag/ 'dir ni tshiga'i sbyor ba yis// dus pazhi dag tu

167a1: sbyor nas su/ / dam tshig 'khor lo'i bzlas pa bya// dam tshig mchog ni dngos grub 'gyur// dam tshig can gyi gsang sngags kun// sangs rgyas thod pa mchog yin te// mnyam par ma bzhag sbyor ba bri/
167a2: 'di ltar thams cad rab tu brtag/ dam tshig rtag tu bskyang bya zhing // ye shes 'chi med lnga'i mchog/ yang na rang ming bzlas pa bya// sngags kyi de nyid bzlas par bya// oM shrI bud d+ha kA pA li bruM a hUM DA ki nI dzA la saM ba raM hUM/
167a3: phaT swA hA// 'di ni yid 'ong sbyor ba'i mchog/ rnal 'byor ma yi ye shes mchog/ gang du dam tshig nyams pa la// spyod pa 'di ni sbyin par bya// zhi bar gyur nas bla med pa// rnal 'byor ma yis dbang yang bskur//
167a4: dus bzhi dag tu rim pa yis// phyi dang nang gi chus khrus bya// yang na dam tshig sdom pa blang // bla ma la ni gsol pa gdab// bdag ni mi shes rmongs pa ste// dam tshig las ni 'gal zhing nyams// bla ma mgon pos skyabs/
167a5: mdzod cig/ gtso bo rdo rje 'dzin pa ste/ thugs rje chen po'i bdag nyid can// 'gro ba'i gtso la skyabs su mchi// de ni the tsom med byas nas// nges par dngos grub can du 'gyur// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las//
167a6: dam tshig las ldang ba sangs rgyas thod pa bskyed pa ste le'u nyi shu rtsa drug pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// gas pa'i nyid rnyed dka' ba// gsang sngags kun ni bskyed pa dang // 'gro ba'i gnas dang 'gro ba dang //
167a7: rnal 'byor ma dang dpa' bo kun/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi gnas mchog yin// mi zad gnyis med nam par dag / thog mar dbus mthang dri ma med/ a yi ye shes las zung ba/ rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che// zhal gsum byas/
167a8: drug zhi ba ste// spyan gsum pa la thugs rje'i nyams// phyag rgya che dang yang dag ldan// rang bzhin dag cing dri ma med// ral pa zla phyed dbul brgyan// sna tshogs rdo rje gral mtshan/ thong pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/

167b1: sangs rgyas lnga yis rnam par brgyan// sems dpa'i dkyil mo dkrung gis bzhugs// phyag rgya drug gis rnam par brgyan// rdo rje dril bu mnyam par ldan// ral gri lcags kyu phyag na bsnams// rin chen zhags pa
167b2: mdzes pa 'dzin/ / dngos grub thams cad rab tu stsol// dkar dang sngo dang dmar ba'i zhal// rnam thar gsum gyi gnas kyi mchog/ ye shes sems dpa' snying kha ru// 'khor lo gsum gyi mchog kyang bsgom// hUM las
167b3: thugs kyi 'khor lo ste/ / de yi phyag mtshan sngon po dang // AHlas gsung gi 'khor lo ste// de yi phyag mtshan dmar ba'o// oM las sku yi 'khor lo ste// de yi phyag mtshan dkar po yin// dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma
167b4: mnyam sbyor/ / sku gsung thugs ni dri ma med// re las phyag rgya chen po ste// lte ba'i dbus su rnam par bsam// i las b+ha ga pad ma ste// byang chub zla ba dri ma med// u ni snying khar bsam pa ste// e ni mgo la
167b5: rnam par dgod/ / e ni spyi gtsug dag tu dgod// oM ni mig tu dgod pa ste// aM ni go char byas nas su// a ni mdun gyi mtshon cha'o// li las lha mo spyan yin te// ri las dam tshig sgrol ma yin// lI las lha mo gro
167b6: dkar mo/ / rI las rin chen yang dag 'byung // rin chen sgrol dang ye shes sgron// dkar zhing p+la k+Sha sha yi mdog/ dmar zhing 'dzam bu chu bo'i mdog/ zhal gsum pa la phyag drug pa// spyan gsum dgyes pas rnam pa
167b7: myos/ / thams cad phyogs kyis gos can te// rang gi thabs dang mnyam par ldan// 'khor lo sna tshogs rdo rje dang // pad ma dmar po rin chen dang // rdo rje dril bu lhan cig sbyar// 'dod pa thams cad rab tu stsol// ral gri
167b8: mda' dang lcags kyu 'dzin/ / gzhu ni 'gugs pa 'dzin pa ste// mtshan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs// thod pa yi ni cod pan can// sna tshogs pad ma'i dbus su ni// sems dpa'i dkyil mo dkrung du bzhugs

168a1: de dag sgo ru dgod pa ste/ / dbus su gtso bo'i zla ba'i gdan// zur la mchod pa rnam pa bzhi// phyogs kyi gos can skra grol ba// zhal gsum pa la phyag drug pa// spyan gsum thod pa'i phreng ba can/ me
168a2: long dang ni piwa dang / / dril dang dung dang bcud kyi len// chang gi btung ba lag pas mchod// gzhan du ji ltar bdag po bzhin// rgyan rnams thams cad yongasu rdzogs// dkyil dkrung phyed par legs par bzhugs// lag
168a3: bstim pa'i thal mo yis/ / mchod pa lag du thogs nas ni// 'di lta'i tshogs thams cad mkhyen// a li de nyid dri ma med/ gsang ba mchog ni rnyed dka' ba// rdo rje sems dpas bshad pa yin// sngags kyi de nyid tshe
168a4: ga dag/ sku gsung thugs su yang dag sbyar// oM shrI ma hA su kha badz+ra satwa a/ A hA DA ki nI dz+wa la sam ba ra swA hA// oM sid d+ha lo tsa ni AHhUM swA hA/ oM sa ma ya tA re tu da tA re ri AHhU~M swA hA/ oM pad ma b+ha be bA Na Da
168a5: rabasi ni li AHts+tsha swA hA/ / mo da nga na dz+wa li nI ri AHhUM swA hA/ oM rU pa badz+ri b+hUM/ o sha ba ta badz+ri hA oM gan d+he brdzi khaM/ oM ra sa badz+ri wi// thams cad mkhyen pa dbang phyug mchog/ b+ha ga'i dbus su gnas par bsgom
168a6: a li rdo rje gsang ba che/ / sems can kun gyi snying la gnas// gang gis dngos po kun gsang ba// de yi gsang ba bshad pa yin// rnal 'byor pa yis dus bzhi ru// bzlas dang bsgom par ldan par bya// som nyi thams
168a7: cad spangs nas ni/ / sems can chen po brtson 'grus brtan// ye shes 'khor lo mthong nas ni// dam tshig can gyis mchod dbang bskur// de dag gcig tu bstims nas su// spro dang bsdu ba'i sbyor ba yis// khams gas
168a8: dog ni ma lus pa/ thams cad rdo rje 'dzin lta bu// 'das pa dang ni da ltar dang // ma 'ongs pa yis dus gsum po// de ltar sems can gsum po la/ rdo rje sems dpa'i go 'phang gnas// lhan cig skyes dga' dag pa'i

168b1: bdag/ thog ma med pa'i mchog yin no// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las rdo rje sems dpa' bskyed pa'i le'u skye nyi shurtsa bdun pa'o// // des mchog gi tshig bshad/ ram pa'i rje bsgrub pa ni/ ma
168b2: shes las byung ba'i/ / 'jam pa'i rdo rje bde ba che// nal drug phyag drug zhi ba ste// sku mdog dkar po dri ma med// spyan gsum rdo rje dkyil dkrung can// phyag rgya drug ni 'bar bas brgyan// mi bskyod pa'i cod pan can// thod pa'i
168b3: phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ / zla phyed pa zhi ba 'dzin// ral pa'i ther tshugs bcings pa ste// dkar dang sngo dang ngur smrig nyid// ser dang ljang khu de bzhin te// steng gi zhal ni zhi ba ste// lha yis dngos grub 'bras bu stsol//
168b4: rdo rje dri ba mnyam par ldan// ral gri po ti 'dzin pa ste// ud pal dang lcags kyu nyid// yes shes lus can rnam par bsgom// sku gsung thugs kyi snying po ni// 'khor lo dbus su rnam par bsgom// sngar bshad
168b5: gnas kyi sbyor ba yis/ / ji ltar rdo rje sems dpa' ltar// gsang sngags 'di ni rjes su dran// 'jam pa'i rdo rje gas pa ni// gsang gsum ye shes dam tshig can// dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma sbyor ba'o// oM shrI ma hA su khA
168b6: maHdza badz+ra a mr-i dA D+ha ki nI dz+wa la sam pa ro swA hA/ / rang gis dbang bskur byas nas ni// brtul zhugs chen po gsang sngags bzla// gsang gsum la 'bo spros nas ni// khams gsum dag ni bsdu bar bya// 'di ni
168b7: mchog tu gsang ba ste/ / gang gis su la'ang bstan mi bya// mngon par brjod pa'i rlud bla mA'i tha ma las 'jam pa'i rdo rje sgrub pa'i mas nyi rgya brgyang pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad byu ga// yi ge dgu pa bsgrub pa
168b8: li ye shes las thung ba/ / gdug pa thams cad za byed pa// za byed mkha' 'gro za byed cing // rnam rtog zos shing zad par byed// mkha' mnyam stong pa las byung ba// na mkha'i longs spyod pa byed cing // nal drug phyag ni

169a1: bcu gnyis pa/ / spyan gsum pa la zhal nam sbyar// g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis bzhugs// gdug pa'i bdud ni za byed cing // 'jigs byed dang ni 'jigs byed mo// khas srub zhabs kyis mnan par
169a2: bzhugs/ / stag gi lpags bgos su mnabs// mgo bo'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan// thod pa'i phreng ba'i dab rgyan can// zla ba phyed pa nye bar mdzes// sna tshogs rdo rje ral pa mnan// phyag rgya drug gis sku lus brgyan//
169a3: zhal gyi mche ba rnam par gtsigs// 'jigs byed rab tu cher 'jigs shing // sngo dang dud kha ljang khu dang // dmar dang lnga pa ser po'o// drug pa dag ni bong bu'i mgo/ steng gi zhal gdong rab tu 'jigs// thal ba sprin gyi
169a4: mdog can la/ / gdug pa thams cad rab 'joms ma// rdo rje dril bu mnyam par ldan// dgyes pa'i longs spyod longs spyod cing // pad du rdo rje phag me/ de mdog steng zhal phag mgo ste// gnyis su med par mnyam par
169a5: ldan/ / skra grol ba dang phyogs gos can// byin pa gnyis kyis mnyam par 'khril// thugs rje'i chags pas rnam par myos// thod pa kha T+wAM ga 'dzin yi tshangs pa'i lpags pa mnakhas pa ste// rdo rje mdung dang cang te'u dang // gri
169a6: gug zhags pa mgo bo dang / / phyag tu ral gri 'phyar ba ste// drag po gdug pa kun 'joms pa// snying khar ye shes mkha' 'gro ni// khwa gdong las sogs yongs kyis khyab// 'khor lo 'dab brgyad dbus dag du// g.yon
169a7: nas g.yas su bskor nas ni/ / dur khrod dang si dur khrod// mkha' 'gro ma mchog dgod par bya// yaM raM laM waM shaM ShaM saM haM// ye shes 'khor lo mkha' 'gro dgod// zhag bdubar du bsgoms nas ni/ gang yang thun ni bzhi yi
169a8: rim/ / chu 'gram dang ni dur khrod du// bsgoms pas dngos grub nges par rnyed// 'phrog pa dang ni gsod byed cing // gang du las ni ci 'dod pa// mkha' 'gro ma yi 'khor los 'grub// las 'dir yid gnyis dpyod pa rje

169b1: sngo dang pa la sha yi mdog/ dmar dang bzhi po ser po ste// gshin rje sreg sogs bzhi po ni// sna tshogs mdog can mdzes pa'i zhal// dmar dang sdong dadung ba ste// zhal mdog dkar po mchog tu mdzes// thams cad spyan
169b2: gsum pa yi zhal/ / skra grol ba la phyogs gos can// khwa gdong g.yon dang g.yas kyi zhal// 'ug gdong zhal yang de bzhin te// gsum pa khyi yi zhal gdong yin// bzhi pa phag gizhal gdong ste// g.yon dang
169b3: g.yas pa'i zhal gdong ni/ / drag pa'i gzugs can cho ga bzhin// gshin rje sreg sogs zhal gdong ni// g.yon dang g.yas pa gnyis de bzhin// thug ri rnga mo rta dang ni// se ge de dang glang ma he// gzhan yang dom gyi
169b4: zhal yin te/ / thams cad kyang ni mnyam par bya// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// zhags pa lcags kyu phyag na bsnams// dril bu cang te'u gri gug dang // thod pa'i phreng ba 'di bu rgyan can// phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan// yi
169b5: dgas gdan la gar gyis bzhugs/ / mi'u thung la skye gnas ring // mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa'i zhal/ thugs rje'i ro yis rnam par myos// sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba ni// bsgom zhing rab tu bsgom par bya// hUM
169b6: AHoM/ 'di ni gsang bar bshad pa ste// rdo rje pad ma 'khor lo dbus// ye shes mkha' 'gro snying ka ru// mkha' 'gro'i yi ge'i 'khor lo ni// ye shes 'khor lo de mthong nas// mchod cing thim par rnam par bsgom//
169b7: mnyam par bzhag nas yi ge rnams// srog dang rtsol bas gsang sngags bzla// rang gis 'thor 'thung byas nas su// gsang ba gsum gyi ye shes spro/ oM shrIk+Sha DA ka~M nI dzA la sam pa ra hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA// thog mar gsal
169b8: byed ming dang hUM/ / mthar ni phaT dang rnam par sbyor// mkha' 'gro zla bas bshad pa yi// 'dod pa'i 'bras bu thams cad stsol// mchog 'di dag ni gsang ba ste// su la yang ni sbyin mi bya// zhal bdun gyi ni dbang 'gyur te//

170a1: gcig pa yis bsgoms nA ni// 'khor lo gsum gsang mkha' 'gro ma'i// dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur// nges par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las kA'i mkha' gro sgrub pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa dgu pa'o//
170a2: de nas mchog tu bshang bya ba// a li mkha' 'gro bsgrub pa ste// a li ye shes las byung ba// a l-i mkha' 'gro mchog dam pa// zhal brgyad pa la phyag bcu drug/ spyan gsum 'jigs pa rab 'jigs pa// zhal gyi mche
170a3: ba rnam par gtsigs/ / g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis bzhugs// zla ba phyed pa ral pa 'ching // thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan// sna tshog sa rdo rjes spyi gtsug mnan// dpral ba la ni rdo rje phreng // stag gi lpags pa gos su man tha
170a4: phyag rgya drug gis sku la brgyan/ / rnam par rtog pa 'jigs byed nyid// sred dang phrag dog dus mtshan nyid// zhabs kyi 'og tu gnon par mdzad// gdul dka' thams cad 'dul mdzad cing // bgegs kyi mgo bo'i phreng ba can//
170a5: tshogs mdog can legs par mdzes dkar ba'i mdog can rked pa phra// lha'i gzi brjid 'bar ba can// sngo zhing ser la dud kha dang // g.yas pa'i zhal yang de bzhin te// ljang khu dmar dang ser skya ste// g.yon pa'i zhal yang sna
170a6: tshogs mdzes/ / steng gi thal ga sprin mdog zhi// chags shing rjes su chags pas lta// thugs rje'i ri ni yang dag rdzogs// sku lus ldem zhing 'og bag can// a li mkha' 'gro ma'i sku// phyag gnyis pal gcer bu'i lus//
170a7: yod pa'i phreng bas dbul brgyan// sgra grol ba yis rnam par myos// spyan gsum nag po 'jigs pacan// de yi mdog can su rigs can// byin pa gnyis kyis legs par 'khril// gnyis med sbyor bas yang dag gnas
170a8: rdorje dril bu yang dag ldan/ / lha mo'i kutsa bachir ba'o// ji ltar mkha' 'gro'i phyag rgya ltar// mkha' 'gro ma yang de bzhin sbyar// phyag gnyis dag ni brkyang ba la// khyab 'jug lpags pa mnabs pa yin// thod pa dang ni ShartA

170b1: 'di/ / ral gri dang ni thod pa 'chang // mdung rtse gsum bcad te'u nyid// dgra sta lcags kyu de bzhin te// nags pa tshangs pa'i mgo bo dang // gri gug dang ni 'khor lo nyid// snying khar rtsibs ni bcu gnyis pa'i// 'khor lo
170b2: rgyal po legs par mdzes/ / de yi lte ba'i dbus su ni// ye shes mkha' 'gro rnam par bsgom// de mdog zhal dang 'dug stangs dang // phyag dang phyag rgya de bzhin te// shar du dam tshig mchog ces bya ba'i rnga
170b3: rje mkha' 'grom/ / yi ge a'i rigs las byung ba'o// byang phyogs su sna tshogs mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma yi ge I las byung ste bzhugs pa'o// nub phyogs sunam mkha'i mchog ces bya ba'i
170b4: mkha' 'gro ma yi ge e dang sbyar bar bya'o/ / lho phyogs su gnas kyi mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma'i yi ge aM las yang dag par bzhugs pa'o// me'i phyogs la stsogs pa'i mtshams rnams su// mkha'//
170b5: 'gro ma bzhi po dgod par bya ste// thog ma che ba'i mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma// yi ge u dang sbyar bar bya'o// bden bral du drag po mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma yi ge U dang sbyar bar bya'o// rlung gi
170b6: phyogs su dpa' bo'i mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma yi ge oM dang sbyar bar bya'o/ / dbang ldan du khro bo'i mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma yi ge/ oM dang sbyar bar bya'o// de bzhin 'dir ni mtshams bzhi ru//
170b7: dbang ldan la stsogs phyogs dgod pa// yi ge ri las dngos grub kyi mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' 'grem dang // yi ge li las dur khrod kyi mchog ces pa'i mkha' 'gro ma dang / yi ge ri las rnal 'byor kyi mchog
170b8: ces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma dang / / yi ge li las gtum pa'i mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma dang / mkha' 'gro ma ni de kun gyi// yan lag bcu gnyis rnam par dag/ zhal gsum phyag ni drug pa ste// thams

171a1: cad spyan gsum rnam sbyar zhal/ / sku lus dkar po thams cad gan sngo dang ljang khwa gnyis med bde// g.yon dang g.yas pa'i zhal gnyis ni// mkhas pas rnam par bsgom par bya// phyogs kyi
171a2: gos can gar dang bcas/ / skra grol ba la rab tu 'jigs// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin/ cang te'u dang ni gri gug mchog/ mdung dang mgo bo thams cad kun// sna tshogs mdog dang phyag mtshan bsnams ro yi mgo yi steng/
171a3: bzhugs shing // thugs rje'i ro ni yongs su rdzogs// phyag rgya lnga ni 'dzin pa ste// thams cad thod pa'i phreng bas brgyan// mgo bo'i phreng ba 'dzin pa ste// thams cad a la la yi sgra// / oM ni thugs kyi rdo rje ste// a ni
171a4: gsung du 'gyur ba yin/ / oM ni sku yi rdo rje ste// rdo rje pad ma 'khor lo'i dbus// 'di ni mchog tu gsang ba ste// rnal 'byor ma yi sbyor ba mchog/ rdo rje sems dpas gsung ba ste// rdo rje snying pos zhus pa yin// dkyil lakhri
171a5: 'khor lo'i mkha' 'gro ma/ / 'khor la sogs pa thams cad dgod// ye shes 'khor lo de mthong nas// gcig pu chos kyi ro yang bsgom// ye shes zlas pa'i sbyor ba yis// rang gi sngags kyi 'thor 'thung bya// nang gi bdag nyid
171a6: sbyor ldan pas/ / 'khor lo mchog gi tshogs dang spro// mchog de mthong na slar yang bsdu// yan lag bcu gnyis mchog dam pa// sa ni bcu gnyis dag nyid te// rdo rjes ni bcug/ sum pa// rab tu dga' dang dri ma med// 'od byed pa
171a7: dang 'od 'phrog/ / sbyar dga' ba dang mngon du gyur// ring du song dang mi g.yo ba// legs pa'i blo gros chos kyi sprin// gzugs med pa dang ye shes ldan// de ltar sa ni bcu gnyis po// 'khor lo'i lha mo rnam par dgod// ces
171a8: pachen po bde ba'i mchog/ ces bya ba'i rdo rje sems dpa'i sa dbus su'o// 'khor lo stsogs pa kun gyi sngags// ming dang gsal byed hUM byas te// de dag mthar ni phaT dang sbyar// sngags kyi gtso bos gsang sngags ni//

171b1: rang snying rang gi sa bon dgod// sku gsung thugs dang rnam par sbyar// ye shes 'khor lo 'di mthong nas// gcig tu bsdus te mchod par bya// bdag gis phyi dang nang du yang // mnyam par bzhag ste mi smra bzla// rang gi
171b2: 'thor 'thung byas nas ni/ / blo ldan srog rtsol bzlas pa bya// oM shrI a li DA ki a a oM hUM DA ki nI dzA la sam ba ro hUM phaT swA hA// srid pa ma lus thams cad kun// dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin te// sngags dang dbyibs
171b3: dang chos bdag nyid/ / sbyor ba yi ni bdag nyid rnams// sems can khams ni cha gnas pas// rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis// bdag nyid sbyor zhing mchod par bya// mnyam par ma bzhag sems kyis ni// sgom zhing rab tu
171b4: bsgoms byas te/ / sngags dang dbyibs dang chos nyid de// chos gcig ron stong pa yin// chos ni bdag med nyid yin te// rang bzhin med pa'i chos la ni// rjes su brtag par bya ba ya ni// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud tha
171b5: ma'i bla ma las gsang ba chen po'i gsang ba a li'i mkha' 'gro bsgrub pa ste le'u sum bcu tham pa'o/ / // de nas sbyor ba bshad bya ba// sna tsho grag dgyi dbang phyug mchog/ thams cad mchog tu rnal 'byor che// dngos
171b6: grub chen po legs stsol ba/ / bsred pa'i rim pa'i sbyor ba yis// sgo ba zhing rab tu bsgom par bya// nyi ma dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ sa~M a pA las rdo rje 'byung // de nyid yongs gyur bdag nyid de// gsal byed mkha
171b7: 'gro mchog gyur pa/ / sna tshogs dbang phrag sna tshogs mdog// thams cad rigs kyi mchog dam pa// zhal drug pa la phyag bcu gnyis// spyan gsam pa la g.yo ba'i sku// zlabaskyed pa zhi ba 'dzin/ yod pa'i phreng bas
171b8: spung ba ste/ / sna tshogs rdo rje dbul 'chang // spyi gtsug ral pa 'ching ba ste// phyag rgya drug gis sku la mtshan// lha yi rgyan gyis spud pa ste// skal ngan mu stegs can rnams ni// zhabs kyi pad ma'i 'og tu mnan// lta b.rarda

172a1: yi rim pa dag/ g.yas brkyang ba'i zhabs kyis mnan// dkyil dkrung byed pa'i gar zhabs can// zhabs drug gis ni rnam par brgyan// khyab 'dug gi ni lpags pa banabs// mgo bo'i phreng bas brgyan pa ste// rdorje
172a2: lha mos rnam par 'gyur/ / gcer bu 'og pag ske rags can// skra grol ba la spyan gsum can// mchu dang mchu ni rnam 'chir zhing // rdo rje dril bu mnyam par 'khril// byang chub yan lag gnas 'chir zhing // byin pa gnyis
172a3: kyis mnyam par 'khril/ / thugs rje chags pa'i ro yis bde// tshangs pa'i lpags pa'i yan lag ni// phyag gnyis dag gis rgyang nas 'dzin// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'chang // dbang phyug chen po'i mgo bo thogs// mdung rtsa/
172a4: gsum dang ral gri dang // cang te'u zhags pa lcags kyu bsnams// dkar dang sngo dang ldang ba nyid// ser dang dud ka rud mig ste// g.yon dang g.yas pa'i ngos dag tu// pi la dang ni nye pi la mkha' 'gro ma ni gnyis po sbyar
172a5: chos kyi mchog ces bya ba'i/ / rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma nyid ni// yi ge dI las yang dag 'byung // g.yon gyi phyogs su dgod par bya// yi gsi las nges byung ba// rgya mtsho mchog ces bya ba'i// rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma nyid ni// sgra
172a6: tshogs mdog can sna tshogs zhal/ / spyan gsum pa la bzhin rnams skur// dkyil dkrung byed pas gnas pa ste// zhabs ni gar dang bcas pa'o// zhal lnga pa la phyag bcu pa// spyan gsum drag po 'jigs pa ste//
172a7: 'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan dag/ zhabs kyi 'og tu mnan par bzhugs// mgrin pa dag ni drug dang bzhi// phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan// phyogs kyi gos can skra grol ba// thod pa phreng ba'i sku rigs can// rkang drug
172a8: g.yer ka'i sil sgra can/ / thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par rgyan// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// 'khrud pa yi ni mchog dam pa// rdo rje gsor zhing sdigs 'dzub kyis// gnyis su med par rnam par brgyan// thod pa gnyis

172b1: med rnam brgyan te/ / zhags pa lcags kyu phyag na bsnams// thod pa dang ni gri gug mchog/ sku gsung thugs kyi dbu rgyan can// dngos grub thams cad rab rtsol ba// ye shes mkha' 'gro ma dbus su// 'khor lo gsum
172b2: gyi thabs kyang bsgom/ / oM gyi ye shes mkha' 'gro ni// thugs kyi 'khor lo'i dbus su ste// sku gsung thugs kyi mkha' 'gro ni// rang gi snying khar de dag bsgom// sngar bshad sbyor ba'i rim pa yis// gnas la stsog
172b3: pa'i rjes rim pa/ / de ru bsam zhing rnam bsgoms ste// gsum po'i rim pa rjes su spro// des ni dngos grub gnyis med pa// mkha' 'gro ma dang lhan cig bsgom// ye shes 'khor lo'i ro rnams ni// bsgoms
172b4: la gsang sngags bzla bar bya/ / oM shrI pra Na bod DA ka oM a oM hUM DA ki nI dz+wa la sam pa ra oM swA hA/ oM hri d+harma ud Da me ma hA badz+ra DA ki nI ya traM hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM sni a sa ga ri ud TA me ma hA badz+ra DA ki nI ye sI d+hu
172b5: phaT swA hA/ / gsang gsum ye shes bzlas na ni// dpa' bo mkha' 'gro ma bzlas bya// gsal byed rang ming hUM gnyis dang // mthar ni phaT dang sbyar bar bya// gsang gsum 'khor lo bsgoms nas ni// gsum po
172b6: bsdu zhing bsgoms nas su/ / dam tshig gsang gsum sbyor ba yis// b+ha ga'i dbus su sgom par bya// byang chub zla ba dri ma med// thugs kyi 'khor lo na gsum// gtso bo dag ni gsum yin te// mkha' 'gro ma
172b7: gsum gsum mkha' 'gro/ / sdud cing bskyed par mdzad pa ste// b+ha gar rdo rje phag mo ni// gsapa gsum du rnam par sgom// de nyid bsgom pa'i sbyor ba yis// des na nga rgyal rnam spangs nas// dus bzhi dag tu sbyor
172b8: ba yis/ / de bzhin bsgoms dang bzlas pa bya// rtag tu dam tshig bskyang bya zhing // 'o ma sna tshogs las byung ba// bram ze che dang sbrang rtsi mar// ma hA mangs mnyam ldan pa// de nyid gsum gyis mngon bsngags te//

173a1: bza' ba dag ni bza' bar bya// 'du 'ji med cing sred pa med// yongs su gzung ba'i 'khor yang med// longs spyod min pas longs spyod la// 'chi ba med pa'i zas bza' zhing // 'dod pa'i yon tan
173a2: lnga yang bsten/ / longs spyod med pa'i zas bza' zhing // rnal 'byor bsgom pa'i sgom yang btud// gzhan du gang yang btung ba min// nang gi bdag nyid sbyor ldan pas// rang nyid byin gyis brlabs byas nas// bcom
173a3: ldan mkha' 'gro pi la ba/ / rnal 'byor ma ni nye pi la// thabs ni bi la bar shes bya// shes rab nye ba'i pi la ba// grong khyer mthar ni pi la nyid// grong gi mtha' ni nye bi la// zla ba nyi ma mnyam sbyor ba// bi la dang ni nye pi yin//
173a4: skad cig sbyor ba pi la ba// dga' ba nye ba'i pi la ste// mthu stobs dum ldan pa ni// skye ba 'di la 'grub pa yin// pa shu thams cad bza' bya yin// lha bshos dag kyang de bzhin bsgrub// dpa' bo mkha' 'gro ma 'dus
173a5: nas/ / dus la 'thun pa 'dus byas nas// glu dang gar dang bza' ba dang // 'dus pa mchog gis mchod par bya// rtog pa thams cad rnam spangs nas// dam tshig gi ni spyad pa spyod// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i/
173a6: bla ma las gsal byed mkha' 'gro'i bsgrub pa'i mtshan ma bstan pa ste le'u sum bcu rtsa gcig pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// dngos grub sbyor ba'i rim pa ste// mkha' 'gro ma dang mkha' 'gro
173a7: sbyor/ / dam tshig mchog gi sdom pa yin// chos rnams kun gyi sdom pa ste// mkha' 'gro ma'i bde ba che// mkha' dbyings rdo rje'i dbus gnas pa// dkyil 'khor dam tshig mchog dam pa// de yi dbus su 'khor
173a8: lo che/ / dkyil 'khor lnga yis rnam par brgyan// dbus su nyi ma'i gdan yang mdzes// a li ka li mnyam par ldan// sum bcu rtsa gnyis mtshan dang ldan// dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcu brgyan// byin gyis rlabs pa

173b1: byas nas ni/ / rang gi sa bon las bskyed de// yi ge hi las yang dag 'byung // dus mtha'i me ltar rab tu 'jigs// zhal gyi mche ba rnam par gtsigs// spyan gsum ljags ni bskyod pa'i zhal// gdug pa
173b2: thams cad zhabs 'og gnon/ / khro ba dang ni bzhad pa'i zhal// bskal pa'i mthar yang 'khrug pa ste// ral pa yi ni dbu rgyan can// g.yas brkyang ba'i zhabs kyis bzhugs// mgo bo'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan// 'jig
173b3: byed chen po'i lpags pa yis/ / rkang par sku regs bcings pa yin// thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// sna tshogs rdo rje zla phyed 'chang// dpral ba la ni rdo rje 'phreng // khro bo mthong nas rnam par brtag/ lha rnams thams cad//
173b4: tshar yang gcod// keng rus can gyi brtul zhugs 'dzin// 'chi ba 'tshe bar byed pa'i mchog/ gdug pa thams cad nges par gnon// phyag rgya drug gis sku lus brgyan// sna tshogs rgyan gyis spud pa ste// phyag drug pa la
173b5: zhal lnga pa/ / sna tshogs ro yi bcud mchog can// sngo dang ser dang de bzhin dmar// ljang khu dkar po zhi ba ste// rdo rje dril bu mnyam ldan pas// phag mo yi ni sku lus khyab// lha chen lpags pa 'dzin mdzad cing // bla re
173b6: tshul du brkyang bar mdzad/ / thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// drug pa na ni cang te'u dang // zhabs g.yon du ni dus mtshan mnan// g.yas pa yis ni 'jigs byed de// zhabs kyis 'og tu mnan mdzad cing // rmongs shing rab tu myos
173b7: par mdzad/ / rdo rje phag mo de mdog can// skra grol ba dang gcer bu ste// thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// dum bu'i rgyan gyi ske rags can// byin pa gnyis kyis legs par 'khril// mgul bas 'khyud cing myos pa ste//
173b8: de yi phyag mtshan phyag rgya bsnams// gri gug cang te'u mchog kyang 'dzin// drug pa la ni tshangs pa'i mgo/ 'di 'drar rdo rje mkha' 'gro ni// mkhas pas re'u mig dbus su bkod// shar du sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro

174a1: ste/ / byang du las kyi mkha' 'gro yin// nub tu pad ma'i mkha' 'gre ste// lho ru rin chen mkha' 'gro yin// dkar dang sngo dang dmar ba dang // ljang khu dang ni ser po'o// 'khor lo dril bu mnyam par ldan/
174a2: g.yas brkyang pa yi zhabs kyis bzhugs// ljang khu ser po dmar po sngo// dkar po steng ltas dril bu dang // sna tshogs rdo rje bde chen 'khyud// g.yas brkyang pa yi tshul gyis bzhugs// dmar sngo ser dang ljang khu
174a3: dang / / dkar po yang ni de bzhin no// pad ma dril bus snyoms 'jug cing // lha mo nu ma 'char ba'o// ser po sngon po de bzhin dmar// ljang khu dkar po'i kha dog ste// rin chen dril bus snyoms par 'jug/ g.yas brkyang /
174a4: pa'i zhabs kyis bzhugs// de dag mkha' 'gro lnga yin te// sdom pa lnga yang de nyid do// me dang bden bral rlung dang ni// dbang ldan de ni bzhi po ru// sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro las mkha' 'gro// pad ma'i mkha'
174a5: 'gro rin chen mkha'/ / zhal gsum pa la phyag drug pa// spyan gsum be la skra grol ba// thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan// rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs// phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan// phyogs/
174a6: kyi gos can gar mchog can// mgo yi phreng bas rnam par brgyan// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// rdo rje mda' la stsogs pas brgyan// zhags pa lcags kyu phyag na mdzes// 'dod pa thams cad stsol mdzad cing //
174a7: thugs rje'i re ni yang dag rdzogs// thugs rje'i 'dod pas rnam par myos// cung zad ngo tsha'i mig zur can// dgyes pa stsol bas bde ba ste// de ltar sna tshogs du ma yin// dkyil 'khor rnams ni yongs su
174a8: khya/ / du ma'i gzugs dang gzugs sdug ma// rdo rje mchu dang 'od byed ma// rta gdong dang ni drag po'i gdong // rdo rje drag mo snyan grags ma// rdo rje pho nya rdo rje sem// rdo rje gzhon nu ma de bzhin// kam po ci yang de

174b1: bzhin te/ / rdo rje ro langs ma dang ni// rdo rje ma mo'ang de bzhin te// dri can ma dang 'jigs byed zhal// zla ba'i spyi gtsug de bzhin te// khro gnyer can dang sna tshogs gzugs// rdo rje gri gug de bzhin te// rdo rje lu gu
174b2: rgyud dang ni/ / sku 'phrul lha mo grags byed ma// na la da ki dang ser skya ma// rdo rje 'bar mthal sbyor ma// rdo rje 'jigs byeng ma nyid de// dkyil 'khor 'grub pa'i mkha' tham// ga' gyim na da dag krig sun gags pa lazhas rnam sbyar/
174b3: gsus pa 'phyang la skra grol ba// thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan// rgyan rnams thams cad yang dag rdzogs// phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan// phyogs kyi gos can gar mchog ste// mgo bo'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan//
174b4: thams cad ro yi gdan la bzhugs// sna tshogs gzugs can yid 'phrog pa// thod pa kha T+wAM ga 'dzin cing // zhags pa lcags kyu phyag na bsnams// rdo rje mchog ni gsor mdzad cing // dril bu da ni cang te'u mchog/ zhal
174b5: gsum dpa' zhing sgeg pa ste/ / thugs rje'i mnyams ni yongs su rdzogs// spyan ni zur gyis gzigs mdzad cing // dgyes pa'i rtsol bas g.yo ba ste// dngos grub thams cad stsol mdzad cing // sgrub pa po kun rjes su
174b6: chags/ / zla ba drug gis sgrub pa po// mkha' 'gro ma'i 'khor lo 'grub// yid gnyis med par dngos grub mchog/ mkha' 'gro thod par byed pa yin// dus 'dir de ma thag tu yang // mkha' la spyod par the tsom med// nang //
174b7: gi pho brang de nyid ni// re'u mig dgu sogs sgo/ dang bcas// sgo ru lha mo bzhi bkod la// mkha' 'gro ma ni dngos grub ster// phyi rol dkyil 'khor lha mo bri// snam bu'i mtshams bzhi de ru ni// lha mo nyi shu dgod bya zhing // mkha'
174b8: 'gro ma sogs phyogs mtshams su/ / zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// phyi rol dkyil 'khor dag tu brtags// sgo rnams su ni lha mo bzhi// 'dod pa'i 'bras bu thams cad ster// rta babs bzhis ni rnam par brgyan// zur gyi chen

175a1: thams cad dang / / sgo dang sgo khyud mtshams rnams su// rdo rje rin chen gyis brgyan cing // phyi rol dkyil 'khor thig gdab bo// de yi nang du re'u mishi gra// sgo rnams kyang ni bya ba ste// 'di ltar mkha' 'gro ma pa
175a2: 'gro ma/ / dra ba'i sdom pa stong pa ste// byang chub phyogs ni sum bcu bdun// chos kyi rnam par dag pa yin// dbus su sa ni bcu sum te// phyi rol gnas dang nye ba'i gnas// dur khrod dang ni nye dur khrod// 'di ltar
175a3: sbyor bas rnam dag par/ / sdom pa mchog ni sgom par bya// de ni thugs kyi ye shes te// ye shes mkha' 'gro mkha' 'gro ma'o// phung po khams dang skye mched la// cho ga gnyis po sbyar bar bya// ye shes mchog gi
175a4: sdom pa ste/ / gsang ba gsum gyi 'khor lo dgod// khyod dang phyed du rnam par dgod// mkha' 'gro gsum ni 'khor lo'i dbus// dam tshig rnal 'byor 'byung ba che// ye shes 'khor lo bkug nas ni// zhabs bsil byas
175a5: nas gzhug par bya/ / ye shes chu yis dbang bskur nas// gtso bo dag ni rnam par bsgom// bdag med chos kyi ro kun gyi// dam tshig mchog ni dri ma med// ba spu khung bu thams cad las// dam tshig gsang ba
175a6: gsum spros nas/ / sems can ma lus dam tshig gi/ mkha' 'gro ru ni rab gnas bya// 'bad pa yis ni bsdus nas kyang // gsang ba gsum du gzhug par bya// sngon grub pa'i mkha' 'gro ni// byin rlabs gnas/
175a7: su dgod par bya// 'di ni rdo rje theg chen ste// mkha' 'gro spyod pa'i gnas la bzhugs// sdom pa mchog gi bzlas pa yis// bla na med pa'i go 'phang ste ra// dus bzhi dag tu ci 'dod par// skyo ba med par rtag tu bsgom//
175a8: lugs su 'byung dang bzlog pa yis// 'khor lo mchog ni rnam par spros kha spu'i khung bu las mdun du// bde mchog spros nas mchod par bya// rdo rje gsum ni dbang bskur nas// 'gog pa'i khro bo rnam par sgom//

175b1: ye shes khro bo lhan cig tu// sprin gyi 'brug sgra lta bur bzla// 'gro zhing 'ong ba sbyor ba yis// mi smra rdo rje brtul zhugs che// zhag bdun gyis ni nges par yang // mthu dang stobs ni 'grub 'gyur te// g.yo zhing ldeg par byang ba
175b2: dang / / 'khrug cing g.yengs dang gzhug pa dang // nad med pa ni nad yod byed// nad yod pa ni nad med byed// de ltar bsgom pa byas nas ni// las 'dir the tsom med pa yin// nang gi bdag nyid sbyor ldan pas// bsgoms
175b3: dang bzlas la dga' ba dang / / dam tshig zas la dga' ba ni// thog pa med par tshe yang brtan// 'di ltar rang gi cho gas bzlas// sangs rgyas gnas su legs par 'jug/ de ni dam tshig 'khor lo ni// mkhas pas bsgom
175b4: mchod bzlas pa bya/ / gsang sngags 'di dag bshad par bya// oM shrI badz+ra DA ka a d+hi hUM// DA ki nI dz+wa la sam bar hUM hUM phaT swA hA// oM shrI bud+d+ha DA ka a b+h+rUM hUM DA ki nI dzA la sam ba ra hUM hUM phaT swA hA// oM shI karma DA ka a
175b5: khaM hUM DA ki nI dzA la sam ba ra hUM hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM shrI pad ma DA ka a hri hUM DA ki nI dzA la sam ba ra hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM shrI rad na DA ka a oM hUM DA ki nA dzA la sa ma ba ra hUM hUM phaT swA hA// mkha' 'gro bzhi po de dag dang //
175b6: mkha' 'gro ma dang lA ma dang // dum skyes ma dang gzugs can ma// mgrin pa mnyam par bsnol ba ste// byin pa gnyis kyis legs par 'khril// de yi mdog dang phyag dang zhal// phyag mtshan rnams kyang rnam par
175b7: bsgom/ / lha mo mngon du byas nas ni// snying po'i gsang sngags so so yin// oM shrI badz+ra bA rA he ba hU~MHphaT swA hA/ oM shrI DA ki nI nI hUM hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM shI lA me laM hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM shrI kaN Da rA ho khaM hUM hUM phaT swa
175b8: oM shrI rU bi nI ruM hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ 'di ni lnga po'i bdag nyid kyi'o// mtshams kyi mkha' 'gro ma'i sngags ni// oM shrI bud d+ha DA nI hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM shI ka ma DA ki nI hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM shrI bad ma DA ki nI hU~M hUM phaT swA hA/

176a1: oM shrI rad na D+ha kin+tI dz+nyA ts+tsha phaT swAH/ sgo ru mkha' 'gro ma yi sngags// 'dod pa'i 'bras bu thams cad ster// bzhi po sna tshogs mdog can te / ji bzhin rigs kyi kun la khyab/ oM tsAR+sha be hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM dz+dza
176a2: su rU pe hUM hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra dun ti hUM hUM phaT/ oM pra b+ha ka ri hUM hUM phaT// shar phyogs kyi ni snam bu la// lha mo bzhi po dgod pa ste// sku lus dkar po'i mdog can la// de yi gsang sngags bshad pa yin// oM badz+ra b+ha/
176a3: Ta ba mu khi hUM hUM phaT/ oM go ra mu khi hUM hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra go Ne hUM hU~M phaT/ oM ya sha s+thi ni hU~M hUM phaT/ lho phyogs kyi ni snam bu la// lha mo bzhi po dgod par bya// sku mdog dag ni ser ba ste// de yi sngags su bshad pa yin/
176a4: oM badz+ra d+hA ti hUM hUM phaT/ oM na ki hUM hUM phaT/ oM kau mA rI hUM hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kaM b+ho dzi hUM hUM phaT// nub phyogs kyi ni snam bu la// lha mo bzhi po sku mdog dmar po can gyi sngags yin no// oM badz+ra bet+tA li hUM hUM phaT/ oM
176a5: badz+ra sI ka hUM hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra ga ra ra hUM hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra bi maM ba dAne hUM hUM phaT// byang gau snam bu la lha mo bzhi sku mdog ljang bu de'i gsang sngags bshad pa yin no// oM tsaN Da she khA re hUM hUM phaT/ oM b+hi ku Te n+d+ra
176a6: hUM phaT/ oM bau tha rU ba hUM hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra ka Ta ya ni hUM hUM phaT/ dab ldan la stsogs pa'i mtshams bzhi ru lha mo bzhi po gzugs gnyis pa'i mdog can te/ de'i sngags bshad pa// oM badz+ra shr-ing kha le hUM hU~M pa Ta mo ba
176a7: mA ye hUM hUM phaT/ oM badz+re yaM shag+ha dz+nyA d+hUb// oM badz+ra na lA ge ts+tsha hUM phaT/ sgo rnams su ni lha mo bzhi po sna tshogs pa'i mdog can drag po'i gzugs dang ldan pa ste// de'i sngags su bshad pa// shar du ma shrI badz+ra
176a8: bing ga le dzaHhUM hUM phaT/ g+ho ru oM bo dz+re dz+wa la ni hU~M hU~MH/ nub du oM badz+ra kuN Da li ba ba hUM hUM phaT/ byang du oM badz+ra b+hai ra bA ho hUM hUM phaT// thams cad gsal byed mtha ru ni// shI ni sbyar zhing mchogar mi bzhin//

176b1: sngags pas de ltar bzlas na ni// mkha' 'gro ma ni dra ba yi// sdom pa'i dngos grub thob pa ste// zla ba drug gis bde dbang 'gyur// gcig tu byas te bsdus na ni// rnal 'byor chen po gzi byin can// dra ba'i mchog ni
176b2: 'grub par 'gyur/ / gsang sngags 'di dag thams cad ni// khri 'am 'bum du bzlas na ni// gsang sngag rgyal po 'grub pa yin// snying po dag ni bzlas pa yis// dpa' bo mkha' 'gro ma grub cing // rang nyid ji ltar
176b3: 'dod par gyur/ / gzhan gyi lus su zhugs 'gro zhing // mi snang ba dag thob nas ni// rnal 'byor chen po rnam par spyod// sna tshogs gzugs ni 'dzin pa yin// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las dam tshig gi
176b4: sdom pa 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba'i le'u ste sum bcu rtsa gnyis pa'o/ / // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro'i cho ga'i rim// sngar bshad sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro yi/ lung
176b5: la stsogs pa'i rim pa bya/ / rnal 'byor lung ni mi shes pa// sangs rgyas mu stegs can yin te// rtag tu lung ni spang mi bya// dkon mchog gsum ni me spang zhing // sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la// rtag tu bdag ni skyabs
176b6: su 'gro/ / shes rab pha rol phyin dmigs na// rnal 'byor gyi ni dngos grub 'grub// gcig car 'jug pa'i sbyor ba yis// bdag gi lus ni rnam par bsam// sngo zhing drag la bzhin rnam sbyar// gtum zhing 'jigs la
176b7: 'jigs par mdzad/ / zhal gyi mche ba rnam par gtsigs// ral ba zla byed spyi gtsug 'ching // sna tshogs rdo rjes ral pa gnon// thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan// rgyan rnams thams cad yang dag rdzogs// baM hU~M
176b8: badz+ra las byung sku lus can/ / phyag rgya drug dang yang dag ldan// stag gi lpags pa gos su bsnabs// dkyil dkrung phyed pa legs par gnas// spyan gsum drag po'i sku lus can// mgrin pa bzhi la zhal bzhi

177a1: pa/ bcu gnyis phyag dang yang dag ldan// stong pa'i ye shes yang dag mchog/ gdug pa kun gyi thod pa'i phreng // dus mtha' las byung ngo shul can// gdug pa kun ni zhabs 'og gnon// nyon mongs 'jigs
177a2: byed mgo bo dang / / sred pa gti mug phrag dog ste// dus mtshan ngo ni khas phub la// gdug pa'i bgegs ni 'jigs pa can// thams cad zhabs kyi 'og tu gnon// nam mkha' dang ni skye ba dang // dkar ba dang ni dmar
177a3: pa dang / ljang khu steng du bltas pa'i zhal/ rdo rje dril bu mnyam ldan pa// phag mo dag dang bde bar 'khyud// kun tu gnyis med sbyor ba yis// chos rnams kun gyi ro gcig tu// sbyangs pa'i yon tan zhes bya ba//
177a4: dpal gyi bde ba chen po ni// rdo rje he ru ka nyid yin// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// chos kyi 'khor lo khar sil dang // lhung bzed mdung dang zhags pa dang // lcags kyu mgo bocang te'u dang // g.yas dang g.yon pa'i phyag
177a5: dag gis/ / nA ra'i lpags pa brkyang nas bsnams// shar du ma tang gi deng Do ma pi ka/ dza ra ki dang puk+ka sI// kha Ta ki dang sha ba ri/ dzaM ba ri dang sa ma ri// lha mo brgyad po de dag ni/ ji bzhin rim pas rjes su dgod// ser dang
177a6: sngo dang de bzhin dmar/ / dung pa yi ni mdog can te// dmar dang ljang dang dung kha'i mdog/ brgyad pa dkar po nyid yin no// sgo rnams su ni dgod bya ba// khrag 'thung rdo rje gtum mo dang // rdo rje sring mchog ma dang ni//
177a7: rje 'jigs byed drag mo ste// gdul dka' thams cad gsol mdzad cing // thal ba sprin mdog ljang khu dang // dmar dang sngo dang lhag par 'jigs// brgyad pa'i dbus su chos khang sil// zod bcang te'u gri gug ste//
177a8: phrag pa'i steng du gos 'dzin pa'o// sgo rnams su ni lha mo bzhi// thod pa kha T+wAM mi 'jigs pa// chos kyi khar sil cang te'u// nal cig pa la phyag bzhi pa// yi dgas gdan gyi steng du ni// dkyil dkrung phyed pa'i

177b1: gar gyis bzhugs/ / bsod snyoms pa dang chos gos gsum// phyis mi len dang cog pu pa// bzhi ci bzhin dang stan cig pa// bla gab med dang shing drung ba// dgon pa pa dang dur khrod dang // khrod pa dang ni phying pa pa'o//
177b2: 'di dag ji lta'i rim pa yis// sbyangs pa'i yon tan rnam dag bsgom// ye shes mnyam pa'i dam tshig mchog/ ro cig tu ni rnam par bsgom// oM shrI ma hA su kha badz+ra he he ru ru gaM a hUM hUM hUM phaT/ oM ma ma tAM gi hUM hUM
177b3: phaT/ oM daM badz+ra DoM bi hU~M hUM phaT/ oM r-i rA dza gi hUM hUM phaT/ oM puM buk+ka sI hUM hUM phaT/ oM khaM kha Ta ki hUM hUM phaT/ oM shaM sha pa ri hU~M hUM phaT/ oM dzi dzi pa ri hUM hUM phaT/ oM saM sa ma ri hUM hUM phaT/ oM ha~M he ru ki hUM hUM phaT/ oM ba
177b4: badz+ra tsaN Di hU hUM phaT/ oM hUM badz+ra rak+Sha si hUM hUM phaT/ oM b+haM badz+ra b+hai ra bI hUM hUM phaT/ de kun gcer bu skra grol ba// na gsum pa la zhi ba ste// mche ba rnam gtsigs lce bskyong zhing // phyag rgya lnga yis sku lus brgyan/ thong ba'i
177b5: phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can/ bzhad dang zhi dang snying rje dang // sgeg pa dang ni rngam pa dang // drag cing khro ba'i nyams can to// bzlas dang bsgom pa spro zhing bsdu// lus ngag yid la bde bar gnas// sems can mos pa sna tshogs pa//
177b6: gdul ba'i thabs kyis bde ba yis// yul la yongs su spyod pa na// bla med ye shes 'bras bu 'thob// sems can thams cad 'di yis bde// 'chi med bde ba'i longs spyod kyis/ ye shes 'bras bu rnyed pa yin//
177b7: 'di ni sems can thangs cad kyi mchog gi go 'phang thob pa'o// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyung bla ma'i bla ma las sbyangs pa'i yon tan bskyed pa'i le'u ste sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'o// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/
177b8: char dbab cho ga'i rim pa ni// pad ma mdab ma brgyad mchog gi/ lte bar ge sar bcas pa la// de yi dbus su rdo rje che// mche ba rnam gtsigs 'jigs pa can// phyag brgyad pa la zhal bzhi pa// spyan gsum 'jig

178a1: pa'ang rab tu 'jigs/ / rdo rje mtshon ni gsor mdzad cing // sdigs 'dzub zhags par ldan pa dang // thod pa dang ni khwa T+wAM 'dzin// lcags kyu dang ni mdung bsnams shing // dpa' bo'i lpags pa bsdams shing
178a2: 'dzin/ / cang te'u dang ni brgyad par bshad// g.yas brkyang pa'i zhabs kyis ni// chu lU 'jigs pa myos pa gnon// zla ba phyed pa ral pa 'ching // sna tshogs rdo rjes rnam par brgyan// phyag rgya drug gis srul brgya mthong
178a3: pa'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ / stag gi lpags pa gos su mnabs// thod pa'i phreng bas gcod pan mchog/ mchus gnon zhal gdong rnam sbyar zhing // khro bar lta zhing 'jigs par gzigs// 'dab ma
178a4: brgyad la klu brgyad bri/ / mtha' yas dang ni nor rgyas dang // 'jog po pad ma pad ma che// dung skyong dang ni stobs kyi rgyu// dga' bo dang ni brgyad yin te// dkar dang sngo dang dmar dang ldang // ser dang dud pa'i mdog can te// ljang
178a5: khwa dang ni ser po ste/ / thal mo sbyar bar byas nas ni// bcom ldan 'das la mngon phyogs pa// 'jigs pas bka' drin slong bar byed// skrag pas lta zhing gnas pa'o// bcom ldan sku lus sngon po can// 'jigs shing
178a6: shin tu 'jigs par mdzad/ / g.yas pa dud kha dmar po ste// g.yon pa ljang khu dud kha'o// steng gi zhal ni mkha' lding gdong // zhal rnam sgyur zhing 'jigs pa'o// nyi ma dmar po'i gzi brjid can// nyi ma bcu gnyis
178a7: nyi mnyam 'od/ / phag mo dag gis mgul 'khyud cing // byin pa gnyis kyis legs par 'khril// yang na phyag ni bcu gnyis pa// bde chen mchog ni bcu gnyis pa// gri gu tshangs pa'i mgo bo dang // rdo rje dril bu yang
178a8: dag ldan/ / lha mo'i mchu ni rnam par 'chir// gcer bu dbu skra grol ba dang // spyan gsum pa la sku regs can// 'dzam bu'i chu bo mchog gi sku// gnyis su med par sbyor bar gnas// klu ni rang gi chung mar bcas//

178b1: chu lha'ang chung mar bcas pa dag/ chu lha'i lus ni dkar po can// bka' drin dag ni slong par byed// snying khar ye shes 'khor lo dang // de mdog phyag dang zhal yang bskyed// de yi snying kha hA nA hUM dgod cing // lus ngag
178b2: yid kyang de bzhin te/ / klu yi rang snying de nyid la// hU nA nA ni rnam par dgod// gsang sngags rgyal po'i cho ga ni/ khro bo'i tshig ltar bzlas brjod bye// dri bo'i 'gram la margya
178b3: 'am/ / khrod pa'am klu yi mtsho dang ni// rdzing bu lteng ka rnams su ni// blo can khro bo'i bzlas pa bya// yang na klu'i gnas su ni// bsgom pa bzlas pa dag la 'jug/ oM shrI badz+ra he he ru ru ka hU nA rA ga ba ri sha pa ya hU DA ki nI/
178b4: dza la sa pa ba ra phaT swA hA// 'di dag bsgoms te khri tsam bzla// dus bzhi dag tu stong du'o// zhag bdun gyis ni nges par yang // sa rnams kun tu char 'bab 'gyur// dam tshig sbyin sreg mchod dus su// glu dang gar ni nyid
178b5: ldan pas/ / 'o ma dag ni bza' zhing bdung // rnal 'byor pas ni gru brgyad bzla// 'o ma'i khrus kyis cho ga yis// 'o mas spyir bsreg bsregs thugs bya// 'o ma'i shing gi bud shing bya// 'o ma'i shing gi yam shing dang // 'o mar ba
178b6: pas sbyin sreg bya/ / bum pa'o mas yongs su dgang // me sogs mtshams dang phyogs rnams su// 'o mar bcas pa'i gtor ma sbyin// e a a nan ta ya hU rI hU swA hA/ a b+ha bA su kaM hUM r-I hUM swA hA/ oM ta tak+Sha ka hU rA/
178b7: sUswA nA~M/ oM pa pad ma pU rA hwA swA hA// oM ma ma hA pad ma tsU r+tha tsu swA hA/ oM sha sha~M ka pA la nu r-I hU~M swA hA/ oM kaM kar ko Ta tsU rA hU swAhA/ oM aM an ba ta ba ta hU hA rA hU sA hA/ a nu ba~M bai ru rA ya nA ga d+hi be rA ga baR+Sha
178b8: pA da ya hU rA hU swA hA/ / / 'di bzlas khro ba dang bcas pas// kun gyi bzlas pa khri tsam bya// 'o ma 'bras rnying zas su bza'// dbang po thul cing yong mi smra// bri gzugs spangs pa'i mngon sum du// khri tsam bzlas na

179a1: mngon du 'gyur/ / mngon sum du ni dngos grub cing // smras pa tsam gyis char 'bebs te// 'di la the tsom ma byed cig/ dngul gyi snod kyi nang du ni/ nyung dkar dang ni chu blugs la// de la nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar
179a2: du yongs su bzlas te/ / sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs la dri chu dang 'o ma bsres pas khrus byas te/ chu 'gram gyis smras pa las klu'i gzugs byas la nub tu mgo bstan te// mgo bo dgu la chus dbang bskur te// de nas chu bI
179a3: nang du gzhug go/ / de ma thag tu lhas char 'bebs shing // 'dzam bu'i gling du char 'bebs 'gyur// sa rnams 'bru yis gang 'gyur zhing // nags tshal rnams ni 'phel bar byed// sems can thams cad bde reg gnas//
179a4: phan tshun khro bo'i gzugs can ni// bdag bsgoms rgyud kyi rjes 'brangs nas// rang gi snying kha kho nar ni// he ru rdo rje bsgoms pa yis// char pa yang ni 'bab par 'gyur// ri'i steng du 'dzegs te rtse gsum pa la yongs
179a5: su bzlas na ser ba gcod par 'gyur ro/ / cang te'u la yongs su bzlas na me mched pa'i me rengs par 'gyur ro// zhags pa la yongs su bzlas na 'gugs par byed de// thod pa la yongs su bzlas na khrag 'gugs par
179a6: byed do/ / dgra sta la yongs su bzlas na gsod par byed do// kha T+wAM ga la yongs su bzlas na zhi bar byed do// gri gug la yongs su bzlas na 'jig rten gsum du rgyu ba gsod par byed do// mge bo la yongs su bzlas na 'chi ba
179a7: slong bar byed do/ / rdo rje gsor zhing yongs su bzlas nas 'og gi dngos grub du 'gyur ro// dril bu la yongs su bzlas na mi dga' ba yongs su 'gugs par byed do// glang po che'i lpags pa la yongs su bzlas te bting
179a8: na bar sdang la 'phur bar 'gyur te/ / dpag cad stong phrag brgyar 'gro zhing slar ldeg go// phyag rgya drug la yongs su bzlas na pha rol gyi mdun du mi snang bar 'gyur ro// sa steng du ni kun spyod cing / ci bde bar ni gnas

179b1: par 'gyur/ / mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bra ma'i bla ma las char dbab pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste sus bcu rtsa bzhi 'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad byub// gsang ba mchog ni mdor bsdus nas// skad cig pra
179b2: ni bdag smram pa/ / te rug dpal gzugs su b+ha/ sngozhing drag po nam sbyar ba// drag po spyan gsum zhal drug mchog/ zlab phyed pa ral pa 'dir// sna tshogs rdo rje dbul chog la// thod pa'i phreng ba'i dru rgyan
179b3: can/ / rdo rje 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan// skul mgo bo'i do shal can// phyag rgya drug gi rnam par brgyan// stag ga lpags pa gos su bsnabs// phag mo yis ni skul brgyan// zhabs cig pa ni bzhengs pa ste// g.yas
179b4: pa ser la dud pa'i mdog/ g.yon pa dmar la ljang khu'o// steng gi zhal ni rta gdong ste/ dkar zhing sprin mdog drag cing 'jigs// rdo rje dril bu mnyam par ldan// lha mo mchu ni 'tshir ba ste// rgyal ba'i lpags pa gos
179b5: su bstabs/ / mkha' 'gro ma yi rigs 'dzin cing // thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// rdo rje mtshan gyis brgyan pa ste// zhags pa lcags kyu phyag na bsnams// cang te'u dang ni mgo bo 'dzin// gri gug zhags pa de
179b6: bzhin te/ / phyag ni bcu gnyis dag tu bshad// dkyil 'khor dag ni thams cad kyang // zhabs cig ni rnam par bsgom// glang po'i gdong dang bye'u'i gdod// seng ge'i gdong yang de bzhin te// dang po khyi yi gdong
179b7: yin te/ / gnyis pa 'ug pa'i gdong yang yin// gsum pa phag gi gdong yin te// bzhi pa khwa yi gdong can no// gnas kyi dbyibs kyi chos bdag nyid// sna tshogs gzugs ni chen po 'dzin// mtha' yas rnam rgyal
179b8: grags pa ste/ / thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad pa// ji ltar 'dod pa'i sku lus 'chang // de bzhin bsgom zhing rnam bsgom ste// sna tshogs gzugs can rin chen bzhin// bdag nyid chen po rnam par rol// mdzen

180a1: bar brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las sna tshogs bsgrub pa'i le'u ste sum bcu rtsa lnga pa'o/ / // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// phag mo'i mchog ni bsgrub pa ste// bskyed pa'i rim pa'i sbyor ba yis//
180a2: bdag nyid bsgom zhing rnam par bsgom// sku ni nyi ma bcu gnyis gzi// sku lus sin dur 'dra ma g.yo// me tog ban duka lta bu// zhal gsum pa la phyag drug pa// rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs// sems
180a3: dpa'i dkyil mod krung gis bzhugs/ / thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// rdo rje dril bu mnyam par ldan// dbu skra mdzes pas 'khril ba ste// thabs kyi zhal mchu rnam 'ching zhing // mda' dang gzhu ni 'dzin pa ste// rna ba'i
180a4: mthar thug 'gengs par byed/ / thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// lcags kyu mchog gis 'gugs pa ste// pad ma dmar po'i dbus bzhugs shing // 'dod pa thams cad rab tu stsol// yang na phyag ni bcu gnyis pa// zhal drug/
180a5: lha mo'i sku lus 'byung // steng gi zhal ni phag rgod gdod// drag po'i gzi brjid 'jigs pa'i gzi// shar gyi'i dpal rdo rje gsang ba'i mchog/ g.yon pa'i phyogs su rdo rje dam tshig mchog/ nub kyi phyogs su rdo rje gzi brji
180a6: mchog/ lho yi phyogs su rdo rje rin chen mchog/ me yi phyogs su rdo rje ye shes mchog/ bden bral phyogs su rdo rje rig mchog ma// rlung gi phyogs su rdo rje grub mchog ma// dbang ldan phyogs su rdo rje thal mchog
180a7: ma/ sgo la rdo rje 'bar mchog ma// rdo rje gzi brjid mchog ma ste// rdo rje khro bo mchog ma dang // rdo rje mche ba mchog ma'o// lha mo de dag thams cad kyang // dmar ba'i mdog can zhal gsum ma/ phyag drug pa la spyan
180a8: gsum pa/ / sems dpa'i dkyil mo dkrung du bzhugs// dbu skra dag ni grol ba ste// thams cad rgyan gyis rnam brgyan cing // rdo rje dril bu mnyam ldan pas// rang gi lus kyi thabs la 'khril// zhags pa dang ni lcags

180b1: kyadang / zod dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// grwa bzhi dag tu mda' gzhu dag/ yongs su 'gengs pa gnas par gzhag/ sgo ru g.yas brkyang zhabs kyis bzhugs// gcar bu rnam par 'gyur ba'i zhal// thams cad yi dgas gdan la
180b2: bzhugs/ / rdo rje gsor zhing sdigs 'dzub dang // zhags pa dang ni yang dag ldan// gzhan yang phan tshun dag tu yang // ji ltar 'khor la stsogs phyag 'tshal// de snying ye shes lha mo ni// sku gsung thugs dang bcas par bsgom
180b3: ye shes dkyil 'khor sbyor ba yis/ / chos kyi ro ni mnyam par thim// ye shes bzlas pa spros nas ni// cho ga'i rim pas yang dag bsdu// dam tshig mchog gi bzlas pa yis// zla ba'i de nyid 'grub par 'gyur// e hrI
180b4: badz+ra bA rA hi A ba hUM hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM shrI badz+ra gu h+ya ud ta me hUM hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM shrI badz+ra sa ma ya ud ta me hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM shrI badz+ra ti dze ud ta me d+ha ga Ar+tha/ oM shrI badz+ra rad na ud ta me hUM hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM hrI
180b5: badz+ra ud ta me ts+tshaSh+Ta AH/ oM shrI badz+ra bi d+ya ud ta me hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM shrI badz+ra sid d+ho swA mud ta me tsU hUM phaT swA hA/ oM shrI badz+ra b+hasmai ud ta me hUM phaT/ oM shrI bad+da dz+wa la ut+ta me tra ny+dza hU~M phaT/ oM shrI badz+ra amr-iH
180b6: ud ta me hUM hU~M phaT/ oM shrI badz+ra kro d+ha ud ta me baM hUM phaT/ oM shrI badz+ra daMSh+Ta ud ta me ho hU~M phaT/ 'di dag ji lta'i rim pa yis/ bsgom pa dang ni bzlas pa bya// spu dang spro ba byas nas ni// chos rnams kun dang chos
180b7: can no/ / rang gi lha yi sbyor bas dag/ sems can thams cad rab tu brtag/ rnal 'byor gnas ni chos yin te// gsang ba gsum la rab tu gzhug/ gsang gsum gnas ni chos yin te// chos kyang de bzhin
180b8: de lta bu/ / bdag med chos ni chos yin te// chos las chos ni yod ma yin// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las gsang ba gsum gyi dam tshig gi mchog ces bya ba'i le'u ste sum bcu rtsa drug pa'o

181a1: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ / rnal 'byor ma drug cho ga'i rim// pad ma mdab lnga bris nas ni// lte bge sar khyab par ni// de yi dbus su phag mo ni// dmar zhing sna tshogs 'bar ba'i 'od/
181a2: zhal gsum pa la phyag drug mdzes// spyan gsum dbu skra grol ba ste// thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// phyogs kyi gos ni 'dzin pa'i mchog/ dkyil dkrung phyed pa gar dang bcas// phyag rgya drug gis sku
181a3: brgyan cing / / mgo bo'i phreng ba 'dzin pa ste// gdug pa'i bdud ni thams cad dang // dus mtshan khas sbub byas pa yi// zhabs kyis kyang ni mnan par bzhugs// dmar dang sngo dang ldang ba ste// sangs rgyas lngas ni rnam pa
181a4: brgyan/ / thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// zhags pa lcags kyu phyag na bsnams// mgo bo dang ni gri gug 'dzin// dngos grub thams cad rab tu stsol// snying kar ye shes dam tshig ni// sku gsung thugs su sbyor las byung /
181a5: shar phyogs lha mo ya mi ni// g.yon du bskor nas rnam par dgod// mongs byed ma dang skyong byed ma// skrag byed ma dang naN Di ka/ spyan gsum dbu skra grol ba ste// zhal cig pa la phyag bzhi pa// sngo dang dkar dang ser ba
181a6: dang / / ljang khu dud pa'i mdog can te// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// dril bu cang te'u gri gug dang // thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan// phyogs kyi gos can gar gyi mchog/ mgo bo'i
181a7: phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ / mi bskyod pa'i cod pan 'chang // thugs rje'i nyams kyi bde ba ste// gnyis med sbyor bas mnyam par ldan// rdo rje sems sogs mchog de nyid// phag mo dang ni rdo rje sems// ya mi ni
181a8: dang rnam snang mdzad/ / rmongs byed ma dang pad ma'i gar// skyong byed ma dang khrag 'thung ste// skrag byed rdo rje nyi mo dang // tsaN Di ka dang rta mchog ste// rdo rje sems sku dkar po ste// rnam par snang mdzad ser po yin// pad

181b1: ma gar dbang dmar po ste/ / he ru ka dpal sngon po yin// rdo rje nyi ma dmar po ste// rta mchog dag ni ljang khu'o// yang naso sang bsgom par bya// rdo rje sems dpa' zhal gsum pa// phyag drug spyan ni gsum pa te/
181b2: phyag rgya drug gi mtshan gyis brgyan// rdo rje dril bu thod khaT+wAM// ral gri cang te'u mgo bo 'chang // nA ra'i lpags mnabs gang dang bcas// rnam snang la stsogs dpa' bo kun// zhal cig pa la phyog bzhi pa//
181b3: bdang ni kha TA dang // cang te'u dril bus mtshan ma'i mchog/ yang na thams cad phyag bcu gnyis// zhal gdod drug par bsgom par bya// de dag gsang sngags 'di yin te// oM shrI oM bA bA hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM shrI
181b4: haMyo yaM hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM shrI hriM mo moM hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM shrI hreM hriM saM hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM shrI hUM hUM saM hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM shrI phaT phaT tsaM hUM hUM phaT swA hA// de dag ni rnal 'byor ma drug gi gsang sngags so//
181b5: oM haHbaM hUM phaT swA hA// oM bruM hUM phaT swA hA// oM swa hA hu~M hriM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM bau Sha Te hai he hUM phaT swA hA/ oM hUM hUM ho tre hUM phaT swA hA/ oM phaT haM haM hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ 'di ni dpa' bo drug gi sngags// bzlas pa dang ni bsgos
181b6: tsam gyis/ / 'khor lo drug ni mchog grub cing / 'khor lo sgyur ba thob pa ste// 'khor los sbyar drug rgyal por 'gyur// mi 'pham rgyal ba yang dag rdzogs// stobs chen rtsal mchog rnyed pa yin// phyag mtshan drug la rtag
181b7: mchod cing / / cho ga bzhin du mngon sngags na// de ni myur du grub nas ni// rnal 'byor rgyal po'i mchog kyang thob// mi snang la stsogs grub nas ni// khams gsum dag tu rnam par spyod// 'gro ba drug gi sems can grol// bsgom
181b8: pas rdo rje 'dzin dang mtshungs/ / yang na 'khor lo zur drug la// bde ba chen po rnam snang mdzad// 'jam pa'i rdo rje 'chang rgyal po// 'khor los sgyur ba bdag po ni// gur gum gyis ni mdog lta bu// gzi mdangs 'bar ba'i

182a1: ga/ 'od can te// phyag rgya che dang yang dag ldan// chos kyi dbyings kyi rang ngo po// rdo rje dril bu dang ldan pa'i// g.yas dang g.yon pa'i phyogs kyis 'khyung // ral gri bo ta kha T+wAM la/ thod pa lcags kyu zhags pa dang // mud pa/
182a2: la dang cang te'u// gung dgub mdog dang sngo ba dang // dmar dang ljang khu steng zhal dkar// chos kyi dbyings ni dag pa che// sems can khams ni rab grol byed// shar sogs g.yon bskor dgod pa na// rta mchog tsa ba'i kA dang
182a3: bcas/ / de dag de ru dgod byas pas// 'jam pa'i rdo rje rang nyid grub// dkar dang dmar dang ser ba dang // sngo dang dmar dang dkar sngo ldang // yan lag drug tu dpa' bo dag/ mkha' 'gro ma dang lhan cig bcas// rdo rje sem/
182a4: dang phag mo dang // rnam snang mdzad dang ya mi ni// pad ma gar dbang rmongs byed bcas// khrag 'thung dang ni skyod byed ma// rdo rje nyi ma skrag byed ma// ljang dang dung ba'i mdog can te// de lha'i sku mdog rnam par bsgom//
182a5: zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa'o// lha mo rnams ni phyag gnyis pa'o// thod pa dang ni gri gug 'dzin// dpa' bo thod pa kha T+wAM ga/ rang gi phyag mtshan gnyis med sbyor// dril bu lhan cig yang dag ldan// cang te'u ni 'dzin
182a6: pa'i mchog/ spyan gsum pa la g.yas brkyang bzhugs// stag gi lpags pa'i sham thabs can// thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// mgo bo'i do shal 'dzin pa ste// thams cad yi dgas steng du bzhugs//
182a7: dbus su 'jigs byed dus mtshan gnon// lha mo byin pa gnyis kyis 'khril// skra grol ba la phyogs gos can// snying khar ye shes dam tshig ni// sku gsung thugs dang rnam par sbyar// go cha gnyis pa yang dag
182a8: sbyar/ / gnas kyi 'khor lo bsgoms nas ni// dpa' bo mkha' 'gro ma rnams dgod// gsang ba gsum ni snying khar gnas// kha gdong la stsogs mkha' 'gro ma// phyi rol sgo ru rnam par dgod// zung ngu gshin rje

182b1: sreg la stsogs/ / thams cad gcer bu rnam par sgom// sngar bshad mdog dang phyag mtshan te// yi dgas gdan la yang dag bzhugs// g.yas brkyang ba'i zhabs kyis gnas// drag po srani grol ba ste/ mas
182b2: cad thod pa'i phreng ba can/ / rang gi phyi dang nang du yang // pha rol phyin drug rnam par dag/ bsgom zhing rab tu bsgom par bya// spro zhing bsdu ba'i sbyor ba yis// gsang ba'i 'khor lo bzlas pa bya// dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma
182b3: bzlas na/ / bsgom zhing rab tu bsgom par bya// sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i tshogs spros nas// 'gro ba gsum po rdzogs par byas// nang gi bdag nyid bsgoms pa yis// 'khor lo gsum gsang bsgoms nas bzla// de nyid gsum
182b4: dang sngags lhan cig/ dpa' bo dang ni mkha' 'gro ma// hUM hUM phaT ni mtha' ru ste// 'khor lo gsum gyi bzlas pa bya// rnal 'byor cho ga bzhin du ni// dam tshig can gyis de bzlas bya// oM shrI ma dz+ra badz+ra a hUM maM hUM hUM phaT swA
182b5: hA oM haHbadz+ra satwa hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM ba~M bA rA ti hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM na ma hi bai ro tsan hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM ha yau ya mi ni hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM swa ha hUM/ pad ma ner ti shwa ra hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM hriM mo mo har ti hUM hUM phaT swA
182b6: hA/ oM bo Sha Ta he he ru ka hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM tre+e tros tsa la ni hU~M hU~M phaT sA hA/ oM hU tsu bo badz+ra sur+ya hU~M hUM phaT sA hA/ oM tsA hUM saM tra sa ni tsU hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM paT taM ba ra ma shwa d+hA hU~M phaT/ oM phaT phaT/ rban Ti ka d+hu hU~M Ta sA hA/
182b7: oM kA kA s+yai hUM hUM phaT/ oM A lug s+yai hUM hUM phaT/ oM shA na s+ye hUM hU~M phaT/ oM su ka ra s+yai hUM hUM phaT/ oM ya mad Ni hUM hUM phaT/ oM ya ma ru ti hUM hUM phaT/ oM ya ma daM shrI ni hUM hU~M phaT/ oM ya ma kA ni hUM hUM phaT/ g.yon da
182b8: g.yas kyi lag gnyis su/ / go cha gnyis po bkod nas ni// gang zhig ji ltar 'dod pa ru// las rnams thams cad byed pa yin// the tsom med par las byas na// nges par dngos grub gzhan du min// yang na mgon pos

183a1: bcu'i dbang / / pha rol phyin pa bcu la gnas// sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod brtson 'grus// bsam gtan shes rab drug po ste// thabs dang stobs dang smon lam dang // ye shes sgo skyong rnam dag pa'o// rab tu
183a2: dga' dang dri ma med/ / 'od byed pa dang 'od 'phro can// sbyang dka' ba dang mngon du gyur/ ring du song dang mi g.yo ba// legs pa'i blo gros chos kyi sprin// 'di yis rnam par dag pa bsgom// gshin rje sreg sogs bzhi pa ni/
183a3: 'phags pa'i bden par rnam par bsgom// sdug bsngal dang ni kun 'byung dang // 'gog pa dang ni lam rnams te// bcom ldan 'jam pa'i rdo rje dpal// chos kyi dbyings kyis rnam dag ste// ye shes rang gi ngo bo yin// 'di
183a4: ltar rnam par dag pa sgom/ / gnyis su med par sbyor ba'i lam// gsang zhing mchog tu gsang ba ste// rnal 'byor stobs kyis gsang ba mchog/ bsgrub pas rjes su bstan pa dang // ji bzhin bdag po'i dbye ba dang // bla ma'i
183a5: rim pa legs par bslabs/ / 'di ltar cho ga gnyis med par// sbyor ba'i dam tshig mchog yin te// dngos grub kun gyi thabs kyi rgyu// rnal 'byor ma thugs gsang ba che// las rnams kun gyi 'bras bu ster// mngon par
183a6: brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las gnyis su med pa'i go cha'i sbyor ba bskyed pa'i bsgom pa'i le'u ste sum bcu rtsa bdun pa'o/ / // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// brda' ni mchog tu gsang ba ste// brda' ni yongs
183a7: su mi shes par/ / sbyor ba'i dngos grub mi 'grub ste// 'di ni nges par shes pa na// dngos grub 'grub par the tsom med// dra zhes bya ba skyes bur bshad// de zhes bya ba bud med yin// bu zhes bya ba gnon pa yin// su zhes bya
183a8: bza ba nyid/ / ma zhes bya ba ma ru bshad// ya zhes bya ba chud ma nyid// b+hi zhes bya ba sring mo yin// b+hi zhes bya ba mdza' mor bshad// lu zhes bya ba bu mo yin// sri zhes bya ba khrag tu bshad// so ni zhi ba'i btung ba yin// be

183b1: zhes bya ba thug pa ste/ / pi zhes bya ba de bzhin sha// ba zhes bya ba za bA yin// b+ha zhes bya ba 'dres pa yin// pi zhes bya ba dur khrod yin// du zhes bya ba ro yin no// TI zhes bya ba rnal 'byor ma// gA zhes bya ba lA ma yin// tri zhes bya ba
183b2: gzugs can ma/ / ku zhes bya ba mkha' 'gro ma// ha ni khaN Da ro nyid ma// rnga zhes bya ba byin pa gnyis// ba zhes bya ba gsong bor smra// swa zhes bya ba legs 'dis yin// mi zhes bya ba nya yin la// bye zhes bya ba bza' ba
183b3: yin/ / byo zhes bya ba btung ba yin// ka ni bgrod dang bgrod min yin// kazhes bya ba 'dod pa yin// sa zhes bya ba gzhan mi 'gro// ra zhes bya ba khyo med mo// du zhes bya ba spyod ngan mo// su zhes bya ba skal bzangs mo// na zhes bya ba
183b4: skal nganam/ / sa zhes bya ba dam tshig can// a zhes bya ba dam tshig med// I zhes bya ba 'ongs pa yin// na zhes bya ba ma 'ongs yin// so zhes bya ba chags pa yin// 'di dag yi ge'i brda' yin te// dbang bskur dus sun la
183b5: 'byor pas/ / bza' dang bza' med sbyin par bya// dbang bskur ba'i mchog min to// dam tshig mchog ni shes pa dang // dam tshig can gyi dam tshig dus// dam tshig 'khor lo 'dus pa dang // dad pa rnams la sbyin par bya//
183b6: ma dad pa la sbyin mi bya// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las brda'i le'u sgra sum bcu rtsa brgyad pa'o// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ga rnal 'byor ma yi mtshan nyid ni// gang gis shes pa tsam gyis ni// sgrub pa pa
183b7: yis dngos grub thog/ bud med pa u0f7fltar dkar zhing // pad ma'i 'ad ba ltar dkyus ring mig/ rtag tu gos ni dkar la dga'// can dan sar ba'i dri dang ldan// bde gshegs 'dus pa nyid la dga'// de rigs las byung
183b8: shes par bya/ / bud gang bco ma'i gser 'dra zhing // dmar dang ser ba'i gos la dga'// dzA ta tsam pa'i de dang ldan// de yang bzang po'i rjes 'gror 'gyur// thams cad ud pal ltar sngo bsangs// dri dang gos rna

184a1: sngo la dga'/ / ud pal sngon po'i dri yod pa// de ni dpa' bo bzang rjes 'gro// bud med pad dkar 'dra mdog gang // rtag tu pad ma'i rtsa ba dri// de yang de bzhin dpa' mo'i blo// dmar zhing ser skya'i bud lnga
184a2: gang / / gzugs bzang gos ni dmar ba dang // ma la ki dang ud pal dri// de ni rdo rje'i rigs byung yin// ser zhing ldang ba'i bud med gang // gos ni dkar la dga' ba dang // mgo la me tog dri dang ldan/ de bzhin gshegs
184a3: rigs rjes 'gro yin/ / bud med gang zhig kha dog dmar// de'i mdog can gos 'chang zhing // rtag tu ga bur dri dang ldan// rnam snang rigs kyi rjes 'gro zhing// rnal 'byor pa yi rigs rnams ni// de ltar 'bad 'dus ngas bshad pa// g.yon pa'i kun spyod la rtag
184a4: dga'/ / rang gi mdog gis rigs drug ldan// rigs kyi rig pa'i yi ge yang // kha dog drug tu 'gyur ba yin// rang gi phyag rgya 'ching ba dang // rang rig las byung tshig tu smra// g.yon las 'gro ba'i bud med gang // rnal
184a5: 'byor pa la g.yon la rtag/ lag pa g.yon gyis mtshon pa dang // g.yon nas lta bas rnam par blta// lha mo rnams dang gar smra ba// de ni dam tshig ldan par bshad// bud med gang byas de nyan cing // rigs kyi sa
