206b5: dag te/ / bo gyi nyid / sa rlud du rgyas pa pa// gas kyigatu stsa la lags/ zhes pan gzung ba ma/ A la~M gas nga ga/ rgyu tshogs stong ma /
206b6: sogs pa nas// ji srid bsdus pa'i stod ldan nyid/ bdud rtsi tshim byed mya ngan 'das / lag pa'i mchod pas dbang byung ba/ ko cha chen pos yang dag bsrung/ sngags rnams kun gyis mchod pa yin/ da b+hang nying 'du ba na//
206b7: mdza bkrus nas ni bshad pa yod// pa mchog gang zhig kun spyod ba/ sdig pathams cad nam dag bdag/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa thob cing/ sgra dang nabs pade gshegs kyi// rigs smras rgyal bcos ldan 'gyur/ gyung /
206b8: lda byas / ngos zub papas pa rtsol/ ba nyams sted nga/ di lta rnal 'byod pas parnam pan// de mi bas rnams gyur pa yon/ la legs pa kran/ da pas gang byung des/ dgag/

207a1: yang dag ye shes ldan// bsam gtan sems pa tsam gyis sam// klog cing 'don dang bris pa yis// mtho ris longs spyod thob 'gyur ba'am// yang na 'khor los bsgyur ba 'thob// rnal 'byor sa rnams 'pho ba'i tshe/ bal
207a2: ldan khrag 'thung sogs mkha' 'gro/ / lag na me tog sna tshogs thogs// rgyal mtshan ba dan sna tshogs dang // rol mo'i sgra ni sna tshogs dang // sna tshogs glu yi mcho sa mchod 'dzidzin gyi rnam rtog 'di// mkha' la 'gro ba'i gnas su khyer//
207a3: de 'dri'i dpal chen rnal 'byor pa// sa steng du ni rnyed par dka'// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las gsang ba'i yi ge bskyed ci bsgrub pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa drug pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// cho ga'i rim bzhin
207a4: sngags btug/ cig tu dben pa'i sa phyogs su// mkhas pas sa ni bsnyams nas su// bshang gci yis ni thug par bya// ma hA rag ta byugs nas kyang / bdag nyid he ru kar byas nas/ rigs ngan shan pa mo blas nas// ton lakhogs gas
207a5: par bya/ / dpa' po chen po'i bdug spos dbul// zhal la stsogs pa mar me sbar// cang te'u dril bu brdung par bya// glu dang gar gyis mchod par bya// lha yi rol mo'i bye brag dang // phyogs kyi gos can skra grol ba// lus ni phyag rgya drug/
207a6: dang ldan// A li kA li mnyam byas te// sde tshan la ni thim par bya// bzhi bzhi ru ni shes byas la// thub pa'i mchog gis rgyas par bya// der gnas dpa' bo btu bar bya// don 'dod thams cad grub byed pa// bzhi pa'i lnga pa gang yin dang/
207a7: lnga pa yi yang lnga pa dang // lnga pa yi ni bzhi pa dang // dang po'i gsum pa gang yin dang // de bzhin nyi shurtsa dgu pa// bzhi pa'i dang po gang yin dang // mthar gnas pa yi bzhi pa dang // de nyid kyi ni gnyis pa dang // sum bcu pa ni yang dag zlag/
207a8: nyi shu drug pa nyid dang ni// de bzhin brgya yi phyed phyed dang // de nas sum bcu rtsa gsum dang // dang po'i dang po nyid dag dang // mthar gnas pa yi gsum pa dang // lnga pa yi ni dang po dang // dang po yi ni gsum pa nyid// sum bcu rtsa gnyis

207b1: pa nyid ni/ / bzhi pa yin lnga ba dang / lnga pa yi yang bzhi pa dang // mthar gnas pa yi dang po dang / gnyis pa yi ni gsum pa dang // gsum pa'i ding po gang yin dang // lnga pa yi yang lnga pa dang / dang po yin dang po dang // de bzhin bcu cig pa
207b2: nyid dang / / de bzhin mkhas pas bcu drug pa// gsum po'i dang po gang yin dang // de bzhin nyi shu rtsa drug pa// bzhi pa'i gsum pa gang yin dang // u sma yi ni gnyis pa nyid// dang po'i dang po gang yin dang // de bzhin nyi shu rtsa bdun pa// nyi shu
207b3: rtsa brgyad pa yang ngo / / dang po yin gsum pa dang // lnga pa yi yang bzhi pa dang // de bzhin sum bcun cig blang // bcwa lnga pa ni nyid dag dang // de bzhinyi shurtsa lnga pa// dang po'i gnyis pa gang yin dang / de bzhin nyi shu drug pa dang // yi ge sum
207b4: bcu rtsa gnyis pa/ / us man ni tha ma nyid// sum bcu rtsa gnyis pa nyid dang // lnga pa yi ni bzhi pa dang // gnyis pa yi ni bzhi pa dang // lnga pa yi ni bzhi pa dang // sus ma yi ni gsum pa dang // gzhan yang nyi shu na bdun pa/ an das
207b5: yi dang po dang / / de bzhin nyi shu rtsa cig pa// an da s+tha yi gnyis pa dang // de bzhin yang ni sum bcu pa// lnga pa yi ni dang po dang // us ma yi ni dang po nyid// de bzhin yi ge bya nyid dang // bzhi pa'i dang po gang yin dang // us ma'i
207b6: dang po gang yin dang / / de bzhin nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa// dang po'i gnyis pa gang yin dang // gsum pa'i dang po nyid dag dang // dang po'i gsum pa gang yin dang // bzhi pa'i bzhi pa gang yin dang // an da s+tha'i gnyis pa dang / gsum
207b7: Thar yang ni lwa ba dang / oM ge d+han rinas tha dang po yin pani pa dang / mang gnas pa yi gnyis padang // denas brgyad pa nyid dag dang / na pa'i lnga pa gang yin da// lnga pa yi yang lnga pa dang / nyi ku rtsi gsum pa yang rdzo //
207b8: de bzhin nyi shu rtsa bdun dang // bzhi pa yi ni bzhi pa dang / slar yang nyi shu rtsa bdun pa/ de bzhin nyi shu rtsa drug pa// nyi shu rtsa lnga yang dag blang // sum bcu rtsa gsum nyid dag dang // bzhi pa yi ni bzhi pa dang // lnga pa yi ni lnga pa dang / mthar

208a1: gnas pa yi mnyam pa blang / / bzhi pa yin lnga pa dang // bzhi pa yi ni bzhi po dang // dang po'i dang po nyid dag dang // de bzhin shu rtsa bdun pa// an dasgra yi bzhi pa dang // de bzhin nyi shutsa cig pa// us ma yin
208a2: gnyis pa nyid/ / de bzhin nyi shu rtsa drug pa// thog ma yin dang po dang // mthar gnas pa yi gnyis pa nyid// gnyis pa yi ni dang po dang // drug pa yi ni gnyis pa nyid// thog ma yi ni dang po dang // mthar gnas pa yi gnyis pa dang //
208a3: gnyis pa yi ni dang po dang // bdun pa yi ni gnyis pa dang // drug pa yi ni gsum pa dang // bzhi pa yi ni lnga pa dang // bzhi pa yis ni sbyar bar bya// mthar gnas pa yi bzhi pa dang // lnga pa yin lnga pa la// bzhi pa yi ni gnas su
208a4: lnga pa yi ni thog sa la/ / steng du sbyar zhing me dang bcas// us ma yi ni gsum pa dang // mthar gnas pa yi thog ma dang // bzhi pa yin thog ma la// gzi brjid can gyi gdan du byas// bdun pa yi ni gsum pa dang // drug pa yi yang /
208a5: dang po ste// ka dang sha yi yi ge ni// theg ma dag ni blangs nas su// lnga pa yi ni bzhi pa dang // mthar gnas pa'i dang po ste// de bzhin yang ni bsdus te blang // drug pa yi ni bzhi pa dang // bdun pa yi ni dang po dang // us man yi bzhi pa blang //
208a6: bdun pa yi ni bzhi pa dag/ rdo rje sems dpas phye ba yin// u sma na yi bzhi pa nyid// nyi ma yang ni gdan du byas// bdun pa yini bzhi pa la// me yi 'og tu sbyar bar bya// gshegs su gsol dang yang dag ldan// lnga pa
208a7: yini gnyis pa dang / / de bzhin nyi shu gnyis pa nyid// drug pa yi ni gnyis de bzhin// bcu cig pa dang nyi shu gnyis// gsum pa'i dang po blangs nas ni// bzhi pa yin gsum pa dang // usma na yi bzhi pa nyid// lnga pa yiyi ni gsum pa
208a8: dang / / bdun pa'i bzhi pa blang bar bya// nyi shu rtsa cig de blangs nas// gnyis pa yi ni dang po dang // / lnga pa yi yang thog ma dang // gnyis pa yi ni yi ge drug/ lnga pa yi ni bzhi pa la// k+Sha yaM yi ge de bzhin no// nyi shu rtsa bzhi de blangs nas//

208b1: slar yang bsdu ba bshad pa yin// lnga pa yi ni gsum pa dang // u sman ni gsum pa dang // mthar gnas pa yi gnyis pa nyid// lnga pa yi ni bzhi pa la// nyims slar yang gdab par bya// yi ge nyi shu btab nas ni// bcu drug pa yis
208b2: stan du byas/ / 'og tu ma yi gzi brjid can// lnga pa yi ni lnga pa dang // mthar gnas pa yi gsum pa dang // lnga pa yi ni gsum pa dang // drug pa yi ni gsum pa dang // mthar gnas pa yi bzhi pa dang // nyi shu rtsa lnga ba'i sa dbye// bzhi pa'i ni lnga pa
208b3: dang / / gnyis pa yi yang gsum pa dang // nyi ma'i bu yis rnam par dbye// usma na yi bzhi pa dang // dang po yi ni gsum pa la// gzi brjid kyis ni gdan du byas// bdun pa yi ni bzhi pa dang // bcwa lnga pa yis gdan gnyisaH/ u swa na yi
208b4: gsum pa nyid/ / lnga pa yi ni thog ma la// bcu drug pa yi gdan du byas// nyi shu rtsa cig de yis blangs// bzhi pa yi ni thog ma dang // mthar gnas pa'i gsum pa dang // gnyis pa yi ni gsum pa dang // bzhi pa yin dang po dang // lnga pa yi//
208b5: ni bzhi pa dang // gsum pa yi ni gsum pa dang // dang po yi ni gsum pa dang // u sman yi gsum pa nyid// nyi shu rtsa cig de bzhin te// nyi ma yis ni mnyam par mnan// lnga pa yi ni gsum pa dang // bzhi pa yi ni dang po dang // gsum pa
208b6: yi ni gsum pa la/ / gzi brjid kyis ni gsal bar byas// mthar gnas pa yi thog mar shes// de yang bcu drug pa yis gdag/ gnyis pa yi ni gsum pa dang // de bzhin nyi shu rtsa drug pa// dang po yi ni gnyis pa dang // thog ma yi yang
208b7: dang po dang / / bzhi pa yi yang gsum pa dang // thog ma yi yang dang po dang // gnyis pa yi yang dang po dang // de bzhin du ni bcu bzhi pa'o// bcu bzhi usma bzhi pa dang // nyi shu rtsa bdun gdan du byas// ya sogs brgyad po'i sa bon
208b8: dngag nyi ma yi ni gzi brjid can/ / gsum pa yi yang gsum pa dang // bco lnga pa yis gdan du byas// gnyis pa yi yang gsum pa dang // gsum pa yi yang lnga pa dang // ka shi'i yi ge sa bon te// nyi shu lnga pa gdan du byas// slar yang

209a1: bsdu bar bya ba ste/ / sku ni legs par btub ste// dbang chen gyis ni gdan du byas// usma yi ni bzhi pa dang // bdun pa yi ni bzhi pa dang // ya tshogs brgyad po'i sa bon dang / de bzhin sum bcu gsum pa nyid// sum bcu
209a2: gsum de bzhin te/ / lnga pa'i bdag nyid kun bsdu ba'o// de nas kyang ni btu bya ba// gnyis pa yang ni de bzhin te// gnyis pa yi ni dang po dang // mthar gnas pa yi gsum pa dang // u sman yi gsum pa dang // de bzhin nyi shurtsa brgyad
209a3: pa/ / bdun pa yi ni bzhi pa dang // drug pa'i ni gsum pa dang // lnga pa yi yang bzhi pa dang // drug pa yi yang gsum pa dang // gnyis gnyis rkang pa bzhi pa ste// ka ra ka ra/ ku ru ku ru// b+han d+haHna d+ha/ trA sa ya trA sa ya/ k+Sho b+ha ya k+Sho/
209a4: b+hA ya/ tro gr-iHtra lo phaM/ phaT paTad hAng sA/ pa tsa ba tsa b+hak+Sha b+hak+Sha ba sa ru d+hir/ an dra/ mA lA ba la win/ grih+na gri g+ha/ sa p+ta pA tA lag ta/ ShU dzaMg sa r+b+bamardza sa ta la/ a kan+ta/ a kar+g+ha/ d+hIg+ni d+hi d+hau/ ts+lir+thaM/ tAn+na bI hrISh+Tang+ga
209a5: ki li ki li/ si li si li/ hi li hi li/ d+hi li d+hi lai/ hUM hUM phaT phaT// / rig pa'i rgyal po gsang sngags te// bya ba thams cad sgrub byed pa'o// 'di las shin tu mchog gyur pa// 'jig rten gsum na yod man te//
209a6: dpal ldan khrag 'thung sngags shes na// gzhan dag snying po med rtsar mtshungs// rtsa ba'i sngags su bshad pa yin// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las rtsa ba'i sngags kyi yi ge btu ba'i rdo rgyus kyi cho ga'i
209a7: le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa bdun pa'o/ / // gzhan yang yi ge nyi shu gnyis// snying po'i yig bdun nye snying po// ya tshogs brgyad po'i sa bon dang // de bzhin gug skyed bcu gnyis kyis// yi ge bar mdor byas pa// yan lag drug ni haM
209a8: ru ka/ dpa' bo drug dang mnyam sbyor ba// re'u mig drug tu bsgom pa ste// he ru ka yi bdag por 'gyur// yi ge cig tu yang dag gnas// oM na maHsA hA bau Sha Da/ tsu hUM phaT dang yang dag ldan// sgrub pos snying por shes par bya// dang po

209b1: snying kha nyid duste/ / gnyis pa spyi bor shes par bya// gsum pa spyi gtsug dag tu sbyar // bzhi pa go char myur ba yin// lnga pa mig tu gyur pa ste// drug pa mtshon shes byar 'dod// de nas dbyungs yig bcu gsum nyid/ yin
209b2: gnyis pa dag dang sbyar/ / dbyangs yig bcu gcig yang dag sbyar// yi ge drug pa brgyan par bya// dbyangs kyi bzhi pa nyid kyang ni// yi ge bdun pa nyid kyang byar// dbyangs yig bcu cig pa nyid ni// mkhas pas yi ge brgyad par
209b3: sbyar/ / dbyangs yig gnyis pa dang sbyar ba'i// yi ge dgu pa brgyan par bya// dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyis pa nyid// yi ge bcu gnyis pa dang sbyar// dbyangs yig gnyis par ldan pa ni// yi ge nyi shu cig pa gzug mkhas pas yi ge bcu
209b4: bzhi pa/ / yi ge nyi shu pa dang sbyar// dbyangs kyi gsum pa nyid dag ni// yi ge bcwa lnga pa dang sbyar// dbyangs yig bcwa lngar yang dag ldan// yi ge bcu drug pa mdzes bya// dbyangs yig gsum pa dang ldan pa'i// yi ge bcu bdun pa ru
209b5: 'dod/ / dbyangs kyi gnyis pa nyid dang ni// yi ge bcwa brgyad pa ru sbyar// dbyangs yig gi ni gnyis pa nyid// yi ge nyi shu cig par sbyar// phyi mo'i lnga pa dang yang sbya pa/ yi ge nyi shu gsum par sbyar// dbyangs yig bcu gsum pa nyid ni//
209b6: yi ge nyi shu bzhi par sbyar// sde tshan dang po blangs nas ni// yi ge nyi shu lnga par sbyar// dbyangs yig gnyis pa dang ldan par// yi ge nyi shu rtsa drug 'gyur// yi ge nyi shu brgyad dag ni// yi ge bcwa lnga pa dang sbyar// gsum pa dang po
209b7: ldan/ / 'og gi cha ni me dang bcas// de bzhin dbyangs yig gnyis par sbyar// yi ge nyi shu rtsa dgu pa// yi ge sum bcu rtsa cig par// dbyangs yig gnyis pa dag dang sbyar// yi ge sum bcu gnyis pa yang // dbyangs yig gnyis par
209b8: ldan par bya/ / yi ge sum bcu rtsa gsum pa// nyi mar yang dag ldan par bya// phyi mo'i bzhi pa nyid dag ni// yi ge sum bcu bzhir ldan pa'i// 'dod pa'i don kun grub byed yin// phyi mo'i lnga pa nyid dag ni// sum bcu bdun payang dag

210a1: ldan/ / mkha' 'gro ma rnams sgrub byed yin// sum bcu brgyad pa nyid dag ni// dbyangs yig gnyis pa dang sbyar ba// lha rnams thams cad bsgrub pa ni// 'di nyid yin par the tshom med// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis pa nyid ni// ma dang
210a2: 'og tu bsgrub par bya/ / bzhi bcu gsum pa nyid dag ni// dbyangs yig lnga pa nyid dang sbyar// yi ge bzhi bcu lnga pa ni// dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyis par sbyor// dbyangs nyid lnga pa nyid dag kyang // bzhi bcu rtsa drug par ldan pa// dpa'
210a3: bo thams cad rab mchod cing / / bzhi bcu rtsa bdun pa nyid ni// dbyangs yig gnyis pa dang sbyar ba// rdo rje sems dpa' mchog tu 'dod// de bzhin lnga bcu rtsa gcig pa// dbyangs yig lnga pa nyid dag gis// mdzes pa mchog
210a4: ni yin par 'dod/ / lnga bcu rtsa gnyis pa nyid ni// dbyangs yig gnyis pa dang sbyar ba// lha rnams thams cad 'grub byed pa// 'di nyid yin par the tshom med// de bzhin lnga bcu rtsa gsum pa'ang // dbyangs yig bcu gsum
210a5: pa dang sbyar/ / yi ge rnams las 'di mchog ste// dgra rnams nges par bsod byed yin// sde tshan bzhi las bya nyid do// yi ge lnga bcu rtsa drug pa// dbyangs yig drug pa dag dang sbyar// an das+tha yi bzhi pa dang / dbyangs
210a6: yig gnyis par sbyar bar bya/ / de bzhin bcwa lnga pa dang sbyar// dngos grub thams ca sgrub pa yin// yi ge lnga bcu rtsa dgur 'gyur// yi ge drug bcu rtsa gcig nyid// dbyangs yig gnyis pa dag rang sbyar// 'di nyid mchog
210a7: ni yin par bshad/ / de shigi drug bcun gnyis pa// dbyangs yig gnyis par sbyar ba ni// mkha' 'gro ma yi mchog tu 'dod// yi ge drug bcu rtsa gsum nyid/ dbyas yig bcu cig ga ldan// mdzes pa'i yi ge kun mchog
210a8: yin/ / drug bcu rtsa bzhi pa nyid ni// rdo rje sems dpa' phye ba dag/ dbyangs yig gnyis par yang dag ldan// grub sbyin thar pa chen pol// yi ge drug bcu rtsa lnga pa// me la gnas par yang dag ldan// dbyangs yig gsum

210b1: padang sbyar ba/ / dngos grub kun sbyin bde gshegs gsung// yi'i bya wanag gdabyangs yig gsum pa dang sbyar ba// bya ba kun las grub sbyin par// de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs// yi ge drug bcu rtsa bdun pa// yi ga
210b2: gnyis pa yang dag ldan/ / rnal 'byor ma'i dgongs pa kun// 'di nyid byed par the tsho ba med// drug bcu brgyad pa nyid dag las// der ni yi ge bskur ba// 'og gi char ni brtag par bya// yi ge bdun bcu rtsa gcig pa// yi ge gnyis
210b3: par yang dag sbyar/ / yi ge kun la mdzes pa ni// 'di nyid yin par the tshom med// sum bcu rtsa bzhi pa nyid ni// dbyangs yig gnyis par sbyar ba dag/ gdong nas grub pa yin par ni// de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal nas gsungs// yi
210b4: ge bdun bcu lnga pa nyid/ / ma mo'i drug pa dang ldan pa// 'di ni nil 'byor mchog yin te// dge ba kun la dam pa yin// bdun bcurtsa drug pa nyid ni// dbyangs yig gnyis pa dang ldan zhing // 'og tu me dang ldan pa las// gzhan dag mdzas
210b5: pa yod ma yin/ / yi ge bdun bcu rtsa bdun pa// der ni dang sbyar bar bya// mkha' 'gro ma yi mdzes par 'dod// bdun bcu rtsa brgyad pa nyid ni// dbyangs yig gnyis pa dag dang sbyar// rgyu yi mchog ni yin par 'dod / yig brgyad cu rtsa cig/
210b6: bzhi pa'i mtha' yis khyad par dbye// gdod nas grub byed 'di yin te// dngos grub kun la 'jug byed pa'o// yi ge brgyad bcu rtsa gnyis pa// de bzhin dbyangs yig gnyis par sbyar// phyi bo yi ni lnga pa la// de bzhin yi ge brgyad
210b7: bcu brgyad/ / ma mo yi ni lnga pa dang // brgyad bcu dgu pa de bzhin te// ma mo lnga bablang byas ste// de bzhin yi ge dgu bcu pa// ma mo'i lnga pa blang byas te// yi ge dgu bcu cig par sbyor// ma mo yi ni gnyis pa dang // yi ge dgu bcurtsa
210b8: drug pa/ / dbyangs yig gnyis pa ldan pa yi// yi ge dgu bcu rtsa dgu pa// gdug pa thams cad skrag byed pa// ma mo kun gyi bde ba'i gnas// dbyangs kyi yi ge bcu gsum pa// yi ge gnyis pa dag dang ldan// ba mo bcu gsum

211a1: pa nyid ni/ / yi ge lnga pa dang/ dang sbyar// gdug pa thams cad 'khrug byed de// mkha' 'gro ma'i bde ba'i gnas// dbyangs yig bcu bzhi pa yis ni// yi ge brgyad pa dag dang sbyad// bcwa lnga pa yis rab tu sbyar/
211a2: dbyangs yig bcu bzhi pa nyid ni// yi ge dgu pa dag dang sbyar// steng du thig le yang dag gnas// yi ge dag ni bsgrub pa ste// mkha' 'gro ma yi khyad par yin// dbyangs yig bcu cig pa nyid ni// yi ge bcu gnyis pa dang sbyar/ steng
211a3: du phyin dus rnam par brgyan/ / dbyangs kyi yi ge bcu cig pa// yi ge bcu gsum pa dang sbyar// thig les kyang ni rnam par brgyan// 'byung po kun ni sreg byed cing // sgrub pa pos ni dga' ba yin// dbyangs kyi yi ge lnga pa la//
211a4: yi ge sum bcu rtsa gnyis sbyar// dbyangs kyi gsum pa nyid dag ni// yi ge sum bcu gsum dang sbyar// ma mo gnyis pa nyid dag dang // yi ge sum bcu rtsa bzhir sbyar/ dbyangs kyi gnyis pa dag dang ni// yi ge sum bcu drug
211a5: dang sbyar/ / dang po yi ni gnyis pa dag/ yi ge sum bcu bdun dang sbyar// dbyangs kyi yi ge gsum pa ni// yi ge bzhi bcu dang sbyar ba// ma mo bcu cig pa nyid ni// yi ge bzhi bcu cig dang sbyar// dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyis pa ni// yi
211a6: ge bzhi bcu gnyis par sbyar/ / dbyangs kyi gsum pa dag dang ni// yi ge bzhi rtsa bzhi dang sbar// ma mo gnyis pa nyid dang yang // yi ge bzhi bcu brgyad par sbyar// dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyis pa dag/ yi ge bzhi bcu dag dang
211a7: sbyar/ / dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyis pa dag/ yi ge lnga bcu gnyis par sbyar// phyi mo'i lnga pa nyid dang ni// yi ge lnga bcu lnga dang sbyar// yi ge lnga bcu rtsa bzhi pa// thig les kyang ni rnam par brgyan// yi ge lnga bcu rtsa lnga pa// thig
211a8: les kyang ni rnam par brgyan/ / dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyis par sbyar// yi ge lnga bcu rtsa brgyad pa// thig les mgo la mnan par bya// dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyis pa dang // yi ge drug bcu drug bcu sbyar// phyi mo gnyis pa

211b1: nyid kyang ni/ / yi ge drug bcu bdun dang sbyar// gdug pa'i dngos grub kun 'grub cing // sgrub pa po la dpal yang stsol// dbyangs kyi yi ge bzhi pa dang // yi ge bdun bcu pa dang sbyar// thig les kyang ni rnam par brgyan// phyi
211b2: mo yi ni bzhi pa yis/ / yi ge bdun bcu gsum dang sbyar// bcwa lnga pa ni rab blangs te// dbyangs yig bcu bzhi pa dang ni// yi ge bdun bcu bzhi par sbyar// phyi mo'i bcu bzhi dag dang ni// yi ge bdun bcu gsum dang /
211b3: sbyar// de bzhin bcwa lnga pa dang sbyar// dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyis pa ni// yi ge bdun bcu bzhi dang sbyar// phyi mo'i yi ge gnyis pa yang / yi ge bdun bcu bdun dang sbyar// thig les kyang ni rnam par brgyan// byi mo yin
211b4: gnyis pa yang / / yi ge bdun bcu brgyad dang sbyar// thig le gnyis kyis rnam par brgyan// phyi mo yaM ni gnyis pa yang // yi ge bdun bcu dgu dang sbyar// ma mo'i bzhi pa nyid dang ni// yi ge brgyad bcu pa dang sbyar// thig
211b5: les mgo la mnan par bya/ / dbyangs yig bzhi pa dag kyang ni// yi ge bdun bcu dgu dang sbyar// thig le sgra yis bskyed pa ste// thig les kyang ni rnam par brgyan//
211b6: dbyangs yig bzhi pa dag kyang ni// yi ge bdun bcu dgu dang sbyar// thig le sgra yis bskyed pa ste// thig les kyang ni rnam par brgyan// dbyangs kyi yi ge gsum pa
211b7: dag/ yi ge bcu drug pa dang sbyar// 'og dang steng gi yi ge grangs// dgu bcu rtsa bdun bshad pa ste// 'di ni rtsa ba'i gsang sngags su// mkhas pa rnams kyis shes par bya// dngos grub kyi ni gnas yin zhing // mkha'
211b8: 'gro'i snying ni 'joms pa ni/ / dpal ldan khrag zung lha rigs rgyal// klags pas grub pa don yod pa// oM ni dang por sbyar bar bya// hUM hU~M phaT ni mthar sbyar ba// 'di ni rtsa ba'i gsang sngags te// grub pa thams cad

212a1: grub byed yin/ / de nas rang gi bdag nyid kyi// dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro ma ni dra ba yi// 'khor lo bde mchog yin par 'dod// dA mA ra ba saM la dzA nI ki DA Ta pa hUM tsU kai ru ru he he badz+ra/
212a2: shrI o// rig pa'i rgyal po'i snying po ni// mabyung 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// Ta pa hUM d+hUHha tra~MHoM// yi ge ba dang ya~M dang ni// yi ge me dang dri nyid dang // d+hu dang phaT ces bshad pa yin// a ba badz+ra bArA hU~M/ ta mo ya mi ni/
212a3: tri mo mo ha ni// hreM hr-i saM/ tsa la ni/ hUM hUM saM tra sa ni/ phaT phaT tsaN Di ka/ rnal 'byor ma ni drug du bsgrags// re'u mig drug la rnam par bsgom// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las go cha'i snying po bsgom pa'i
212a4: le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa brgyad pa'o/ / // de nas gzhan yang lha mo yi// snying po bla med bshad par bya// oM badz+ra bai ro tsa nI ye hUM hUM phaT swA hA// lha mo'i snying po'i sbyor ba ni// bcu gsum pa ni bdag nyid dag/ pad ma
212a5: dbus su phag mo ste/ / 'dab ma la ni lha mo dgod// sgo bzhi dag gi phyogs su ni// lha mo'i snying po rnam par bsgom// oM las byung ba'i rta gdong dang // rdo rje snying po gdug pa'i sgra// drag po yang ni g.yo ma dang //
212a6: mi 'phrog ma dang dri med ma// hUM mdzad ma dang ldan lha mo// bsreg blugs ma dang phaT byed ma// rang 'byung ma dang bcu gnyis te// ha mdzad g.yas pa'i gtso bo yin// rdo rje phag mo zhes bya ba// dngos grub thams cad stsol mdzad pa// sngo
212a7: dang ser dang dmar ba dang / / ljang khu steng zhal dkar po ste// spyan gsum pa la bzhin rnams sgyur// mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa ste// g.yas brkyang bzhugs shing thod phreng can// gsus pa rlo zhing skra grol ba// phyogs kyi gos
212a8: can 'dzin pa ste/ / rang gi thabs dang sbyor bas gnas// 'jigs byed tsa mu ta Ti 'jigs myos// zhabs kyi 'og tu gnon pas bzhugs// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM ga/ mdung dang gri gug cang te'u dang // rdo rje dril bu zhags pa dang /

212b1: lcags kyu tshangs pa'i mgo bo dang // dgra sta dang ni sdigs 'dzub dang // nA ra'i lpags pa steng du brkyang // sku regs dang ni dpung rgyan dang // phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan// sangs rgyas lnga yi gcod pan can// thugs rje khro
212b2: gnyer 'jigs pa ste/ / 'dabal lha mo thams cad dgod// ma mo dag ni brgyad pa ste// ser dang dmar dang ldang pa dang // lho ni sngo ba'i mdog can te// me phyogs dmar la dung kha ste// sngo ba dang ni dkar ba dang // dbang ldan du ni
212b3: dgod pa ste/ / spyan gsum pa la skra grol ba// phyag rgya lnga dang yang dag ldan/ dkyil dkrung phyed pas legs par bzhugs// thod pa yi ni dbu rgyan can// phyogs kyi gos can bzhin rnam sbyar// thams cad yi dgas gdan la bzhug/
212b4: thugs rje'i chags pas rnam par myos// rdo rje'i mchog ni gar mdzad cing // thod pa rag tas bkang ba dang // dril bu cang te'u sgra yang sgrogs// lha rnams dga' bar byed pa yin// sgo rnams su ni sgo srungs te// dbang po'i steng
212b5: du rnam par bzhugs/ / g.yas brkyang ba'i zhabs kyis bzhugs// spyan gsum pa la dbu skra brdzes// thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// phreng ba'i rgyan gyis spud pa ste/ thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// rdo rje mgo bo phyag na bsnams//
212b6: thams cad rnam skur gsus pa 'phyang // thams cad mgo bo'i phreng bas brgyan// sngo dang ljang dang dkar po ste// ser zhing phyag bzhi mdog gnyis pa// gcer bu pad ma'i rgya yang che// rang gi rigs kyi dbu rgyan can// thams
212b7: cad rang thabs gnyis pa ste/ / bcu gsum pa ni rnam par bsgom// snying po mchog ni bsgom pa yin// 'dod pa thams cad rab tu stsol// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las go cha dang lha mo'i snying po bsgom pa
212b8: bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa dgu pa'o/ / // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// shin tu rnyed dka'i dgod pa ste// gang zhig shes pa tsam gyis ni// myur du dngos grub 'grub pa'o// sa yi cha ni mnyam yid 'ong// tsan dan

213a1: gyis ni nye bar bsku/ / dri bzangs dri ldan spa la ni// me tog sil ma gcal bkram zhing // spos kyi dri yis nyams dgar bya// bdag gi bya ba kun byas shing // phyogs bcing ba ni byas nas su// de nas rdo rje'i bcing byas
213a2: te/ / mig bzhi bcu dgu zlum la// yi ge'i phyi mo dgod par bya// der gnas pa las dpa' bo ni// 'dod pa'i don kun grub byed bad+ma// rim bzhin 'byung dang rim min sa// dbyangs dang yi ge sgrub pos so// thub pa de lta'i grangs
213a3: 'gyur las/ / re'u mig sum bcu gnyis pa blang // lnga pa yi ni khyad par bya// brgya phyed phyed pa yang dag blang // nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa yis phye// re'u migasum bcu drug pa blang // gsum pa yis ni khyad par dbye// de nas sum bcu
213a4: gnyis pa blang / / lnga pa yis ni khyad par bya// de nas nyi shu lnga pa gzung // nyi shu bzhi pa dag dang sbyar// sum bcu rtsa gsum yang dag blang // re'u mig bcwa lnga pa yir ldan// lnga pa dag dang yang dag bcas// de nas nyi shu gnyis pa
213a5: gzung / / bcu cig pa yang de bzhin no// mdzad pa mchog ni yin par 'dod// re'u mig gi ni bcu dgu pa// me yi bu dang yang dag ldan// re'u mig gsum par rnam par bye// ya mtshan brgyad pa'i sa bon la// re'u mig sum
213a6: bcu drug pa dang / / yang dag ldan pa'i yi ger 'gyur// slar yang yi ge de dag nyid// 'dod pa'i don kun grub byed yin// de nas rang byung blangs nas su// re'u mig la ni lnga par sbyar// spyi bor thig le dag dang sbyar// de nas nyi shu
213a7: gnyis pa gzung / / bcu cig pa yang de bzhin no// don kun grub byed ces bya ba'i// tshig ni gnyis pa yin par bshad// re'u mig bcu dgu nyid la// nyi shu rtsa bdun pa yis phye// gsum pa dag dang yang dag ldan// sum bcu
213a8: gsum pa legs blangs te/ / re'u mig ni gnyis par sbyar// nyi shu pa dang yang dag ldan// mdzes pa'i mchog ni yin par 'dod// de bzhin nyi shu cig pa nyid// de bzhin nyi shu drug pa yin// lan gnyis bzlas pa'i

213b1: tshig tu ni/ / shin tu mnyam par bzhag ste btu// de nas go rims bzlog pas gzung // re'u mig las ni dang po nyid/ bzhi pa'i mtha' dang yang dag ldan// de bzhin bcwa lnga pa dang bcas// de nas nyi shu gnyis pa bzung // bcu
213b2: cig pa yang de bzhin no/ / chos don 'dod dang thar pa yi// tshig ni gsum pa yin par bshad// re'u mig gnyis pa'i sa bon dang // re'u migasum bcu drug pa nyid// de bzhin nyi shu drug pa dang // sum bcu gsum pa yang dag blang //
213b3: re'u mig bcu gsum pa yir ldan// re'u mig las ni bcu pa nyid// go rims bzlog pa sgrub pos blang // re'u mig las ni bcu dgu pa// re'u mig nyi shu gsum pa la// gnyis pa dag ni yang dag ldan// steng du thig les
213b4: brgyan par bya/ / de nas chu'i sa bon gzung // brgyad pa yang ni de bzhin te// me yi bu yis khyad par dbye// yi ge hUM phaT mtha' ru sbyar// 'di ni khams gsum rgyal zhes bya// sngags tshig bzhi yis rnam brgyan pa'o// oM
213b5: ni srul gsal byed yin/ / hUM dang phaT ni mtha' ru sbyar// rig rgyal 'khor lo skur ba'i sngags// 'di ni mazung 'byung mi 'gyur// de nyid bsdus dang dpal mchog dang // bde mchog rdo rje 'jigs byed du// khro bo bzhi dang /
213b6: yang dag ldan// sku brgyad dang ni bcas par ru// dkyil 'khor bsrung ba'i don du ni// gdug pa kun la khyad par du// 'di ni rnyed pa tsam gyis kyang / brtag mi dgos par 'chi bar 'gyur// sha chen dag gis thams cad kun// rdo
213b7: rje yang ni med par bshad/ / rnal 'byor thun mong brjod pa ni// dngos grub kun gyi 'bras bskyed pa'o// oM suM b+ha ni su~M b+ha hUM hUM phaT/ oM grih+Na grih+Na hUM hUM phaT sa priTA pa ya shri pa ya hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM A na ya ho b+ha ga ba badz+ra nU nAM
213b8: phaT/ / 'di ni gdug pa thams cad du// 'jigs byed mi zad par bshad do// nam mkha'i khams kyis yi mchog/ pad ma'i lte ba'i dbus su ni rdo rje hUM mdzad rnam par bsgom// gdug pa thams cad nges par gnon//

214a1: phyag ni bcu drug yang dag ldan// zhal brgyad pal bzhin nam snar// zhal gyi mche ba rnam par gtsigs// thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan// sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan can// thams cad kun gyis rnam par
214a2: spung / / rdo rjes mtshan pa'i phyag rgya drug/ sku lus drag po thugs rje'i nyams// g.yas brkyang pa yi gnas pa yis// dbang ldan gyi cod pa gnon// u mA mchog gi ku rtsa gnon// khros pa'i spyan gyis rnam par gzigs//
214a3: sku yi mgo yi do shal can// mgo bo'i phreng ba dbul bcings// rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya can// 'jig rten gsum rgyal de bzhin te// lugs kyu sdigs 'dzub 'ching ba ste// dpral ba'i steng du yang dag gnas// thugs
214a4: khang dpral ba phyag rgya ste/ / bgegs ni rnam pa gnon pa yin// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// ral gri lcags kyu 'chang ba ste// mdung dang mgo bo cang te'u dang // nA ra'i lpags pa'i steng du ste// phyag ni bcu drug de bzhin no// stag
214a5: gi lpags pa gos su bsnams/ / rang rig gnyis med bde ba'i sku// sngo dang dkar dang ser ba dang // dmar po de bzhin g.yon pa mdzes// dkar dang sngo dang ser ba dang // steng gi zhal ni dmar po ste// spyan gsum pa
214a6: la dmar ba'i spyan/ / khro bo bzhi dang yang dag ldan// las rnams thams cad byed pa dge/ 'dod pa'i rdo rje rdo rje sngon// bskyod pa'i rdo rje nyid dang ni// mi g.yo ba yi rdo rje ste// sngo dang ljang dang dmar ba dang // dung kha dur smrig
214a7: bsres pa ste/ / mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa'i zhal// thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan// g.yas brkyang pa yi zhabs kyis ni// bdud bzhi po ni rnam par gnon/ DA ra'i rus pas sku brgyan cing // sna tshogs khro bo'i
214a8: rigs kyang 'phro/ / thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// rdo rje sdigs 'dzub brkyang ba ste// rang gi rig dang gnyis med 'khyud// khro bo'i lta ba gzigs mdzad cing // dral bu phyag mtshan yang dag ldan// 'dzin pa'i phyag rgya

214b1: 'ching ba ste/ / 'jig rten gsum rgyal phyagaH yis// khro bo thams cad bcings pa yin// stag gi lpags pa gos su bsnams// spyan gsum mi bzad 'jigs pa ste// tho bang drug to mda'adang // ram gr-ings
214b2: bude bzhin te/ / yang na rdo rje dril bu dang // thams cad khro bo'i rigs rjes 'gro// 'khrud pa'i phyag kyang de bzhin te// zhal gsum pa la phyag drug pa// thams cad spyan gsum dngos grub mchog/ sku gsung thugs su
214b3: sbyor ba yis/ / dkyil 'khor dngos grub mchog dam pa// sum bcu rtsa bdun rnam par dag/ yi ge'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// oM su b+hu ni su~Mb+ha hU~M phaT/ oM grih+Na gr-iHhUM phaT/ oM gri dz+nyA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya hU~M pharba/
214b4: An ya ho b+hag tA badz+ra hA paT// dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma mthong nas// thams cad bskyed par rnam par bsgom// dkyil 'khor chen por sbyor ba ste// kha sbyar lnga yi ngo bo nyid// rnal 'byor pa yi dkyil 'khor yin// snying po
214b5: mchog gi bsgom pa yin/ / de bzhin khyi dang phag gi sha/ zangs kyi gtsug pud can de bzhin// mngon spyod kyi ni bya ba la// bza' dang sbyin sreg gtor ma bya// ma lus lus pa med grub cing // rgyal srid thams cad
214b6: rab grub 'gyur/ dang nya phyis mu tig ste// gsum char rgyu las byung yin na// chos kyi ye shes lus can gyis// thod pa la ni su zhig spong // dpa' bo thod pa'i phreng ba 'chang // zla ba phyed pas rgyan du byas// dpa'
214b7: bo'i dpa' dbang yin par bshad/ / khrag mthung rdo rje rnam pa'o// mngon pa brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las bsrung ba zhal bzhi par byin gyis brlabs pa khro bo bzhi'i dkyil 'khor rdo rgyus kyis bris pa rdo rje
214b8: hUM mdzad bskyed pa'i le'u ste drug bcu pa'o/ / // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// sde tshan brgyad ni rnam bsgom pa// mkha' dbyings pad ma'i dbus gnas par// khrag 'thung rdo rje rnam par bsgom//

215a1: zhal lnga pa la phyag bcu pa// spyan gsum shin tu dmar ba ste// g.yas brkyang ba'i zhabs kyis bzhugs// zhal rnam sbyar zhing 'jigs pa ste// mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa'i zhal// thod pa'i phreng
215a2: bas rnam par brgyan/ / drag po zla ba phyed pa 'dzin// sna tshogs rdo rjes dbul mnan// ral pa'i cod pan 'ching ba ste// phyag rgya drug gi mtshan gyi sa brgyan// stag gi lpags pa gos su bsnams// rig pa gnyis
215a3: med bde ba'i nyams/ / sku la thod pa'i do shal can// thugs rje'i nyams kyis khyab par myos// dkar dang sngo dang sprin gyi gzugs// sku ni sgeg cing ldem pa can// g.yas dang g.yon gyi zhal dag ni// ser dang dmar/
215a4: dang ldang ba dang // dud pa yi ni mdog can no// rdo rje dril bus mnyam ldan pas// rang gi rigs dang yang dag khril// tshangs lpags bshus nas bsnams par mdzad// rgyab tu nges par 'dzin pa yin// thod pa kha T+wAM ga
215a5: 'dzin cing / / mdung dang cang te'u gri gug dang // thod pa dag ni 'dzin pa ste// bcom ldan baM hUM nges 'thung ba// 'jigs byed rang gi chung mar bcas// zhabs kyi 'og tu mnan par sbyar// shar mdabs lha mor
215a6: dged pa ste/ / ji srid lho phyogs de bzhin te// ma la sogs pa'ang dgod par bya// de srid dbang ldan sogs de bzhin// a yi mkha' 'gro ma dang ni// ka yi mkha' 'gro ma de bzhin// tsa yi mkha' 'gro
215a7: ma dang ni/ / Ta yi mkha' 'gro ma dag ste// dkar dang dmar dang ser ba dang // sngo ba'i mdog can lho phyogs so// dmar dang dung kha ljang khu dang // ser po dbang ldan yang dag gnas// ta yi mkha' 'gro ma dang
215a8: ni/ pa yi mkha' 'gro ma de bzhin// de nas ya yi mkha' 'gro ma// sha yi mkha' 'gro ma brgyad pa// de dag kun gyi spyan gsum ste// zhal cig pa la phyag bzhi pa// 'jig rten skyong pa brgyad po yi// rkang

215b1: pa g.yas brkyang zhabs kyis gnan/ / rnam sbyar mche ba rnam gtsigs zhal// phyogs kyi gos mchog 'dzin pa ste/ phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan// skra grol thugs rje khro bo bzhin// drag po yul 'khrug
215b2: byed pa ste/ / 'dod pa'i don ku grub byed yin// 'gro ba thams cad smyo byed de// thams cad ci 'dod rdzogs pa yin// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// dril bu cang te'u yis brgyan pa// sde tshan mkha' 'gro bde ba ste// 'di dag rnal
215b3: 'byor ma yis bsgom/ / yang na phag mo dgod bya ste// bdag mo yang ni gzhag par bya// rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag po ste/ mkhas pas kyang ni bsgom par bya// sku gsung thugs su sbyor ba dag/ sa 'og sa steng rab tu 'khrug/
215b4: oM AHa ka tsa Ta ta ba ya sha nAM hUM phaT swA hA// brtan pa dang ni g.yo ba'i bdag/ ma lus ji snyed 'di yis 'grub// sde tshan mkha' 'gro dam pa mchog/ b+ha ga'i dbus su bsgom par bya// a sha kA kaM tsa ra ma tsa TaM ta pa ka/
215b5: tab sa ta ga ba ban dza yaM ma b+ha ha tsa shar b+ha tsa taH// sbrang rtsi mar dang bcas pa ni// rtag tu dus su 'di brgyad bza'// rgas dang nad dang 'chi med par// skye ba 'di la dngos grub 'gyur// chang gi btung ba dang bcas pa// zos pa tsam
215b6: gyis dbang du 'gyur/ / de ma rnyed na'ang sa lus bya// skye bdun pa'i nad gnas shing // phyugs ni zas su rtag spyad na// skad cig gis ni mkha' spyod 'gyur// 'di la yid gnyis dpyod pa med// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla
215b7: ma las sde tshan gyi sbyor ba'i le'u ste drug bcu rtsa gcig pa'o/ / // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// rnal 'byor mchog gis gar de ba// dpa' bo dang ni rnal 'byor ma// ma mo'i dkyil 'khor sngar bshad do// mkha' 'gro ma
215b8: sogs mkha' 'gro ni/ / gar dang wa yi gzugs su bya// phag mo'i gzugs ni de nyid kyang // zhal ni gang de wa ru bya// sngar bshad gnas dang phyag mtshan dang // zhal ni gzhan yang rtogs par bya// sngar bshad mtshan ma'i

216a1: rim pa yis/ / mkha' 'gro ma ni lag mdung thogs// thugs kyi 'khor lo thams cad kun// mkha' lding gdong ni 'jigs pa can// gsung gi 'khor lo rma bya'i gdong // sku'i 'khor lo seng ge'i gdong// khyi
216a2: dang phag dang 'ug pa dang / / khwa yi zhal gdong de bzhin te// bung la gshin rje sreg sogs kun// ma he ri dgas zhal gdong yin// dkyil 'khor ma lus can rnams kyang // spyan gsum mig ni shin tu dmar// 'di ni rdal
216a3: 'byor mchog dam pa/ / sdug bsngal thams cad zad par byed// rnal 'byor blo gros dngos grub dag/ rnal 'byor mchog ni steng ra 'gyur/ rdo rje theg pa'i min dag dang // ngag gi dngos grub rab tu sted// ma thos pa'i chos ston
216a4: pas/ / sems can rnams ni srid las grol// bla na med pa nyid bstan pas// mi snang la phyogs dngos grub 'gyur// su yang rung bas 'jig rten gsum// de kun de ma thag tu mthong // sngar bshad dpa' bo rnal 'byor
216a5: ma'i/ / gsang sngags rnams kyang de bzhin te// mkha' 'gro ma mo de bzhin no// sngar bshad sngags kyi bdag po rnams// bzlas na dngos grub rab ster cing // rtag tu bde ba thams cad 'thob// rnal 'byor nyi snying bzlas na ni//
216a6: gang nga'i dngos grub mkha' la 'gro// brtul zhugs med pa'ang brtul zhugs 'thob// mi gtsang ba'ang gtsang bar 'gyur// dbul po'ang nor gyi bdag por 'gyur// nad yod pa yang nad med 'gyur// long pa yis kyang
216a7: mthong bar 'gyur/ / mngon par shes pa lnga thob 'gyur// khong bu'i sha dang rta yi dang // khyi dang b.lang glang po mi// rnga mo lce spyang de bzhin te// brgyad po mnyam pa mchog yin no// rnal 'byor bdag gis de brgyad bza'
216a8: dri chen chu dang sbrang rtsi dmar/ / bsam gtan bsgoms te bza' byas nas// yang ba'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur// gzugs yongs bsgyur ba'i dngos grub cing // rang gi gzugs su'ang 'gyur ba yin// rnal

216b1: 'byor gang dag gang gnas par/ / bza' ba rang ni sa'abar bshang // 'gro dang ma 'grang bzhin/ zugs pas dngos grub 'gyur// ma dang bu mo srang mo dang // rang ga gnyen dang cham dang // blo ldan jilta 'dod pa yis/ drug
216b2: rgya phyag rgya chen po 'grub/ / gar nga'i mkha' 'gro bsgoms na ni// myur du 'gugs pa'i dngos grub 'gyur// mchog 'di yang ni gsang ba ste// su la'ang ni brjod mi bya// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las ji
216b3: ltar 'dod pa'i bong bu'i mdzad pa dngos grub kyi rgyu sgrub pa'i le'u ste drug bcu rtsa gnyis pa'o/ / // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// mkha' 'gro lnga yis rnam bsgom pa// rigs la skyed pa'i cho ga yin/
216b4: gdan dang phyag mtshan sa bon te// 'di ni sa bon mchog gyur pa'o// nga nya Na na ma zhes pa// 'di ni sa bon mchog grub pa// da ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro ste// nya ni sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro yin// ta ni ran chen mkha' 'gro ste//
216b5: na ni pad ma mkha' 'gro yin// ma ni sna tshogs mkha' 'gro ste// mkha' 'gro lnga ni mchog yin te// zhe sdang gti mug nga rgyal dang // chags dang phrag dog de bzhin te// rigs ni lnga po 'di dag gis// 'dod las
216b6: grol ba'i 'bras bu stsol/ / rdo rje 'khor lo rin chen dang // pad ma ral gri lnga pa yin// sngo dang dkar ba nyid dang ni// ser dang dmar po ljang gu dang // rdo rje'i phyag rgya byang chub mchog/ rin chen phyag rgya'ang de bzhin te
216b7: pad ma'i phyag rgya bzhi pa ste/ / ral gri phyag rgya lnga pa yin// glang po seng ge rta dang ni// rma bya mkha' lding de bzhin te// khyab 'jug tshangs pa nyi ma dang // dbang phyug tshe dbang po yang de// rang rig yan lag dang bcas pa/
216b8: gnyis mang bde bas yang dag gnas// shar dang lho dang nub dang ni// byang du yang ni de bzhin 'dir// dpa' bo'i 'khor dang bcas par dgod// lnga po yang dag lnga sangs rgyas// lnga po bdag nyid lnga yin no// nyi ma'i dkyil

217a1: 'khor dbus su ste/ / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor shar du'o// lho dang nub dang de bzhin te// byangan nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ro// yAn dbus su zla ba ste// shar du yang ni nyi ma'i gdan// de dag dpa' bor gyur pa ste// 'di lta
217a2: ste/ / rdo rje thod pa dang // rdo rje mkha' mnyam dang / rdo rje snying po dang // rdo rje sra pa dang // bzhi po de dag ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor te// glang po che'i gdan khri bya'o// rdo rje zla ba dang / rdo rje rgyal mtshan dang / rdo rje rgyal po dang /
217a3: rdo rje sgra dang / de dag ni sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor te// seng ge'i gdan khri'o// 'dod pa'i rdo rje dang / rdo rje sprin dang / rdo rje Ta ha ra dang / rdo rje bzhad pa dang // de dag ni rin chen mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor te/
217a4: gdaran khri'o// rdo rje me dpal dang / rdo rje 'joms pa dang / rdo rje sreg byed dang // rdo rje dri bral dang / de dag ni pad ma'i dkyil 'khor te/ rma bya'i gdan khri'o// rdo rje ba dan dang / rdo rje glu dang / rdo rje dpa' bo dang / rdo rje 'jigs
217a5: byed dang / de dag ni las kyi mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor te// mkha' lding gi gdan khri'o// dpa' bo de dag kyang rang gi rigs dang / thod pa'i phreng ba can spyan gsum pa// rang gi shes rab dang 'khyud pa/ rdo rje dkyil mo dkrung gis yi dag
217a6: kyi gdan la bzhugs pa'o mche ba rnam par gtsigs shing rnam par 'byung ba/ stag gi lpags pa gos su bsnams pa// zhal cig pa/ phyag bzhi pa/ thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM ga 'dzin ga/ cad te'u yi sgra hU~M dang bcas pa/ mgo'i
217a7: phreng ba'i do shal gyis brgyan pa/ phyag rgya lnga 'chang ba/ rang gi rigs kyi dbu rgyan can// ral pa dang zla ba 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i shar dkar po/ byang ljang gu/ nub dmar po/ lho ser po// las kyi mkha' 'gro'i shar
217a8: ser po/ / byang sngon po// nub dkar po lho dmar po// pad ma'i mkha' 'gro'i shar dkar po/ byang ldang khu/ nub sngon po// lho ser po/ rin chen mkha' 'gro'i shar ljang khu/ byad ser po/ nub dkar po lho sngon po//

217b1: sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro'i shir sngon po/ byang ljang gu/ rub dmar po/ lho ser po/ 'di dag ji lta'i rim pa yis// rdo rje 'khor lo ral gri dang / pad ma rin chen phreng ba yi// chos ni yongs su bskor bar bya// grwa bzhir mtho
217b2: ba'i bsgos te/ / ma mo thongs byed ma dang // ma ma'i sdang nyid yin te/ chags pa yin ma mo dang/ phrag dogos mad gan te// me yi phyogs la stsogs par dgod// kar dang sngo dang mar dang lda / thob pas
217b3: bzhin rnam sbyar/ / spyan gsum pa la gcer ba ste// phyag rgya lda ni 'dzin pa yin// byug bzhi pa la zhal cig pa// yi dgas gdan la rnam par bzhugs// dbang chen me dang chu dang ni// rlung gi dkyil 'khor sa
217b4: gnas/ / rigs kyi gdan la bzhugs pa yin// 'khor lo rdo rje pad ma dang // ral gri bod pa kha T+wAM ga/ kri gug yang ni phyag na 'chad// ma ning las byung lha mo sgom// bod pa y-i ni phreng ba can// dkyil po dkrung ni byed pa'o/
217b5: jiganod sbyin dang // rdo rje 'brang ba dang / rdo rje 'bying ba dang // rdo rje rta gdong dang // rdo rje dred gdong dang / rdo rje bde mchog dang // rdo rje dam tshig dang // rdo rje ta mchog te// khro bo yi rgyal po de dag ni// sgo rnams dang ni mtshams
217b6: su/ / sngo dang ljang dang dmar ser po// dbang dang sngo dang dud kha dkang// lcags kyu zhags pa lugs sgrog dang // dril bu thod pa kha T+wAM ga/ cang te'u yang ni de bzhin te/ tho bar dbyug to ma drung dang ni// dgras pod dag
217b7: mgo bo phyag na bsdams pa'o/ / zhal cig pa la phyag bzhi pa// dbu sgra dmar ser gyen du rjes/ phyag rgya lnga ni 'dzin pa ste// steg gi lpags bgos su bskams// bad pa'i ni phreng ba 'chang // mgo bo'i
217b8: doshal dam par brgyan/ / nyi ma pad pa'i steng du ni// g.yas brkyad pa yi zhabs kyis bzhugs// phyogs skyong brgyad kyi khril bzhugs// mche ba rnam gtsigs rnam sbyar zhal// spyan gsum rang rigs

218a1: gcod pan can/ / rang gi rigs dang gnyis med sbyor// snying rje yi ni nyams can te// phyi rol rdo rje yi dgas kyis// yongs su bskor bar bsgom par bya// thog mar gsal byed ming dang hUM// mtha'
218a2: ru phaT dang sbyar bar bya/ / sngar bshad cho ga'i bsrung ba byas// phung po khams dang skye mched dang // lus ngag yid la bsgom par bya// mkha' 'gro zhal drug phyag bcu gnyis// rang gi mtshan ma dril bu yis//
218a3: gnyi su med par mnyam par ldan/ mdung dang lcags kyu zhags pa thod pa dang // kha T+wAM ga dang mgo bo dang // cang te'u dang ni gri gug dang / nA ra'i lpags pa 'dzin pa yin// sngo dang ser dang dmar ljang khu// dung kha dang ni
218a4: dkar ba dang / / dkar dang sngo dang ser dmar dang // ljang dang thal ba'i mdog lta bu'o// ser dang sngo dang dkar ba dang // dmar dang ljang khu pad ma'i mdog/ dmar dang dkar dang sngon po dang // sir dang ljang dang nam
218a5: mkha'i mdog/ ldang dang dkar dang dmar ba dang // sngo dang ser dang dkar ba'i mdog/ de dag mkha' 'gro lnga yi ni// zhal mdog gi ni khyad par yin// yang na zhal cig phyag gnyis bsgom// phreng ba'i gsang sngag
218a6: ming dang bcas/ / mkhas pas zur bzhi mtshams nas so// mthar ni hUM hUM phaT dang sbyar// oM ma hA su ka badz+ra DA ka hUM/ DA ki nI dzA la saM ba ra AHhUM phaT swA hA/ oM ma hA sakas Na ka b+h+rU~M DA ki nI dzA la sa~M ba ra AH
218a7: hUM phaT swA hA/ oM ma hA su ka rad na DA ka traM DA ki nI dzA la saM ba ra AHhU~M phaT swA hA/ oM ma hA su ka bad ma DA ka tri DA ki nI dz+wa la saM ba ra AHhUM phaT swA hA/ oM ma hA s+yA ka bi shwa rA ka khai DA ki nI dz+wa la saM ba ra
218a8: AHhUM phaT swA hA/ / de dag ni mkha' 'gro lnga'i snying po'i gsang sngags te// 'di ni ye shes kyi snying por gyur pa yin no// oM badz+ra DA ka raM hUM phaT/ oM bud d+ha TI ka nyaM hUM phaT/ oM rad na DA ka NaM hUM phaT/ oM pad ma DA

218b1: kan hU~M u0f7f/ oM bi shwa nA ka maM hU~M phaH/ ye shes dam tshig ro cig pa// mkhas pas bsgom par byas nas su// dam tshig gis ni legs dbang bskur// sku tshogs mchod pa rnam par bsgom// dkyil 'khor/
218b2: dag ni thams cad kyang // go 'phang dran nas dbang yang bskur// sna tshogs phun sum tshogs pa'i mchog/ de bzhin 'khyud dang tsum b+ha na// b+ha ga'i ling ga'i sbyor ba dag/ ye shes rnam smin dpa' ba'i mchog
218b3: shes rab thabs kyis phyag rgya drug/ rnam par lta zhing nges par brtag/ dga' ba dang po ye shes te// mchog tu dga' ba mnyam par sbyor// bde bar dga' bar grub pa che// lan cig skyes dga' bla med
218b4: yin/ / sbyor ba dang ni shin tu sbyor// sbyor ba che dang ye shes sbyor// de dag cho ga'i rim pa'o// thig le'i gzhung gi sbyor shes na// phra ba'i sbyor bas blta bar bya// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rgyu// chos
218b5: kyis dbyings kyi go 'phang thob/ / cho ga nges par bsgrubs nas ni// myur du rnal 'byor pa yis 'grub// 'di ni nges pa kho na'o// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las gsang ba'i ye shes kyi
218b6: le'u ste drug bcu rtsa gsum pa'o/ / // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// thugs kyi snying po mchog gyur pa// mkha' dbyings rdo rje'i dbus gnas par// ye shes zla ba rnam par bsgom// a yi yi ge
218b7: las byung ba/ / rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che// kha ba kun d+ha'i mdog lta bu dag pa'i shel dang mtshungs pa'o// zhal gsum phyag drug zhi ba ste// spyan gsum pa la thugs rje'i nyams// sna tshogs pa
218b8: ma'i zla dbus bzhugs/ / stong pa'i ye shes las byung ba// zla ba phyed pa ral pa 'ching // thod pa yi ni dbu rgyan can// rgyan rnams thams cad yang dag rdzogs// rdo rje dkyil mo dkrung gi bzhugs// rang gi

219a1: lus dang sbyor bar gnas/ / snying rje chags dang mngon gyur pa// dkar zhing sngo la dmar ba'i zhal// rnam thar gsum gyi rang bzhin can// rdo rje dril bu mnyam par ldan// lha mo mchu ni rnam 'ching
219a2: te/ / rdo rje mdung dang thod pa dang // kha T+wAM ga dang thod pa 'dzin// yi ge a dang nyi dbus bzhugs// rdo rje sems pa rnam par bsgom// i las rdo rje zla ba ste// I las rdo rje sgyu 'phrul lo// e las chos kyi rdo rje ste//
219a3: e las sna tshogs sgyu 'phrul ma// lha mo bzhi po de dag ni// de yi zhal mdog 'dzin pa'o// skra grol bal mig po che// snying rje rtags par rnam par myos// rang gi thabs dang lhan cig bcas// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/
219a4: sna tshogs yi dgas snying du bsgom// gtso bo shes rab dkyil mo dkrung // thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan// rdo rje dril bus mnyam par ldan// mdung dang gri gug phyag na bsnams//
219a5: thod pa kha T+wAM ga 'dzin cing // dngos grub thams cad rab tu stsol// ji ltar dpa' bo'i rnal 'byor bzhin// de yi mdog dang phyag mtshan 'dzin// lha mo bzhi yi kha sbyar gsang // snying po sbyor ba mchog yin no// gsang ba
219a6: mchog gi dgyes pa na/ / thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs// gsang ba kun gyi mchog de nyid// mkha' 'gro ma'i snying po mchog/ gsang ba'i ye shes dam tshig ste// chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin yin// u ni snying khang/
219a7: bsgom pa ste// A ni mgo bor de bzhin no// oM ni spyig drug dag tu ste// oM ni mig tu dgod par bya// aM ni go char dgod pa ste// ma ni mtshon du rnam par dgod// sku gsung thugs su sbyor ba yis// bdag nyid kyang ni
219a8: bsgom par gnas/ / ye shes dam tshig sbyor ba yis// bla med mchod dang dbang yang bskur// mnyam pa'i dam tshig sbyor ba yis// chos kyang de bzhin mnyam pa yin// dngos po kun na ro cig ste// gnyis su med//

219b1: pa'i mchog grub pa// dam tshig thun mtshams bzhin du ste// dus bzhi rtag tu rnam par bsgom// kha sbyar bzhi yi sbyor ba ni// thun bzhi la ni rnam par bsam// snying rjes kun la 'gro bya zhing // cha med par ni rnam par
219b2: skom/ / thams cad rdo rje sems dpa' ste// shes rab tu med rjes su 'gro// rdo rje rnal 'byor dbang phyug sbyor// bdag nyid rdo rje bdag po yin// bgrang du med pa'i rus pa yin// ye shes bzlas pa yin par bka
219b3: bzlas pa ye shes bsgom pa ste/ / sprul pa drug ni spro ba'o// de bas dam tshig bzlas pa ni// cho ga bzhin du bzlas pa bya// oM AHa A i I/ u U/ e e/ o oM/ oM aHhU~M swA hA/ dung chen phreng ba blangs nas
219b4: ni/ / rtag tu gsang sngags rgyal po bzla// dag byed bsod napas chen po ste// dge zhing nyes pa'i 'joms pa yin// sdug bsngal thams cad 'joms byed cing // dge ba'i kun gyi 'bras bu ste// gsang sngags kun gyi ston
219b5: pa ste/ / rnam par dben pa'i sa phyogs su// mkha' 'gro ma yi snying po yi// dgyes pa'i bde ba las byung ba// lha mo bzhi po dga' ba ste// rnal 'byor dbang phyug mchog tu bde// rig kyi bde ba bcom ldan 'das// rang
219b6: byung rdo rje sems dpa' yin/ / mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las lha mo bzhi'i gsang ba kha sbyor gyi le'u ste drug bcu rtsa bzhi pa'o// // de nas sbyor ba'i mchog bshad pa// gdug pa thams cad za byed pa//
219b7: marungs phyi dang nang 'joms pa// nam mkha' stong pa lta bu las// yi ge k+Sha las sngon byung zhing // mkha' 'gro'i dra ba bde mchog ni// phyag gnyis pa la zhal cig pa// spyan gsum pa la 'jigs pa'i zhal// g.yas brgyang
219b8: pa yis bzhugs pa la/ / ma rungs bdud kyi dgra gnon cing // phyag rgya chen po mnyam ldan pas// zod pa dril bus yang dag 'khrud// thod pa'i dbus su yid 'ong ba'i// rdo rje mchog gi rnam pang mtshan// ye shes bdud rtsis yongs

220a1: gang ba/ / lag pa g.yas par bzhag nas ni// sna tshogs pa yi sku lus la// phyag rgya drug gis sku yang brgyan// zhal gdong mche ba rnam gtsigs shing // spyi gtsugs thod pas rgyan du byas// sna tshogs rdo rjes
220a2: spyi bor mtshan/ / zla ba phyed pa ral pa 'chang // rdo rje sems dpa'i dbu rgyan can// rdo rje 'jigs byed bsgom pa yin// dogs pa rnam par spangs shing yongs su dag pa'i blos// rnam par rtogs pa'i bri ma'i khyad par med par byed// byams
220a3: dang snying rje'i rgyan gyis lus la brgyan du byas/ / 'dzem med bde ba'i rnal 'byor legs par bsgrubs pa'i bdag/ shin tu 'jigs pa'i dud 'gro'i dur khrod chen po na// ro langs srin po'i sna tshogs sgra rnams sgrogs par byed/
220a4: phod kyi sgra byed sa yi 'jigs pas khyab par byed// gzhan yang sgrub po rnal 'byor 'thun pa'i yul du bsgrub// yang na zhal ni bzhi pa dang // 'di la phyag brgyad rnam par bsgom// dkar dang sngo dang dmar ser po// zhal dag
220a5: sgyur zhing 'jigs par mdzad/ / mdung dang rdo rje kha T+wAM ga/ cang te'u mgo bo gri gug thogs// sna tshogs phyag la bskyod pa'i ljags// ha hA hi hI hUM hUM dang / phaT ces bya ba'i sgra sgrogs shing // dpa' bo cig pu 'jigs mdzad
220a6: pas/ / gdul dka' thams cad 'dul mdzad cing // sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor ba yis// khro bo'i sprin ni mkhas pas spro// bsam gtan dga' ba bsgrub pa'i phyir// khro bo yin sku ru bsgrub// dam tshig bza' zhing bzlas pa bya//
220a7: dam tshig kha sbyar byas nas bzla// mnyam par gnas shing bzlas nas so// chos rnams ma lus bsgom par bya// oM ak+Sha hUM phaT// srid gsum sdig pazad byed cing // mtshams med lnga yang zad par byed// sdug bsngal
220a8: thams cad zad byed cing / / srid pa dag kyang skyong bar byed// sbyor ba yi ni mchog dam pa// glags tsam gyis ni nges par 'grub// gdug cing gnod byed sems can dang // ma rungs las la chags pa dang // log par lta dang

220b1: bcas pa las/ 'di dag nges par bza' bar bya// sangs rgyas sprul pa'i rgyan rnam spro// khams gsum dag ni sgrol bar byed// sngags pas sngags kyi mchog de ni// ming dang bcas pas lhan cig bzla// oM phaT che ge/
220b2: mo b+hak+Sha ya phaT/ k+Sha hUM phaT// bdag nyid khro bo'i sems kyis ni// maM sa bza' zhing gcer bu dang // skra grol rol mnan pa dang // zhags pa lcags kyu phyag gis 'dzin// gsang sngags cho ga bzhin du ni// khri phrag stong du
220b3: bzla zhing bsgom/ / rnal 'byor cho ga bzhin du ni// khams gsum po dag gsod par 'gyur// mkha' 'gro ma ni 'khor bcas pas// bza' bar yang ni rnam par bsam// bdag nyid rdo rje khab thogs pa'i// khro bo snying du
220b4: gzhug par bya/ / snying dang sgyu ma rkang dang rus// sha dang khrag rnams 'dral byed cing // mtshams med lnga rnams byed pa dang // gdug pa can rnams bza' bar bya// mkha' 'gro lte bar bzhugs nas ni// mkha' 'gro ma dang /
220b5: lhan cig sbyor// rdo rje blo ldan rab sbyor bas// zhag bdun gyis ni phebs par 'gyur// bsam gtan byas pa tsam gyis ni// gdug pa bdag gis zos par 'gyur// nyi ma phyed dang mtshan phyed dang // las 'di dag la 'jug
220b6: bar bya/ / gcer bu skra grol byas pa yis// gshin rje'i phyogs su kha bltas te// khyim bya'i stan gyi sbyor ba yis// me yi gsang sngags bzla bar bya// phaT hUM raM raM raM/ mtshams med pa 'di zhes bya ba// raM raM raM hUM phaT/ ji bzhin
220b7: bzlas pa byas tsam gyis/ / nyin zhag bcu bdag gis ni// rdo rje 'dzin pa mngon sum pa'ang // 'chi bar yang ni the tshom med// gal te sdig can slar log na// 'di la zhi ba'i las rnams bya// gsang sngags bzlas pa cher byas nas
220b8: 'dis kyang zhi bar 'gyur ba yin/ / oM swA hA/ a a baM a mu kaM pA pa bi ra to bA bI sh+ya ti ta s+ya/ si pa shan ting ba ban du baM aM a oM swA hA// 'o ma btung zhing gos dkar gyon// zhi ba'i sems kyis stong nyid gnas//

221a1: dkar po dri yis lus phyug go// bya rog khyi dngadabyil dang // na ku la'i sha rnams bza'// thams cad rab tu gnas gyur te// 'di la yid gnyis dpyod pa med// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma
221a2: las khro bo rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po'i bdag po'i kha sbyar gnod pa'i le'u ste drug bcu rtsa lnga pa'o/ / // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// srid pa'i nang na skye bdun// sna tshogs pa shu'i dam tshig ni// lha yi
221a3: gzugs can yid 'phrog pa/ / lha'i gzugs can gzi brjid dpal// pa shu'i nang na rgyal po yin// skal bzang yid 'ong bde bar 'gro// swa yi myug gu de bzhin ring // mig ni dkyus ring mig kyang dmar// pad ma'i 'dab ma
221a4: 'dra ba'i gzugs/ / de yi lus la rdul rab 'byung // lus las lha yi dri 'thung zhing // kha yi dbug nil sbur dri// ldan pas spang ma rtag tu 'khor// gcin dang phyis blardzi bro// tshig ni 'jam par gyur pa dang // lag pa dang ni nang pa
221a5: 'jam/ / ud pa la yi dri dang ldan// skra dkar gnyer ma las rnam grol// lus kyang sngam zhing mnyen pa dang // snying dang thod pa lte ba ste// des na ro tsan ru 'gyur// grib bdun dang ba'i 'gros su 'gro// snying rje'i bsam/
221a6: pa can yin te// dkon mchog gsum la rtag tu dang // sbyin dang tshul khrims dag dang ldan// 'di 'dranal 'byor pas rtogs na// mi gsod me yis tshig mi 'gyur// srog chags sna tshogs 'dren ba dag/ gang yang /
221a7: rung bas za mi nus// de nas mtshan mo mi mthong ste// mi snang ba yi dbang phyug mchog/ 'di 'dra sngags pas rtogs nas ni// bdag gis blangs te sbyin pa spyad// dri chen chu dang byang chub sems// mkhas pas blangs
221a8: ti lu bya/ lpags gsum gyis ni rnam dkris te// blo dang ldan pas bsgrub par bya// dbang po gnyis ni rab sbyar nas// nye ba'i snying po lan 'bum zas// de 'dra lag du byin nas ni// sbyin pa 'di las bdag la byin/

221b1: de'adi ma ga tu yang // mi spyad pal bya ba rgyad// ni ben par khyer nas su// mnyam par bzhag ste bsgrub par bya// gzhan yang las rnams rab pa gang bya/ ngos shAbang jim das// de yi spyi ba 'am
221b2: nas/ / gzhan yang dungad 'gro'i spu dang ro// ngo bsras the gur byas nas su// gang gi mgul du bcing byas pas// de 'dra ba yi gzugs su 'gyur// sna tshogs gzugs kyang byed pa yin// de yi lpags pa blangs
221b3: nas ni/ / de la he ru ka dpal bri// mngon sum khro bo'i dngos grub ni// he ru ka dpal byed pa yin// rkang lag lpags pa blangs nas ni// 'byung po'i sgra dang bcas bsres nas// phyi ma'i ri lur byas nas su// mngon/
221b4: bar bsngags te cho ga bya// mkhas pas rgyal gyi nyi ma la// lcags gsum gyis ni rnam dkris nas// lag pa g.yan pas de blangs te// mthe bong sras pa'i khu tshur gyis// khu tshur de ni mgor bzhag na// de ma
221b5: thag tu rkun ma rengs/ / rang gi lag gis dpung gnyis blangs// rang skra zhags pa blangs nas thogs// g.yas pa lcags kyu thogs nas ni// the gu lnga yis rnam par dkri// phyogs gar nor gyis gang ba yi// de
221b6: yi phyogs mthong blang bar bya/ / khyim du bkod cing steng 'dug nas// sngags bzlas nas ni mkha' la spyod// oM dza a bAM ba hUM ba hUM a ba rAn du khe tsa ri dza ri hri swA hA// nor dang 'bru dang de bzhin gos// yid la/
221b7: glang 'dod ci yang rung // de dag thams cad myur du 'grags// khyim gang bar yongs su mthong // ma sa dag ni thos nas su// l-I yi lus su gyur pa yin// rnal 'byor rdo rje'i lus gyur te// des
221b8: ni shi ba dbang du 'gyur/ / chu bo cho ga bzhin blangs nas// sra dang bsres nas de bsgril te// thi gu cho ga bzhin du ni// bsgril nas zhags pa dag tu bya// g.yas brkyang gnas shing khro gnas par// gang gi ming gi bzlas

222a1: brjod kyis/ / zhags pa btab na de ma thag/ lha mo 'gugs shing de mdun gnas// de'i rus pa'i phye ma yis// mkhas pas dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// 'di la dkyil 'khor dngos grub ni//
222a2: 'dod pa ni de la gnas// gzhan yang rgyan du byas pa dang // rdo rje mtshan gyis mdzes par bya// chub dag gis mchod phyir thogs// de ru brdang ba'i tsan dan gyis// byug pa'i brtul zhugs 'dzin pa ni// mkha' la/
222a3: spyod par 'gyur ba yin// bsgrub pa til mar chen po yi// mig sman nges par byas nas ni// grib ma yang ni mthong mi 'gyur// rnal 'byor zhag gis bsdus na ni// mtshan mo'ang nyin par lta bur 'gyur//
222a4: rnal 'byor rkang dag zos nas ni// tshim par 'gyur gyi gzhan du min// ji srid gnas par mi bkres shing // yid gzhungs dran pa 'phel bar 'gyur// rnal 'byor sngon gyi skye ba dran// rdo rje sems dpar 'gyur ba
222a5: yin/ / rgyu ma phye mar byas nas su// mkhas pas grib ma la yang bskam// gang gis mgo la bzhag pa na// de ma thag tu dbang du 'gugs// sngags pas glo ba zos na ni// de ma thag tu nad med 'gyur// rkang
222a6: pablangs nas ma bstun na/ / zar gyi rgyun ni 'bebs par byed// blo ldan gsang ba blangs nas bsam// tsan dan dmar po dang bsres nas// de ni phyemar dbyas nas su// bud med gang la byin na ni// 'dod pas gdungs pa'i
222a7: bud med gang / / dbang du gyur te mngag gzhug byed// pus mo'i rus pa ki la ya// sor mo bcu gnyis tshad tsam zhig/ gang gi ming bcas spras pa yis// de yi rigs rgyud med par 'gyur// rnal 'byor ji tra zos na ni//
222a8: ngag gi dngos grub dag tu 'gyur// rnal 'byor hri zos na ni// sems ni thub pa nyid du 'gyur// so yi rgyal po bzhi po dag/ steng 'og rdag ni blangs nas kyang // bung pa dag na bi shog pa dang // chub ma'i 'dab ma rdul dang ni//

222b1: rdul 'dis bsgrub pa byas na ni// d+hU ba dang ni mi nu mongs// rnga rnams phye mar byas pa yi// bud med thams cad rnams par 'gyur// rang byung me tog ro catsan// a lag ta dang gur gum gyis// thig le sngags pas sbyar na ni/
222b2: 'khor los sgyur ba'ang dbang du 'gyur// rnal 'byor mig 'bras phye ma yis// pha rol sde de 'byed par 'gyur// nu ma zos btsam gyis n-i// de sa bag tu'am 'gugs// rnal 'byor mtshan ni zas tsam gyis// bud med ma dzan
222b3: sod la 'gugs/ / nal 'byor sa dang sa mo byas// gang du gang gis mgo la gtor// thub pa brgyad po 'thub pa yin// pa dang buni yin na yang // rnam par snang bar byas par 'gyur// mchu cher byas pa'i sbyor ba lag/
222b4: kha ni gnon par 'gyur ba yin// rtswa phye byas bu'i sbyor ba yis// dbugs ni gnon par 'gyur ba yin// nA ba'i sbyor bas 'on par 'gyur// mgo ba lags pas mngon btags te// kha'i drung du mngon pa zlas na/ !
222b5: rnam sa kun gyigs par 'gyur/ / thod pa yin sbyor gyi yis// dag ta 'khrugs par byung ba yin// yod pa lani thub pa yin// nod par byas pa 'on yin// min da pa cu can// de gnyis cig kyang sres byas nas// ga ma tsha
222b6: le gcig gyur na/ / dbang ba'i gnas ni mthong bar 'gyur// ro can dang myang smras dag/ lhan cig tu ni b+hag pa yis// thug pa med pa'i stobs 'gyur te// pha rol dag ni gnon par 'gyur// bu tran dz+wa la can// lhan
222b7: cag tu na b+har byas nas/ / bud med dgang la byas gtor na// de ni 'dod pas spos gyur nas// da kring 'tsho ba'i byag nas// ro ts+tshin dang byA tras gnyis// spyan cig tu ni bsdus pa yis// 'byung ba kun dang 'byung ba rnams/
222b8: brkyen ma ma ba dang // de'i drang ngu khod par 'gyur// ci 'dod pa dag ster bar 'gyur// can dang na te// lhan cig tun byar byas te// ga pa'i mag dang migasran byung // brnal par gnas kyi bar dran// nga

223a1: yang ni 'gyur ba yin/ / chu srin lag ni ro tsa na// lhan cig tu ni phyir byas nas// nA ga ma de lhan cig tu// ri lu dag tu byas nas kyang // rdo rje gzi brjid dang bsres nas// mig gi sman ni byas gyur na//
223a2: nor skyong gi ni glang po yang // mngon sum du ni gnas nas kyang // de la bdag gis zhon na ni// glang chen 'khor ni mang po dang // gzhan gyis mi thub par 'gyur ro// pha rol sde ni 'jom byed cing // gzhan gyi yul la dbang byed
223a3: pa'i/ / ci 'dod pa ni ster bar 'gyur// 'bram ma dan Ti ro tsa na// lhan cig tu ni sbyor ba yis// rigs byed rgol ba med par 'gyur// rma bya'i mkhris pa'i ro tsa na// ri bong khrag dang lhan cig tu// ri lu rtag tu bsgrub byas nas//
223a4: mabya'i 'jug mas bcings na ni// phung ba bzhin du 'phur 'gyur te// lha rnams 'gugs pa'i dngos grub cing // rig pa 'dzin pa 'ongs par 'gyur// de'i lan ni 'ga' tsam gyis// ji ltar 'dod pa ster bar 'gyur// lha yi
223a5: gzhal med khang 'phrog cing / / lha yi bu mo'ang 'gugs par 'gyur// 'dod na dbang du sdod byed cing // mi 'dod sems can don yang byed// 'jug mthur bltas byas na ni// gter rnams kyang ni mthong bar 'gyur// blangs
223a6: pas sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin/ / yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba yin// sa 'og gter gyi sgo ga la// 'jug ma bskor ba byas na ni// sgo dbye bas ni 'jug par bya// lha min bu mo lhan cig rol// lha yi bcud dang bcud kyis len
223a7: 'phrog cing nges ni zos gyur te/ / 'dod pa'i lha yis gzugs su 'gyur// grub pa'i rdzas ni blangs pa yis// sems can don rnams byed cing 'gro// de nas yan lag lnga pa yi// cho ga dag tu 'gyur ba ni// spu dang
223a8: lpags bsha dang ni/ / rus pa rkang pa blangs nas su// dri chen chu dang shu kra dang // mtshal rnams dag ni lhan cig tu// ri lu byas nas bsgrub par bya// lcags gsum gyis ni rnam dkris nas// kha yi nang du sbas na ni//

223b1: dab pal 'a lan 'gro bar 'gyur// ra can dang lhan cig tu// khams gsum du ni rgyal chen 'gyur// mngon par brjod pa'i spyad tha ma'i bla ma las skye ba bdun pa'i thugs chen brlab pa'i le'us drug bcu drug
223b2: de nas gzhan yang bsha byab/ / nga gakyis kyi mig bsgom pa// rang ni chos kyi la bar gyur// bdag med chos ni yang dag bskom// chom yi ge bcog dag ba// chos kyis sa sras dang byung yan/
223b3: sangs 'byung / chag mirnam par bskos// mi gnyilas des byu ba// rnam par thornam par bathos// rdzog shes pas byu ba/ ma rnam par bgos// rgyun migasas blang ba// me bsod par
223b4: rnam par skob/ / makyil shes las bskyed pa// rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par banapa// ma ny+dzu ma rgyalas byung ba// sangs rgyas mapa' 'grornam par bsgom// mdza sngalas byung ba// don chen mkha' 'amadam par bag
223b5: alas des 'byung ba/ / pad ma'i mkha' 'gro rnam par bskol// kha ti ta thA las byung ba// sna tshogs mkha' 'phonam par bsgom// rnalas mkha' 'grom da de// sems nal 'byor ma bzhin// las sa mos pa
223b6: spyod/ / b.las mkha' la spyod pa yin// maM las ma mo nyid yin te// dpa' bo'i btsun mo snyan grags ma// de ni thugs kyi gtso bo te// dums dag ni byung ba yin// ka ni lus kyi rdo rje ste// yig gsum las byung he ru//
223b7: las 'jam pa rdo rjeste// si las kun tu bzang po yin// b.las 'jig rten mgon pa ste// TI las sa'i snying po'o// b.las phyag na rdo rje ste// mo las byams pa nyid yin te// la lus nam mkha'i snying por grags/
223b8: g.yas nam mkha'i mdzod yin no// sa las sgrib pa kun sel ba// galas spos kyi gang po yin// dz+ha las ye shes rtog kyang yin// a las tho gros mi bzad pa// bralas spros pa sogs pa ste// sa las ngan song

224a1: kun 'dran pa/ / sa las ngan song kun 'joms pa// dza las dra ba can gyi 'od// tsa las zla ba'i 'od yin te// ra las byung ba'i rin chen 'od// sra las nyi ma'i 'od yin no// ba las rdo rje 'od kyang yin// ma las muH
224a2: chen thob pa ste/ / su ni su da d+ha yin no// ba las bzang skyong nyid yin te// sa las blo gros rgya mtsho'o// kun tu bzang po 'jam pa'i dbyangs// 'jig rten mgon pos snying po// phyag na rdo rje byams pa dang // nam mkha'i snying po/
224a3: nam mkha'i mdzod// sgrib pa rnam par sel ba dang // spos kyi glang po nyid yin te// mi zad pa dang ye shes tog/ spobs pa brtsegs pa mchog yin te// mya ngan kun 'joms nyid yin no// ngan song kun 'dren nyid dang ni// dra
224a4: ba zla ba rin chen dang / / nyi ma rdo rje 'od mchog ste// su d+ha na dang rin chen thog/ rgya mtsho dang ni bzang skyong ngo // de dag sngon nyid grub pa ste// phreng ba'i gsang sngags rnam par sbyar// de dag dam tshig tu bshad de// dngos grub
224a5: kyi ni grub pa stsol/ / rdo rje pho nya mo nyid dang // skul byed dang ni rin chen sgron// rdo rje nyi ma de bzhin te// ro langs rdo rje gzhon nu ma// kaM bo dzi dang de bzhin te// sangs rgyas byang chub mo de bzhin// ye shes sgron dang rdor 'jigs ma//
224a6: ye shes sgron dang rgyal byed ma// sgrol ma dang ni gos dkar mo// spyan dang mA ma kI mchog dang // rgyal mtshan so sor 'brang ma dang // rma bya dang ni ri khrod ma// lu gu rgyud dang phyir zlog ma// lha mo gtsug gtor rdor 'jigs ma//
224a7: sngan grub pa yi lha mo ste// 'dod pa'i 'bras bu thams cad stsol// gsang byed ming dang bcas par ni// mthar ni hU~M phaT sbyar bar bya// tha mar swA tA mnyam par gyur// sngags kyi dngos grub rab tu stsol// gshin rje gshed
224a8: dang rta mchog rgyal/ / bgegs ni gnon par mdzad pa yin// shes rab mthar byed bzhi po ni// 'dod pa'i don kun grub byed yin// 'dod rgyal dbyug sngon stobs po che// brgyad par mi g.ye grags pa ste// khro ba chen po nga

224b1: ljon grub pa/ / gdug pa thams cad ngas par gnan// dkar mo sogs dam tshig lha'o// khrag ma blangs mo brgyad pa yin// sngar ba shad mkha' 'gro ma rnams te// khro ba cung dang gnyis med gnas// rtsa ba'i brgyad dang ldan/
224b2: pa'i sngags// ming dang yang dag sbyar bar bya// gsal byed o ni kun tu yang // mthar ni hU~M phaT swA tAr sbyar// gsal byed ming dang rA dang ni// mthar ni phaT dang sA hA ra sbyar// gzugs dang sgra yi lha mo dang // dri dang rol
224b3: lha mo ste/ / mdab ma bzhi la rnam par sbyar// phyogs kyi gos can skra grol ma// reg pas reg pa'i rdo rjer grags// gnyis su med par yang dag gnas// dbus su khrag mthung rgyal po ni// mo'i rig pas bde bar bzhus/
224b4: snying po chos kyi dbyings su grags// shes rab pha rol phyin las byung // ye shes sems dpa' gnyis med bzhugs// rdo rje chos kyi dbyings ma ste// gnyis med mnyam pa'i ye shes ni// chos kyi dbyings te mi dmigs pa'o//
224b5: deni gsang ba de nyid mchog/ rdo rje can ni yang dag stsol// che ba'i mchog ni 'dus pa ste// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ sbyor brgyud kyi rjes 'brang ba// bgrod dang bgrod min rnal 'byor ma// rig pa'i rgya mtsho mchog
224b6: yin te/ / rdo rje mkha' 'gro nyung zad cig/ sgyu 'phrul sdom pa'i rgyud yin no// rnal 'byor ma ni 'byung ba'i rgyud// gsang ba'i rgya mtsho rgyud yin te// des brjod rgyud ni bla med pa// 'dus pa mchog ni bshad pa yin// ji ltar//
224b7: bsam pa'i khyad par gyis// sems can rjes su gzung ba'i rgyud// 'dus pa mchog gi dam pa 'di// sangs rgyas byang chub 'bras bu ster// rigs ni rnam pa lnga bshad pa// byang chub sems dpa' du mngag/ ji ltar 'dod
224b8: pa de ltar ni/ / bdag po nyid du bya ba yin// ji ltar mig gi rjes mthun par// nges brjod rgyud kyi rim pa dang // rdo rje sgrub pa po yis ni// nges brjod rgyud kyi las rnams bya// yid kyis ngogs pa kun spangs te// gnyis su

225a1: med pa'i bsgom pa nyid/ theg pa chen po'i dam pa mchog/ dngos grub tshe dang ldan par 'gro// de nas phyag mtshan mchog bshad bya// gzugs dang mdog gi cho ga'i rim// yi ge he las nges 'byung ba// bdag
225a2: nyid he ru kar bsgom bya/ / grwa lus dkar la drag shul che// mche ba rnam gtsigs 'jigs pa ste// spyan gsum pa la zhal lnga pa// phyag drug zhabs ni bzhi pa ste// zod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// ral pazla byed/
225a3: dbul bcings// sna tshogs rdo rje'i dbu rgyan can// phyag rgya drug gis sku lus rgyan// stag gi lpags pa gos su bsnams// mgo bo 'do shal gyis brgyan pa// dkar dang ser dang de bzhin dmar// ljang khu steng zhal
225a4: ba'o/ / bzhad dang dpa' dang sgeg pa dang // rnga ma dang zhi dang drag pa ste// rdo rje dril bu mnyam ldan pas// rdo rje reg pas gnyis med gnas// rgyal ba'i lpags pa mchog kyang 'dzin// bde ba kun gyi 'bras bu stsol// thod
225a5: pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin/ / rdo rje mdung ni phyag mchog ste// g.yas brkyang pa yis gnas pa yis// bdud bzhi po ni zhabs 'og gnon// reg pa'i rdo rje ldang ba dang // dkar ba'i mdangs kyis gzugs can la//
225a6: ldang dang ser deng dmar ba dang // dkar ba g.yon pa'i zhal gdong ste// steng gi zhal gdong sngol 'jigs// skra grol ba ni rnam par myos// seng ge'i rnam grol phyag rgya can// byin pa gnyis ni legs par
225a7: 'khril/ / thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// spyan gsum shin tu dmar ba ste// rdo rje thod par mnyam par ldan// dril bu cang te'u yis brgyan// mdung dang kha T+wAM phyag na bsnams// chags pa chen po me
225a8: yi 'od/ / phyogs kyi gos can zhi ba'i nyams// gdul dka' thams cad 'dul mdzad cing // sna tshogs sems can 'dul bar mdzad// thugs rje'i nyams ni yongs su rdzogs// zla ba nyi ma'i dbus su yang //

225b1: sna tshogs pad ma'i dkyil na bzhugs// 'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan dang // zhabs kyis gnon par rnam par bsgom// 'khor kun dang ni zhal gsum pa// thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// drag cing
225b2: zhi ba nyid yin te/ / rigs gsum gyis ni phye ba'i gzugs// rigs gsum gyi ni phyag mtshan 'dzin// lha mos phye ba'i gzugs can no// dam tshig gnyis su med par sbyor// thams cad yi dgas gdan la
225b3: bzhugs/ / g.yas brkyang ba ba zhabs kyis gnon// byin pa gnyis kyis legs par 'khril// shes rab thabs ni rnam par bsgom// mtshams rnams su ni bum pa dag/ thod pa zla ba yongs su gang // zur rnams/
225b4: su ni sgo srungs te// ji ltar mdog gi cha rnams so// g.yas brkyang ba pi zhabs kyis bzhugs// 'jig rten skyong ba zhabs 'og gnon// thor pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// thugs rje khro bas rnam par myos//
225b5: dkar po la stsogs mdog sbyor ba// ji ltar g.yas pa'i zhal rim bzhin// phyag rgya rim pa'ang de bzhin no// lugs 'byung lugs las bzlog par ni// 'khor sogs mchog kyang dgod par bya// rdo rje pad ma'i dbus
225b6: su ni/ / rigs kyi 'khor lo gsum dkyil na// rang gi byin brlabs 'chang ba'i mchog/ sangs rgyas mu stegs can la sa// 'di ni rab tu gsang ba ste// bla ma'i ngag la gnas pa yin// rnal 'byor ma yi drin yin
225b7: no/ / gnas la stsogs pa'i rim stor ba// sum bcu rtsa bdun rnam dag dgod// shes rab thabs bdag 'gro ba yin// sa bcu pa yi mchog kyang 'gugs// pha rol phyin pa bcu la gnas// sbyor ba gsum gyi rnam dag don/
225b8: 'din de med bsgom pa mchog/ mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las bdag nyid chos kyi yi ge las bskyed pa'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i bsgom pa'i le'u ste drug bcu rtsa bdun pa'o// // de nas mchog tu bshad

226a1: bya ba/ / bdag nyid cho ga sgom pape rim// mA ma kI dang spyan dang ni// lha mo sgrol ma gos dkar mo// 'od zer can dang dza ma b+ha la// lha mo skul byengs 'dzin ma// rang gi sa bon las byung ba// phyag bcu gnyis kyis
226a2: rnam par brgyan/ / spyar gsum pa la g.yas brkyang bzhugs// sems dpa'i dkyil mo dkrung gis bzhugs// rdo rje dkyil mo dkrung gis gnas// rig byed bzhi yi zhal gdong ste// phyogs kyi gos can ro yi gangan//
226a3: skra grol ba la 'jigs pa ste// zod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// khro bas lta zhing thugs rje'i nyams// shes rab pha rol byin lha mo// de nyid ye shes mchog las byung // so so yang dag sbyor ba'i bdag/ de nyid ye
226a4: shes gdon mi za/ / khro bo sna tshogs gzugs can ni// dpa' bo rang nyid las byung ba// khro mchog mkha' 'gro 'byung ba yang // gos pa med par nyams pa yi// bdag po nyid du sbyor bar bya// bdag nyid sgom pa/
226a5: nyid yin no// mnyam par ma bzhag sbyor ba yis// som zhing rnam par spyos par bya// phra ba'i khro bo'i rdo rje can// snying kha'i pad ma'i dbus su ni// rdo rje mkha' 'gro thugs brtse can 'di nyid du ni gnas
226a6: mdzang cing / / rdzogs sangs rgyas kun byang chub sems// 'gro ba gsum po 'di la gnas// 'di nyid kyis mchod pa nyid kyis// mchod 'om thams cad mchod pa yin// gang zhig 'di la rtag wA ba// de ni rgyal
226a7: bas mthod par bzhen/ / nang gi sbyor ba rdo rje yis// rnal 'byor rdu can du 'dod// de bas rdo rje mchong pa yis// yid 'dod rnams kyi lus la 'dod// mchong ba lnga yi sbyor bgyis// b+har du sangs rgyas nyid thob par/
226a8: gang 'di rgyud las gsungs padag/ de ni pha rol gzhan du 'dod// dngas med gzhal dgod pa yin// lha yi gzugs su bsgom pa yi// mnyam nyid mchod pa chen po ste// sangs rgyas thams cad rab bsgrub pa'o/

226b1: sngags dang de nyid bstan pa yi// bstan pa tsam du legs 'byung ba'i// rgyud ni don dam ma yin te// don dam yang dag skyes pa na// ston pa med cing bstan pa'ang med// nyi shu rtsa bzhir phye ba yi// gnas sogs 'di/
226b2: nying la gnas te// de bas de ru 'khor ba nyid// sgo bya de nyid can gyis min// gal te de nyid med gyur na// de yi 'khrul pas ci zhig bya// 'on te de nyid ldan gyur na// de la 'khrul pa ci zhig yod// gnas dang na pa'i gnas
226b3: mchog rnams/ / bstan pas dri ma med par 'gyur// yang na mi nus bag med pa'i// mi yi gnas ni bsgrags par bya// de yis 'di ltar bshad pa ni// sems can bsam pa'i dbang gos te// bsam gdan las gzhan bde
226b4: med phyir/ / de bas bsam gtan mchog gzhol bya// rnal 'byor pa ni phyi rol 'khor// de yi khams rnams zad par 'gyur// de bas phyi rol spangs nas ni// rnal 'byor rol pas gnas par bya// dpal ldan rdo rje rnal 'byor
226b5: can/ / rnam dag ye shes kun gyis ni// thugs rje thugs gdungs ring po nas// rdo rjen la 'byor can dag gzigs// de nams dgyes pas dnge sa grub pa chog/ ci 'dod par ni stsal bar 'gyur// des ni rje thun ye shes kyang // rab tu
226b6: 'bad de bsgrub par bya/ / sna tshogs spyod pa yang dag ldan// spyod dang brtul zhugs spyad pa yi// spyod dang brtul zhugs 'dir spongs la// de nyid brtul zhugs lang gar byas// gang yang rung ba'i zas gnas pa// rnam pa des
226b7: byas brgyal zhugs can/ / bsam gtan zas mchog gzhol 'gyur bas// smon pa'i spyod pas gnas par gyis// gcer bu'am yang gcer bu min// gang rung gis de ltar 'gyur// rang gi skrag pa'i lha dmigs la// de nyid
226b8: bu rnam par bsam/ / lkugs pa'i dngos por gyur pa yis// zla drug tsam gyis nges par ni// rnal 'byor can gyis nyer bsten na// rnal 'byor chen mo 'di gsal 'gyur// ye shes sgron ma'i mchog mthong na// rnal 'byor ma rnams

227a1: chags 'dus / / bad pa'i thang nas nyam padag bang // nga ma chags 'dus pa nan// mig 'phrul ma 'an ltar 'jig tan du// 'am than na byed pa'o// pal ldan rdo rje dzin pa ni/
227a2: mngon 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// spyod pa 'di la nges par ni// ji skad bshad pa der 'gyur bar// sems ni dag par gyis shig ces// sems can rnams la bdag gsol 'debs// gang gis rmang 'byung snying rje
227a3: ldan/ / gang gis gsung ba de nyid 'gyur// rdo rje drag po'i sbyor ba yis// mkha' 'gro ma ni snying khar dgod// snying khar rdo rje lcags kyur sbyor// thugs kyi rdo rjes nang sbyor te// gzhan yang rdo rje dgong bya ba// chos kyi dbying
227a4: su rnam par brtag/ rang gi nam mkhar sbyor nas su// gzi brjid gzugs ni 'dzin par bsgom// rang gi chos kyi yig dgod pa/ rang drod rang bzhin dri ma med// rang gi bsgom pa'i sbyor ba yis// rang gi chos kyis
227a5: yi ge bsgom/ / ji lta ji ltar rtogs pa yin// gzhan nyid gzugs kyi bsgom pa la// yid kyi gti mug grub pa yi// dbang po gzhan ma bsgom par bya// ji la ji ltar mos pa yis// gzhan nyid gzugs la blta bar
227a6: bya/ / mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las bdag 'dul ba'i mchod pa'i le'u ste drug bcu rtsa brgyad pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsang ba'i ye shes
227a7: gsang ba 'di gsungs so/ / rang bzhin bdag med chos rnams ni// nam mkha' lta bur dri ma med// stong nyid ye shes rdo rje yis// stong nyid rtag tu bsgom par bya// legs so bya ba rnams byin nas// rlung skyes pa
227a8: yi sbyor ba las/ / legs so legs so ye shes che// nges par brjod pa mchog gi mchog/ legs so rdo rje tshul drag po// sangs rgyas byang chub bka' drin rab// legs so gnyis med sbyor ba ni// mchog dang mchog

227b1: nagrub pa la/ / legs so zhes bya nges par sbyar// 'dod pa med pa'i rnam pa ni// legs sa thams cad 'gro ba'i mgon// theg pa chen po bstan pa ni// gnyis med ye shes mchog dang ni// man ngag thob pa
227b2: dang po ste/ / legs so rdo rje bla ma kun// de ma bstan pa rnal 'byor ma// legs so 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la// dngos grub blan med pa byin// rdzogs te cang mi gsung bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin ga ces
227b3: pas de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khro bo'i rdo rje rnams nges par brjod pa'i rgyud bla na med pa'i mkha' 'gro ma'i dra ba'i sdom pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon
227b4: par bstod ngo / / mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma zhes bya ba/ gsang ba'i yang gsang bas bde mchog rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po the tsom med par de kho na bsgom pa bstan pa'i le'u ste drug bcu rtsa dgu pa'o//
227b5: mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las gsang ba las gsang ba'i bde mchog gi rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po zhes bya ba rdzogs s+ho// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta chen po di pang kar shI dz+nyA na dang // bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba
227b6: chen po dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur zhing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ / phyis paN+Di ta chen po dz+nyA na shrI dang / lo ts+tsha ba khyung po chos kyi brtson 'grus kyis kyang zhus pa'o// phyi sa baN+Di ta a nan ta dang / le chung gis chang
227b7: lhag bsabs nas zhus dag byas nas legs par bcos te gtan la phab pa'o/ / 'di las zab pa med do// / rgya gar skad du/ shrI badz+ra DA ka nA ma ma hA tan tra rA dzA/
227b8: bod skad du/ rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro zhes bya ba// bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// mkha' 'gro kun dngos sems dpa' ni

228a1: dza mkha' 'grob pa'i mchog/ gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na// thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs// 'don rangad byung bcom ldan 'das// lhag pa yi ni lha cag nyid// babyung gnas sgyu
228a2: tshul nges 'byung rnams/ / dam tshig spyod pa'i spyod yul yin// 'jig rten gsum du rnyed bka' ba// thog ma dbus mthar yang dag gnas// 'dod chags ma yin chags bral min// dbu mar yang ni mi dmigs so//
228a3: bud med kun gyi sgyu ma'i rtsa// 'di ni gnyis med ye shes mchog/ rnyed dang bde ba kun mos pas// ngan par spyod pa'ang 'grub par 'gyur// nam mkha' kun tu rgyu grub pas// mkha' 'gro ma zhes rab tu grags// sna
228a4: tshogs kun tu phyag rgya ni/ / sna tshogs kun gyi sdom pa yis// mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba// rdo rje mkha' 'gro zhes byar grub// de nyid med sems rnal 'byor pa// lha la dmigs par byed pa dag/ kun tu gzugs
228a5: brnyan yid kyis ni/ / lugs sogs rnal 'byor skye ba min// byang chub sems dpa' rnal 'byor gang // rnal 'byor dbang phyug rang nyid gtso// byang chub sems 'di rdo rje ste// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin no// 'gro
228a6: pa'i rtsa lag rang bzhin gyis/ / sna tshogs g.yog te rnam bzhugs pas// de phyir 'bad pa thams cad kyis// sna tshogs tshul gyis mchod par bya// bdag nyid sangs rgyas thams cad dang // dpa' bo thams cad
228a7: nyid yin te/ / rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis// bdag nyid rab tu bsgrub par bya// 'di yis sangs rgyas thams cad dang // dpa' bo thams cad nyid dang ni// rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad du// tshe 'di nyid du 'grub 'gyur zhes//
228a8: mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// dpal ldan bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs// thams cad nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de// nam mkha' la

228b1: nimatshan nyad me/ / khams gsus ni ma lus pa'i// 'gro kun sgyu ma lta bu yin// brtan pa dang ni g.yo ba yi// 'gro ba dmigs su med pa ste// mthong ba dang ni rig pa'i dngos// thams cad sgyu ma ji bzhin no// gang
228b2: gis thun po 'ching 'gyur ba/ / 'dir des mkhas rnams rnam par grol// phyag rgya'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni// sa gsum ma lus bza' bar bya// gzhan du gal te sbyor ba ni// mtshang mar me lta bur 'da'// gzugs
228b3: ni sangs rgyas rnam sdang mdzad/ / tshor ba rdo rje nyi ma yin// 'du shes pad ma gar dbang ste// 'du byed rdo rje rgyal po yin// rnam shes rdo rje sems dpa' ste// 'di dag dngos kun rang bzhin ni// rdo rje
228b4: mkha' 'gro zhes byar grags/ / yang dag chen po gcig pu'i lha// bde ba thams cad rab ster ba// sgyu ma chen po'i rang bzhin gyis// chags bral chags pa zhes byar bshad// sa khams ltung byed ma yin te// de bzhin chu
228b5: khams bsod ma'o/ / me khams 'gugs byed ma yin te// de bzhin rlung ni gar dbang ngo // nam mkha'i khams ni sgyu ma che// rang nyid 'gro ma zhes byar bshad// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro ma ni 'bar
228b6: ba'i mchog/ 'byung ba lnga yi rang bzhin gyis// de ni rdo rje gtso mor gnas// mig gnyis gti mug rdo rjer bshad// nyan bzhi bya rdo rjer brjod// sna ni ser sna rdo rje ste// kha ni 'dod chags rdo rjer gsungs// lus ni
228b7: zag dog rdo rje ste/ / skye mched thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog/ gzugs 'di thams cad stong pa nyid// stong pa'i tshul gyi mig gis ni// dogs pa med par bsgom pa'i mchog/ rnam par ma
228b8: tog pa yis blta/ / nam mkha'i tshul gyi sems kyis ni// der ni thams cad nam mkha'i dngos// dogs pa med pa'i bsgom par ldan// rnam par mi rtog skye 'gyur zhes// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs//
